loans.name: Sonia Elizabeth

texts.es: Sonia Elizabeth reside en casa familiar con su esposo y su pequeña hija de 4 años. Para Sonia lo más importante es  su familia y es por quien trabaja duramente día con día. Ella se dedica a la venta de ropa para todos los géneros, gustos y preferencias. Su puesto de ropa lo tiene establecido a la orilla de la calle y frente al principal parque de la ciudad en la que vive, lugar muy estratégico ya que es muy concurrido y accesible para muchas personas. Sonia ha trabajado  duramente toda su vida para sacar adelante a su familia y sueña con poder darles una mejor calidad de vida. Ella ha decidido solicitar este crédito a INTEGRAL para invertir en su negocio en la compra de variedad de ropa tanto para caballeros como  para damas. Con el fin de mantener surtido su negocio para que los clientes siempre encuentren lo que buscan y sigan prefiriéndola y aprovechando que se encuentra en un lugar de mucho comercio. Confía en Dios y en su esfuerzo que logrará mejorar su calidad de vida y la de su familia.
texts.en: Sonia Elizabeth lives in the family home with her husband and young daughter, age 4. For Sonia, the most important thing is her family. She works hard every day for them. She sells clothing for all types, likes and preferences. She has established her stall on the end of a street and in front of the city's main park. This is a very strategic place because it is well-trafficked and accessible for many people. Sonia has worked hard her entire life to get her family ahead. She dreams of being able to provide them with a better quality of life. She has decided to request this loan from INTEGRAL to invest in her business, in the purchase of a variety of clothing for men and women. Her goal is to keep her business stocked so that her customers always find what they are looking for, and continue to prefer her business. She trusts in God and that her hard work will improve her quality of life and that of her family.

loans.use: to purchase a variety of clothing for men and women.

loans.name: Kossiwa

texts.fr:
Kossiwa est une femme âgée de 30 ans. Elle est mariée à un jardinier. Elle a 4 enfants dont 2 à l’école. Le premier a 11 ans et le dernier a 2 ans. 
Kossiwa travaille comme  revendeuse depuis 1992. Elle vend des produits maraichers aux voyageurs à l’aéroport de Lomé. Elle travaille avec 1 employé. Sa difficulté principale est l’inondation.
Kossiwa a requis son premier crédit à WAGES afin d’acheter des produits maraichers. Elle veut réinvestir dans son activité.
Dans les prochaines années, Kossiwa voudrait développer son activité. Elle dit qu’avec les profits, Elle prévoit améliorer les conditions de vie de sa famille.
texts.en:
Kossiwa, age 30, is married to a gardener. She has four children, out of whom two attend school. Her firstborn is eleven, while the youngest is two.
She's been working as a reseller since 1992. She sells garden produces to travelers at Lomé Airport. She works with one employee. Her major hardship is flooding.

Kossiwa is seeking her first loan from Kiva's parter, WAGES, in order to buy garden produces. She wants to reinvest in her business. In the forthcoming years, she would like to expand her business. She says that she intends to use her profits to improve the living standard of her family.

loans.use: to buy and sell garden produces

loans.name: Eduardo Alberto

texts.es:
En  la ciudad de Managua el  señor Eduardo Alberto  se dedica laborar en una empresa de esta cuidad   .es casado y con dos pequeño hijos a las que tiene que proporcionarles las condiciones necesarias para que se desarrollen. 
Una de las necesidades que el señor atraviesa hoy en día es que debe mejorar las condiciones de su vivienda y unas de las necesidades principales es la ampliación de un cuarto de su vivienda  por lo que ha tomado la decisión  de iniciar la obra de mejora. es por este motivo que acude a ceprodel para solicitar un crédito para la compra de materiales de construcción como zinc, arena, cemento piedra cantera, para iniciar la mejora de la vivienda realizando la ampliación de esta  .por medio de esta obra brindara mejores condiciones de vida a sus hijos y esposa .
Es importante destacar que por medio de la realización de esta obra le proporciona a su familia un techo digno donde vivir y con todas las condiciones necesarias
texts.en:
Eduardo Alberto works hard for a firm in the city of Managua; he’s married and has two small children that he has to provide necessary conditions to for their growth and development.

One of his current needs is to improve his house enlarging one of the bedrooms so he’s decided to start a home improvement project.  Because of this he’s called upon Ceprodel to request a loan to buy building materials and supplies like zinc metal sheeting, sand, cement, and paving stones to start this room enlargement home improvement.  Through this work he’ll provide his children and his wife with better living conditions.

It’s important to point out that through this project he will provide his family with a proper home with all necessary conditions to live in.

loans.use: to buy building materials and supplies.

loans.name: Messan

texts.fr:
Messan est une femme  âgée de 32 ans. Elle est mariée un déclarant en douane. Elle a 1 enfant de 2 ans scolarisé. 
Messan travaille comme revendeuse depuis 2004. Elle vend des produits cosmétiques à toutes les personnes à la boutique. Elle achète les produits au grand marché de Lomé. Elle travaille  avec 01 employé. Sa difficulté principale est la concurrence rude sur le marché. 
Messan a requis son  premier crédit à WAGES afin d’acheter et vendre les produits cométiques. Elle veut étendre son activité. 
Dans les prochaines années, Messan voudrait diversifier l’activité. Elle dit qu’avec les profits, Elle prévoit  améliorer les conditions de vie de sa famille.
texts.en:
Messan, age 32, is married to a customs agent. She has one two-year-old child who attends school. She's been working as a reseller since 2004. She sells cosmetics to anyone in her shop. She gets her supplies at the Grand Market in Lomé and works with one employee. Her major difficulty is the stiff market competition.

Messan is seeking her first loan from Kiva's partner, WAGES, in order to buy and sell cosmetics. She wants to bolster her business and diversify it in the forthcoming years. She says that with her profits, she intends to improve the living standard of her family.

loans.use: to buy cosmetics

loans.name: Vilma Isidra

texts.es:
En  la ciudad de Managua la señora Vilma Isidra  se dedica a laborar como docente  en una universidad de la capital dedicándose  a esta labor desde hace 25 años .es casada  y con tres personas a su cargo a las que  tiene que proporcionarles las condiciones necesarias para que se desarrollen. 
Una de las necesidades que el señor atraviesa hoy en día es que debe mejorar las condiciones de su vivienda debido a que ha estado en malas condiciones por lo que ha tomado la decisión de iniciar la obra de mejora. es por este motivo que acude a ceprodel para solicitar un crédito para la compra de materiales de construcción como zinc, , perlines .para iniciar el cambio de techo de su vivienda por medio de esta  obra brindara mejores condiciones de vida a sus hijos y esposa .
Es importante destacar que por medio de la realización de esta obra le proporciona a su familia un techo digno donde vivir y con todas las condiciones necesarias
texts.en:
Vilma Isidra works hard as a university professor in a university in the capital city of Managua; she’s been in this profession for 25 years.  She’s married and has three people in her care that she has to provide proper conditions to for them to develop.

One of her current needs is to improve her house because it’s somewhat deteriorated so she’s decided to start a home improvement project.  Because of this she’s called upon Ceprodel to request a loan to buy building materials and supplies like zinc metal sheeting and purlines to start a roof replacement home improvement project.  Through this work she’ll provide her children and her husband with better living conditions.

It’s important to point out that through this project she will provide her family with a proper home with all necessary conditions to live in.

loans.use: to buy building materials and supplies.

loans.name: Santos

texts.es:
Santos  de 53 años de edad, vive con su esposo e hijos en su casa propia, cuenta con servicio sólo de luz, ubicada en la zona rural del distrito de Tambogrande que pertenece al departamento de Piura.  Zona que se caracteriza por la actividad agrícola, ganadera y artesana.

Desde hace 6 años Santos se dedica la venta de productos de primera necesidad (leche, arroz, aceite, azúcar, papel higiénico, atún, etc) y de bebidas, su negocio lo a colocado en su misma casa para su comodidad y seguridad, con las ganancias que obtenga por la venta de sus productos  trata de cubrir  todos sus gastos y mejorar el nivel de vida de su familia.

Para poder  implementar su negocio a solicitado un crédito a Edpyme Alternativa  de 3000 nuevos soles para comprar más mercadería, con el único ideal de que su negocio sea cada vez más grande y tenga productos más surtidos para ofrecerles a sus clientes.  Santos es una persona responsable y trabajadora que se preocupa por brindarles más comodidades a su familia.
texts.en:
Santos, who is 53 years old, lives with his spouse and children in their own house, which has electric service only. They are in the rural area of Tambogrande district, which is in the department of Piura. The area is known for farming, ranching and arts and crafts.

For the past six years, Santos has sold staple goods (milk, rice, oil, sugar, toilet paper, tuna, etc.) and drinks. He has put the business in his own house for comfort and safety. With the earnings he gets from sales of his products, he tries to cover all his expenses and improve his family's standard of living.

In order to help his business, Santos has asked Edpyme Alternativa for a loan of 3000 nuevos soles to buy more merchandise. His only ideal is that his business continues growing and is better stocked so he can offer more to his customers. Santos is a responsible and hardworking person who cares about making his family more comfortable.

loans.use: to buy merchandise to stock his store.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to improve an annex by buying blocks, cement, sand and paying for labor.

loans.name: Maria Mercedes

texts.es:
María de 35 años de edad, vive con su familia en su casa propia, no cuenta con los servicios básicos, ubicada en la zona rural del distrito de Olmos que pertenece al departamento de Lambayeque.  Esta zona se caracteriza por la actividad agrícola y ganadera.

Desde hace 5 años aproximadamente María se ha dedicado a la venta de abarrotes (leche, arroz, aceite, azúcar, papel higiénico, atún, huevos), verduras y bebidas, su negocio lo ha colocado en casa para su comodidad y seguridad, ya que puede atender a la hora que desea, con las ganancias por la venta de sus productos  trata de cubrir  todos sus gastos y necesidades de su hogar.

Para poder  ampliar su negocio a solicitado un crédito a Edpyme Alternativa  de 2000 nuevos soles para comprar más mercadería para abastecer su negocio, con el único objetivo de que su negocio crezca y tenga más productos que ofrecerles a sus clientes;  para cubrir su préstamo y sus obligaciones familiares.  María es una mujer responsable y dedicada que se preocupa por tener más cosas que ofrecerle a su familia al igual que tener mejoras económicas.
texts.en:
María, who is 35 years old, lives with her family in their own house, which does not have basic utilities. They are in the rural area of Olmos district, which is in the department of Lambayeque.  This area is known for farming and ranching.

For approximately five years, María has sold groceries (milk, rice, oil, sugar, toilet paper, tuna, eggs), vegetables and drinks. She has located her business in her house for her comfort and safety, since this way she can attend to it whenever she wants. With the earnings from sales of her products, she tries to cover all her expenses and household needs.

In order to expand her business, she has asked Edpyme Alternativa for a loan of 2000 nuevos soles to buy more merchandise so she can stock her business. Her only goal is for her business to grow and have more products to offer her customers, so she can cover her loan and her family obligations.

María is a responsible and dedicated woman who cares about having more things to offer her family and having economic improvements.

loans.use: to buy merchandise to stock her store.

loans.name: Socorro Del Pilar

texts.es:
Socorro es madre de familia de 32 años de edad, vive con sus hijos en casa de su hermana, cuenta con servicio sólo de luz, ubicada en la zona rural del distrito de Tambogrande que pertenece al departamento de Piura.  Zona que se caracteriza por la actividad agrícola, ganadera y artesana.

Desde hace algunos años Socorro se dedica a la preparación y venta de salchipollo, salchipapas y gaseosas por las noches diariamente, su negocio lo ha instalado en las afueras de la casa donde vive, cuenta con su infraestructura propia para que lleguen sus clientes, con los ingresos que obtenga podrá cubrir sus necesidades diarias de su familia.

Ha solicitado un préstamo a Edpyme Alternativa de 1000 nuevos soles para la compra de más insumos, sillas y mesas para que siga ampliando su negocio, para satisfacer la necesidad de sus clientes y con esas ganancias podrá pagar su crédito y mejorar su calidad de vida.  Socorro trabaja con mucha dedicación para que poco a poco su familia se supere y logre sus metas.
texts.en:
Socorro is a thirty-two year old mother. She lives with her children in her sister's house, which only has electricity service, located in the rural district of Tambogrande in the department of Piura. This area is known for farming, livestock and crafts.

For some years Socorro has worked preparing and selling fried potatoes with chicken and fried potatoes with hot dogs, daily every night. She has a stall for her business outside her house where her customers come, and with the earnings she gets she can meet the day-to-day necessities of her family.

She is asking for a loan from Edpyme Alternativa of 1000 nuevos soles ($375.00) in order to buy more supplies, chairs and tables in order to continue expanding her business, in order to meet the needs of her customers. With those profits she can pay her loan and better her quality of life. Socorro works hard so that step by step her family will overcome and achieve their goals.

loans.use: to purchase supplies, chairs and tables in order to expand her business

loans.name: Gabriela Milagro

texts.es:
Gabriela, de 27 años de edad, originaria de la ciudad de León, casada, ella es comerciante es dueña de una pequeña pulpería y una mini tienda  de ropa, ella estudia su segundo año de la carrera de contabilidad. Inicio su negocio a la edad de 23 años de edad, después de su casarse ella no encontraba un pasatiempo su vida era muy rutinaria, se sentía agobiada, su mama la motivo a establecer su negocio como pasatiempo, ella recuerda que comenzó con un capital muy pequeño de menos de $200 dólares y en poco tiempo se dio cuenta que mas que un pasatiempo era una fuente de ingresos y eso la ayudo a sentirse mas útil  y posteriormente puso una mini tienda y con esto se ayuda pagar la universidad. 
Solicita el crédito para comprar mercadería tales como arroz, azúcar, aceite, frijoles para vender en su pulpería y comprar también cosméticos, ropa y perfumes para vender en su mini tienda. Al hacer esta inversión lo clientes se sentirán mas atraídos por la variedad de productos que su venta ofrece y sus ingresos mejoraran. Una de sus metas es logra convertir su pequeña pulpería en una distribuidora y su mini tienda se convierta en una tienda de variedad de productos de ropa y productos de uso cotidiano y  finalizar sus estudios univeristarios.
texts.en:
Gabriela is 27 years old, married, and a native of the city of Leon. She is a business woman. She owns a small grocery store as well as a small clothing store. She is studying accounting and is in her second year. 

She started her own business when she was 23 years old. After getting married, she couldn't find a hobby. She found her life very routine and felt overwhelmed. Her mom encouraged her to start her business as a hobby. She remembers that she started with a small capital of less than $200 dollars and that in a short amount of time she realized that more than a hobby, it was a source of income. This made her feel more useful. Later on, she started a small store which helps her pay for her college education.

She is requesting the loan to buy merchandise such as rice, sugar, oil, and beans to sell in her grocery store. She also wants to buy cosmetics, clothes, and perfumes to sell in her clothing store. With this investment, her clients will feel more attracted by the variety of products that her store will offer and her earnings will increase.

One of her goals is to turn her small grocery store into a wholesale store and also to turn her small clothing store into a store with a variety of products for clothing and everyday products. She also wants to finish her college studies.

loans.use: to buy merchandise such as rice, oil, and beans to sell in her small grocery store. She also wants to buy cosmetics, clothes, and perfumes to sell in her small clothing store.

loans.name: Las Positivas Group

texts.es: Guillermina se inicio vendiendo en un puesto  de mercado donde brindando desayuno, almuerzo y cena, la cual llevo varios años trabajando de esa manera, pero con  esfuerzo y   el buen uso que  le dio a sus ingresos pudo invertir y de esa manera iniciar su propio negocio, actualmente ella  cuenta con un pequeño kiosco de golosinas, negocio que le ha permitido apoyar a sus 03 hijos en su educación ya que están en etapa escolar, es por ello que Guillermina tuvo que trabajar arduamente  para sacar adelante a sus hijos ya que nos manifiesta que es madre soltera. A sus 50 años Guillermina se siente con todas las fuerzas de seguir trabajando y de esa manera brindarles  lo mejor a sus hijos ya  que son su motivación para seguir progresando. El deseo más grande de Guillermina es que sus hijos terminen de estudiar. Con el crédito solicitado va invertir en su negocio  comprando de galletas, caramelos, chocolates, entre otros dulces y de esa manera surtir su kiosco. La Alcancía Comunal “Las Positivas” es un grupo conformado por 07 integrantes donde Guillermina es la presidenta del grupo, ellos agradecen el apoyo brindado.En la fotografía podemos apreciar a la sra. Guillermina ella viste un polo rojo.Gerson no pudo estar presente por motivo de trabajo.
texts.en:
Guillermina started selling in a stand in the market where breakfast, lunch, and dinner were served. She worked there for many years but due to her effort and the good use of her earnings, she was able to invest and in this way start her own business. Currently, she has her own sweets stand which has allowed her to support her 3 children in their education as they are currently in school. This is why Guillermina had to work very hard to be able to have her children get ahead since she has made it known to us that she is a single mother.

In her fifties, Guillermina feels full of strength to keep working and in this way provide the best she can for her children as they are her motivation to keep making progress.

Guillermina's biggest wish is to have her children finish their studies. The loan she requested will be used to invest in her business buying cookies, candies, chocolates, amongst other sweets, and in this way add variety to her stand.  

The Communal Bank "Las Positivas" is a group made up of 7 members of which Guillermina is the president. They are very grateful for the support given to them. In the picture, we can see Guillermina wearing a red shirt. Gerson was not present because of work reasons.

loans.use: to buy cookies, candies, and chocolates.

loans.name: Leana Patricia

texts.es:
Leana, originaria de Palacaguina de 36 años  de edad, madre soltera, tiene dos hijos de 12 y 2 años de edad, respectivamente, su nivel de estudios es básico, termino toda su secundaria pero no pudo estudiar una carrera universitaria, ella es comerciante, se dedica a vender y a elaborar rosquillas. Ella aprendió este oficio por medio de su mama quien desde hace 45 años se dedico a elaborar rosquillas, así fue que ella fue aprendiendo poco a poco este negocio. Hoy en día ella es la que dirige su propio negocio de rosquillas independiente de su mama, de hecho tiene una línea de entrega de su productos en Managua la capital, ella hace entrega de pedidos una vez por semana.  
Ella solicita el crédito para comprar materia prima tales como maíz, manteca, azúcar, queso , leña  para elaborar rosquillas. Con esta inversión podrá adquirir mas fácilmente materia prima para elaborar y cumplir con los pedidos de rosquillas que le hacen sus clientes, tener capacidad para elabora mas cantidad y hacer nuevos clientes. En sus planes futuros ella quiere seguir mejorando la calidad de sus productos, abrir mercado en otras ciudades para dar a conocer sus deliciosas rosquillas hechas a base de maíz. Su próxima meta es ir haciendo algunas reparaciones a su taller de rosquillas y a su casa.
texts.en:
Leana, age 36, is originally from Pacagaguina. She is a single mother with two children, ages 12 and 2 respectively. Leana only has a basic education, having finished high school but not continuing on for a college degree. She is a merchant who prepares and sells donuts. Leana learned this trade from her mother, who was in the business of making donuts for 45 years. Gradually over time, Leana learned everything she needed to know about the business. Today she runs her own donut venture that is separate from her mother’s business. She now has a line of products that are sold in the capital of Managua, where she delivers orders once a week.

Leana is requesting a loan to buy raw materials such as corn, lard, sugar, cheese, and firewood for making donuts. With this investment, she will be able to acquire supplies more easily for making and completing donut orders from her customers. Having greater capacity means that she can produce in larger quantities and attract new customers. Her future plans include continuing to improve the quality of her products and opening shops in other cities so that people will know about her delicious corn donuts. Her next goal is to make a few repairs to her donut shop and to her house.

loans.use: to buy corn, lard, sugar, cheese, and firewood for making donuts.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to purchase construction materials so that he can build a room for his children.

loans.use: to pay for materials and labor required for home repairs.

loans.name: Renacer Group

texts.es: Gloria tiene 46 años D. edad  es madre  soltera y tiene 03 hijos, quienes han sido su motivación para seguir luchando, Gloria lleva años  dedicándose  a la venta D. comida,  ella empezó ayudando a su mamá quien también se dedicaba a dicho trabajo poco a poco fue ganando experiencia y es así como Gloria deciD. alquilar un puesto e iniciar su propio negocio, gracias a su arduo trabajo Gloria a sacado adelante  a sus hijos sola ya que nos manifiesta que tuvo que hacer el papel D. padre y madre para ellos, también se dedica a la venta D. bebidas (gaseosas) en su domicilio lo cual obtiene un ingreso mas para su hogar. El deseo D. Gloria es que sus hijos sean profesionales y D. ampliar su negocio. Con el crédito solicitado lo invertirá en su restaurante comprando  platos, ollas, cubiertos, e insumos para la preparación D. sus comidas. La Alcancía Comunal “Renacer” es un grupo conformado por 08 mujeres emprendedoras dedicadas a diversas actividades comerciales, ellos están muy agradecidos con el Programa- Prosperidad ya que hacen posible su progreso.
texts.en:
Gloria is 46 years old and a single mother with three children, who motivate her to continue pushing forward. She has been selling food for years. Gloria started out helping her mother, who was also in the same line of work, and steadily gained experience until she decided to rent a stand and start her own business. Thanks to her hard work Gloria was able to help her children get ahead by herself, having to play the role of both father and mother. She also sells sodas from her home as a way of generating more household income. Gloria’s wishes are to see her children become professionals and to expand her business.

With the loan she requested, Gloria will invest in her restaurant by purchasing plates, pots, cutlery, and supplies for preparing her dishes. The Communal Bank “Renacer” (To Be Reborn) is a group that consists of eight enterprising women who are dedicated to different business activities. They are very grateful for the “Prosperidad” Program, which has maD. their success possible.

loans.use: to buy plates, pots, cutlery, and supplies for preparing her dishes.

loans.name: Ronal

texts.es: El Sr. Ronal vive en una urbanización nueva recién construida en donde ha alquilado una casa en la cual ha puesto su negocio de bazar y ademas brinda alquiler de video juegos, el cliente tiene también un auto en el cual hace movilidad escolar tiene un hijo a su cargo en cual esta estudiando y también lo ayuda en el negocio. Solicita el crédito en nuestra institución ya que quiere adquirir mas televisores para sus videos juegos. Además tiene un terreno en el cual piensa construir. El señor Ronal es una persona muy trabajadora con muchos deseos de tener un mejor nivel de vida. Su sueño es poder construir su casa propia de material noble. El esta muy agradecido por credito otorgado ya que contribuye a ser crecer su negocio.
texts.en: Mr. Ronal lives in a newly built residential area where he has rented a house.  There he has set up a bazaar and also rents videogames.  He also uses his car to transport school children.  He has a school-aged son in his care who helps out in the business.  The loan he is requesting from our institution will be used to buy more TV sets for the videogames.  He also has land where he wants to start construction.  Mr. Ronal is a hard-working person who has a great desire to lead a better lifestyle.  His dream is to build his own house out of cement and stone.  He is very grateful for the loan which will help expand his business.

loans.use: To buy TV sets for his videogames business.

loans.name: Los Emprendedores De Pando Group

texts.es:
LOS EMPRENDEDORES DE PANDO, es un grupo que trabaja con EDAPROSPO desde hace 5 meses, sus integrantes son personas dedicadas a actividades de comercio.
Sonia es socia del grupo, tiene 26 años, tiene un hijo, es una joven madre soltera; para llevar el sustento a su hogar trabaja vendiendo verduras y además se encuentra estudiando Cosmetología, ya que su gran sueño es aperturar un salón Spa.
El préstamo solicitado será invertido en la compra de mercadería e invertir en sus estudios.
texts.en:
“Los Emprendedores de Pando” (The Entrepreneurs of Pando) is a group that has been working with EDAPROSPO for five months. The members are dedicated people who engage in their business activities.

Sonia, age 26, is a member of the group. She is a single mother with one child. Sonia sells vegetables in order to support her household, but she is also studying cosmetology. Her greatest wish is to open a spa.

The loan she is requesting will be used to buy merchandise and invest in her studies.

loans.use: to buy vegetables and to pay for her cosmetology studies.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to pay off personal debts.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to pay off her credit card debt.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy fruit and vegetables.

loans.name: Tchotcho

texts.fr:
Tchotcho Claudine est une femme  âgée de 40 ans. Elle est mariée å un pasteur. Elle a 03 enfants tous scolarisés. Le premier a 11 ans et le dernier a 6 ans.  
Tchotcho Claudine travaille comme revendeuse de fournitures depuis 2006. Elle vend à ses clients au marché. 
Tchotcho Claudine a requis son premier cycle de prêt à WAGES afin d’acheter des fournitures scolaires. Elle veut augmenter son stock.
Dans les prochaines années, Tchotcho Claudine voudrait créer d’autres points de vente. Elle dit qu’avec les profits, Elle veut assurer l’épanouissement de sa famille.
texts.en:
Tchotcho Claudine, age 40, is married to a pastor. She has three children, who all attend school. Her firstborn is eleven, while the youngest is six. She's been working as a school supplies reseller since 2006. She sells to her customers at the market.  

Tchotcho Claudine is seeking her first loan from Kiva's partner, WAGES, in order to purchase school supplies. She wants to bolster her stock. In the forthcoming years, she would like to open other retail outlets. She says that with her profits, she wants to ensure the blossoming of her family.

loans.use: to buy and resell school supplies

loans.name: Francisco José

texts.es:
En  la ciudad de Managua el  señor francisco jose se dedica  a laborar como albañil  en una empresa de esta cuidad  dedicándose  a esta labor desde hace 05 años, su núcleo familiar es de 3 personas a las que tiene que brindarle mejores  condiciones de vida. 
Una de las necesidades que el señor atraviesa hoy en día es que debe mejorar las condiciones de su vivienda debido a que ha estado en malas condiciones por lo que ha tomado la sabia decisión  de iniciar la obra de mejora . es por este motivo que acude a ceprodel para solicitar un crédito para la compra de materiales de construcción como zinc, perlines .para iniciar la  mejora de la vivienda realizando el cambio de  ,techo por medio de esta obra brindara mejores condiciones de vida a sus hijos y esposa .
Es importante destacar que el señor agrádese a ceprodel por este crédito que se le otorgo porque gracia a este financiamiento va a poder realizar esta obra y proporcionarle a su familia un techo digno donde vivir y con todas las condiciones necesarias
texts.en:
In the city of Managua, Señor Francisco José works in construction for a local business.  He has been doing this work for the last five years.  His nuclear family consists of three people, for whom he wants to provide better living conditions.

One of the Señor's current needs is that he must improve the conditions of his home, as it's in bad condition.  This is why he has made the wise decision to start the improvement work, and its for this reason that he came to Ceprodel to request a loan to buy construction materials such as zinc roofing sheets and roofing beams.  He will begin improving his home by replacing the roof; by means of this work he will be able to provide better conditions for his children and wife.

It is important to highlight that the Señor is grateful to Ceprodel for offering him this loan, because thanks to this financing he will be able to undertake this work and provide his family with a decent roof and good conditions.

loans.use: to buy construction materials.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy construction materials.

loans.name: Koffi

texts.fr:
Koffi est  un homme âgée de 34 ans. Il est célibataire et n’a pas d’enfants.
Koffi travaille comme mécanographe depuis 2009. Il a une boutique et sert ses clients. 
Koffi a requis son premier cycle de prêt à WAGES afin d’acheter et vendre des photocopieurs. Il veut relancer son activité de vente de photocopieurs.
Dans les prochaines années, Koffi voudrait agrandir son activité en répondant plus à la demande. Il dit qu’avec les profits, il prévoit se marier et avoir une famille heureuse.
texts.en:
Koffi, age 34, is single and without children. He's been working as a terminal operator since 2009. He has a shop where he serves his customers. He's seeking his first loan from Kiva's partner, WAGES, in order to buy and resell photocopiers.

He wants to revitalize his business. In the forthcoming years, he would like to expand his business to better meet customer demand. He says that with his profits, he intends to get married and have a happy family.

loans.use: to buy and resell photocopiers

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: Expenses related to their son's graduation from high school.

loans.name: Mujeres Unidas Por El Progreso Group

texts.es:
La Alcancía Comunal “Mujeres Unidas por el Progreso” es un grupo nuevo que está conformado por 07 personas empeñosas que se comprometen a trabajar bien con el Programa- Prosperidad.
Trinidad es natural D. Jauja, con la idea D. buscar un mejor futuro  ella junto a su familia  hace 10 años que radican en Lima, Trinidad tiene 30 años  D. edad es casada y tiene 02 hijos en etapa escolar. Trinidad cuenta con una librería la cual ofrece útiles escolares, gracias a este negocio  ha podido  apoyar a sus hijos en su educación y con algunos gastos del hogar. Trinidad es una madre trabajadora que para surgir ha tenido que luchar mucho ya que llego a Lima con su familia sin conocer a nadie. Su meta es D. ampliar su negocio para así seguir obteniendo ganancias, es por ello que solito el préstamo para implementar su librería comprando lapiceros, cuaderno, colores, plumones, borradores. La Nueva Alcancía Comunal “Mujeres Unidas por el Progreso” están muy entusiasmados por iniciar esta nueva etapa.
texts.en:
The Communal Bank "Mujeres Unidas por el Progreso” ("Women United for Progress"), is a new group that is maD. up of 7 dedicated women who are committed to working well with the Prosperity Program.

Trinidad is a native of Jauja, who has the idea of looking for a better future for herself and her family.  She has lived in Lima for the last ten years.  Trinidad is 30 years old and married with two school-age children.  

Trinidad has a stationery store that provides school supplies.  Thanks to this business, she has been able to support her children in their education, as well as some of the household expenses.

Trinidad is a hard working mother who has had to struggle greatly to get ahead, as she came to Lima with her family not knowing a soul.

Her goal is to grow her business and so continue generating earnings.  This is why she is requesting a loan to stock up her stationery store, buying pens, notebooks, colors, markers and erasers.

The members of the new Communal Bank “Mujeres Unidas por el Progreso” are very enthusiastic about starting this new stage.

loans.use: to buy pens, notebooks, colors, markers and erasers.

loans.name: Godoberto

texts.es:
Godoberto de 57 años de edad, vive con su esposa e hijos en su casa propia, la cual no cuenta con servicios básicos, ubicado en la zona rural del distrito de Tambogrande que pertenece al departamento de Piura. Zona que se caracteriza por la actividad agrícola,ganadera y artesana.

La actividad que desarrolla Godoberto es la agricultura, cuenta con sus propias tierras de cultivo donde siembra limón, productos que se comercializan diariamente, una vez que realiza su cosecha su producto los ofrece a los diferentes mercados de Piura y así puede obtener ingresos para cubrir sus gastos diarios de su familia.  También comercializa animales como ovejas y cerdos, permitiéndole obtener otro ingreso económico para su casa.

Ha solicitado un préstamo a Edpyme Alternativa de 600 nuevos soles para comprar de fertilizantes para mejorar sus tierras como su producto y alimento balanceado para sus animales, una vez que se engorden los vende a los diferentes mercados de su zona, con la finalidad de que obtenga un mejor precio por ellos y así pueda tener más ingresos mejorando su calidad de vida.  Godoberto es una persona trabajadora y muy responsable que lo único que quiere es que su familia salga adelante y se supere.
texts.en:
Godoberto, age 57, lives with his wife and children in his own home. Their home does not have the basic services, and is located in a rural zone in the Tambogrande district, belonging to the Piura department. This zone is characterized by agricultural, ranching, and crafting activity.

Godoberto is a farmer. He has his own lands where he sows lemon. He sells these products daily; once harvested, he sells his produce in the various markets in Piura. This is how he obtains an income to cover his family's daily costs. He also sells animals such as sheep and hogs. This allows him to obtain another income for his household.

He has requested a loan of 600 Soles from Edpyme Alternativa to purchase fertilizers for improving his lands, for example through balanced food for his animals. Once he fattens them he sells them at a better price in various markets in the area. This way he will make a better income to improve their quality of life. Godoberto is a hard-working and very responsible person. His only desire is for his family to get ahead and excel.

loans.use: to buy fertilizers to improve his land, and balanced food for his animals.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy construction materials

loans.name: Maria Soledad

texts.es:
María de 30 años, vive con su esposo e hijo en su casa propia, cuenta con servicio sólo de luz, ubicada en la zona rural del distrito de Chulucanas que pertenece al departamento de Piura.  Zona de alta actividad agrícola, ganadería y artesanía.

Desde hace unos años María se dedica a la venta de productos de belleza por catálogo, su negocio lo tiene en su domicilio, cuenta con su propia clientela, con los ingresos que obtenga en ambas actividades podrá brindarle una mejor calidad de vida a su familia.

Ha solicitado un préstamo a Edpyme Alternativa de 2000 nuevos soles para comprar más productos de belleza y seguir ofreciendolos a sus clientes y así podrá obtener mayores ganancias para tener una mejor calidad de vida. María es una mujer trabajadora y una madre que siempre trata que su familia salga adelante a pesar de las dificultades que a veces se presentan en la vida.
texts.en:
Maria, 30 years old, lives with her husband and son in their own house, with light as their only utility.  They are located in the rural district of Chulucanas, belonging to the department of Piura.  The area’s primary activities are farming, ranching, and artisan crafts.

For a few years now, Maria has sold beauty products by catalog.  She runs her business from her home and has her own customers.  With the income earned from both activities, she can provide a better quality of life for her family.

She has requested this loan with Edpyme Alternativa of 2000 nuevos soles to buy more beauty products and continue offering them to her customers, so that she will make better earnings and be able to improve her quality of life.  Maria is a hardworking woman and a mother who always tries to help her family succeed in spite of the difficulties that sometimes arise in life.

loans.use: to buy more beauty products.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy construction materials

loans.name: Vladimer

texts.en:
Vladimer is from the village Abastumani, South Georgia. Abastumani is famous throughout the country as a mountain resort and it is full of tourists during most of the year. 

Vladimer is 44 years old. He lives with his family – his wife, Nina, their 19-year-old son, their 18-year-old daughter and his mother, who is retired.

Vladimer works in the local bathhouse as a security person. His wife works in the same bathhouse as a cleaning lady. Their total monthly salary is 240 GEL. 

Along with their jobs, they get additional income from renting a family-owned house. They rent it to the tourists. 

Vladimer requested the credit for renovation of this house. After the renovation, he will be able to rent it for a higher price. Vladimer will use the increased income for financing the children’s education.

loans.use: to purchase materials to renovate his rental house.

loans.name: Albert

texts.en:
Albert is from the village of Vardisubani in the Kakheti region of East Georgia. He is 56 years old and lives with his wife, Nani. 

Nani works as a teacher in the local school. Albert is a joiner. He has his own workshop, where he produces home furniture, mainly beds. He sells his products in Tbilisi, in a trade center. His total average monthly income is 1,100 GEL. 

Albert requested credit for purchasing wood as a raw material for his workshop. He will make beds and sell them in Tbilisi in the fall. In the fall, the demand for home furniture, as well as prices, will increase in comparison to the summer months. By that time, Albert will have products ready to supply the market. 

In the future, Albert plans to save some of his income for house renovation, in order to improve his family’s living conditions.

loans.use: to purchase wood for his workshop.

loans.name: Tea

texts.en:
Tea is 26 years old. She got married couple of years ago and now lives with her husband, Valerian, and her mother-in-law in the village Gulgula, Kakheti District. Tea is an English teacher who teaches local children and youth. She gives lessons at home and is busy five days a week, earning a monthly income of 450 GEL. Her family also farms which provides an additional source of income, led by Valerian and his mother. 

Tea is requesting a loan to purchase materials and renovate her bathroom and kitchen. These two rooms in the house are in bad condition and this renovation will provide her family with a better house and living conditions.

loans.use: to purchase materials for a kitchen and bathroom renovation

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy stones, cement and sand

loans.name: Vasil

texts.en:
Vasil is from the village Shalauri, Kakheti Region. He is 26 years old. Vasil married several months ago and lives with his wife, Natela, and his mother, father, and 19-year-old brother. Vasil and his brother are workers who do construction work in nearby villages and towns. Along with their main job, they are both involved with the family’s agricultural business. The family has three pigs and sells an average of 30 piglets per year. Also, they have four sheep and they sell lambs as well as cheese made from sheep’s milk. Vasil’s father works as a driver locally and his mother is a teacher in the local kindergarten. The total average income of the family is 800 GEL. 

Vasil ia requesting a loan to repair the roof of his house, as it is already old and can’t keep out the rain and snow. After repairing the roof, the house will become more comfortable and the family members will improve their living conditions.

loans.use: to purchase materials to repair the roof

loans.name: Archil

texts.en:
Archil is 43 years old and married. He is from the village Gantiadi, South Georgia, and lives with his wife and 8 year-old-son. His son goes to school. The family’s only source of income is agriculture. They have a small dairy farm with two milk cows and they sell milk to local dairy retailers. Along with the dairy farm, Archil and his family cultivate potatoes, wheat, and barley on their two-hectare plot of land. They sell their produce in Tbilisi, the capital city. Archil worked hard during this entire year. Weather conditions were favorable as well, and he has had a good harvest. Archil hopes that he’ll be able to sell it for good price.

Archil is requesting a loan to finance his harvesting and transportation activities. He will use his loan to hire a tractor owner, who will help harvest his produce, and a truck driver, who will take the harvested potatoes and corn to Archil’s storehouse. Approximately 40% of his loan will also be used to purchase wood for the oven, which is the only means of heat in Archil’s village during winter months.

loans.use: to hire harvesting and transportaton help and to purchase wood

loans.name: Asmat

texts.en:
Asmat is from the village Bekami, East Georgia. She is 60 years old and lives with her big family: her husband Dishvard, her 41-year-old son, her daughter-in-law, her 15-year-old granddaughter, and two grandsons, ages one and 12. The elder children go to school and her son works as a locomotive driver for the Georgian Railway Company. Asmat and Dishvard manage the family agricultural business. They have a milk cow and sell approximately 20 kilogram of cheese each month to local dairy retailers. They also grow maize, haricot, onion, and garlic on their two hectares of land. Asmat and her husband sell their harvested vegetables at the local market. The total average monthly income of the family is 1,100 GEL, including Dishvard’s pension. 

Asmat is requesting a loan to expand the family’s dairy farm and purchase a milk cow. This will increase her production and sales of cheese by 100%.  The increased income will allow the family to save money to renovate their house in order to improve their living conditions.

loans.use: to purchase a milk cow

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: buy sand, cement, and iron.

loans.name: Mamuka

texts.en:
Mamuka is 45 years old and married. He is from the village Rieti, Gori District, East Georgia. Mamuka lives with his big family, his wife Ketevan, his 11-year-old son, 10-year-old daughter, his retired 70-year-old mother, and his 39-year-old sister. His children go to school. 

Mamuka is the only income provider in the family. He farms the family-owned 1.3 hectare plot of land and grows potatoes and peaches which he sells locally to greengrocers. The family also cultivates a cherry garden with 100 cherry trees. Mamuka sells the harvested fruit locally to retailers during the season. 

Mamuka is requesting a loan to expand the family farming business and purchase onion, beet, and carrot seeds. He plans to plant these vegetables and sell his harvest locally. The income of the family will increase and he will be able to provide better care for his children and improve the family’s overall living conditions.

loans.use: to purchase onion, beet, and carrot seeds

loans.name: Zina

texts.en:
Zina is from the village of Tsveri, East Georgia. She lives with her husband Amiran. 

Zina and Amiran earn their living through agriculture. They own 1.3 hectares of land, where tomatoes, cabbages, onions, haricot beans, cherries and berries are grown. They sell harvested products locally to greengrocery retailers. The total average income of the family is 1000 laris per month. 

Zina and Amiran decided to start a dairy farm in addition to their other farming activities. Zina requested credit for construction of a cattle shed. After the harvest season, with the earned money they will purchase 2 milk cows. Zina will produce cheese and sell it on the local open market. The new business initiative will increase the income of the family by 30-40%.  Zina and Amiran will improve their living conditions.

loans.use: to purchase materials for cattle-shed construction.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to pay off his credit card debt.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to pay for a medical examination and buy medicine.

loans.name: Malkhaz

texts.en:
Malkhaz is from the village of Gantiadi, South Georgia. He is 28 years old, married and lives with his wife Mzia, 5-year-old son, and 3-year-old daughter. 

Agriculture is the only source of the income for the family. The family has a small dairy farm with three milk cows. They sell milk to local dairy product retailers. Along with the dairy farm they own 0.5 hectare land, where potatoes are grown. Harvested potatoes are sold in Tbilisi (capital city of the country). 

Malkhaz requested credit for financing the harvesting process and harvest transportation costs. He will pay the owner of the tractor which will help him in harvesting potatoes, and the truck driver, who will take the harvested potatoes to Malkhaz’s store-house. Also, part of the credit (approximately 45%) will be used for purchasing wood, which will be used for the oven during the winter months. The oven is the only mean of heating the house in Malkhaz’s village during winter months. 

Malkhaz worked hard during the whole year. The weather conditions were favorable as well and he has good harvest this year. Malkhaz hopes that he’ll be able to sell it for a good price and earn planned profit, part of which will be used for the family's well-being and the other part will be reinvested in potato growing.

loans.use: to pay the tractor owner and truck driver for services provided in the potato harvesting process and to purchase wood to heat the house in the winter months.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy building materials.

loans.name: Archil

texts.en:
Archil is from the village of Koda, East Georgia. He is 27 years old. Archil married recently and lives with his wife Zoya, his parents, and his younger brother. Archil works in local railway station “Marabda” as an operator. At the same time he helps his parents in the family-owned dairy farm. They have two milk cows and sell cheese and yogurt in Tbilisi (capital city of the country) grocery stores. Archil has concluded an agreement with these stores and he supplies them with the agreed amount of dairy products constantly. 

Archil requested credit for financing some renovation work in their house. It was last renovated a long time ago and is already in bad condition and uncomfortable. After the renovation, the newly married couple and the rest of the family will live in a better and more comfortable environment.

loans.use: to purchase materials for house renovation.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy rice, sugar, soda, oil, gatorade, nevax paper, detergents, etc.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy construction materials: zinc and purlines

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy building supplies

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: To purchase school uniforms for her son and to cover other expenses.

loans.name: Eusebio

texts.es:
Eusebio  de 56 años de edad, vive con su esposa e hijos en su casa propia, cuenta con servicio sólo de agua, ubicada en la zona rural del distrito de Mórrope que pertenece al departamento de Lambayeque.  Zona que se caracteriza por la actividad agrícola, ganadera y turismo.

Desde hace varios años, cuenta con una bodega instalada en su domicilio. Allí ofrecen en venta a los vecinos y clientes de la zona diversos productos de consumo diario, entre productos de primera necesidad y otros. Cuenta con una clientela establecida y no tiene otra competencia cerca de su negocio.  Con esta actividad trata de solventar sus gastos económicos y ayudar  a su familia.

Para poder  implementar su negocio a solicitado un crédito a Edpyme Alternativa  de 2500 nuevos soles para comprar más productos comestibles para abastecer su negocio y satisfacer la necesidad de sus clientes en su consumo diario, con el único ideal de que su negocio sea cada vez más grande y tenga productos surtidos para ofrecerles a sus clientes.  Eusebio es una persona responsable y trabajadora que se preocupa por brindarles lo mejor a su familia y ayudarlos alcanzar su ideales a sus hijos.
texts.en:
Eusebio, 56, lives with his wife and children in a house they own, this house only has water services and is located in the rural area of the district of Morrope that belongs to the department of Lambayeque, area characterized by its farming and tourism activities. 

For a few years Eusebio has sold basic need products (milk, rice, oil, sugar, toilet paper, tuna, etc) as well as beverages, his business is located at their house for their convenience and safety, with the profits from the sales of these products he tries to cover all his expenses and improve his family's quality of life.  

To stock his business he has requested a loan of 2,500 new soles to Edpyme Alternativa to buy merchandise, with the only wish to have his business grow and have a variety of products to offer to his clients.  Eusebio is a responsible and hard working person that worries to provide for his family and help his children reach their goals.

loans.use: Compra de más productos comestibles para abastecer su negocio y satisfacer la necesidad de sus clientes.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to purchase video games, controllers, consoles, a 20-inch television, and plastic chairs.

loans.name: Jenny Pilar

texts.es:
Jenny es madre de familia de 38 años de edad, vive con sus hijos en casa de unos familiares, cuenta  con servicio de agua y luz, ubicada  en el distrito de José leonardo Ortiz que pertenece a la provincia de Chiclayo.  Zona que se caracteriza por la alta actividad comercial que existe y de transporte público.

Jenny brinda servicios de carpintería desde hace 3 años, su negocio lo ha instalado en su mismo domicilio, fabrica y vende todo tipo de muebles para el hogar, cuenta con su propia clientela y también realiza trabajos a pedido,es conocido por elbuen servicio que brinda y la calidad de sus trabajos, con los ingresos que obtenga podrá solventar sus obligaciones familiares.

Ha solicitado un préstamo a Edpyme Alternativa de 1000 nuevos soles para comprar mayor cantidad de madera y seguir cumpliendo con los pedidos pendientes, al realizar un buen trabajo se incrementarían sus clientes, lo que le permitirá tener mejoras económicas para pagar su crédito y mejorar su calidad de vida.  Jenny es una mujer dedicada y trabajadora con la finalidad de que su familia siga adelante y lo gre sus objetivos.
texts.en:
Jenny is a 38 year old mom, lives with her children in at a house owned by family members, the house counts with water and power services and is located in the district of Jose Leonardo Ortiz in the province of Chiclayo, area characterized by high commercial activities and public transportation.

Jenny provides carpentry services, she has done this for three years, her business is located at home, she builds and sells all types of home furniture, she has a client base and also gets projects upon request, she is known for the good service provided and the quality of her work, with the income she is able to cover the family's financial obligations.

She has requested a loan to Edpyme Alternativa of 1,000 new soles to buy more wood to complete pending orders, by doing a good job the orders from clients would increase, which would allow more profit to pay for her loan and improve her quality of life, Jenny is a dedicated and hardworking woman with the dream to get her family ahead and achieve their goals.

loans.use: To buy more wood to build furniture.

loans.name: Maria Del Carmen

texts.es:
Maria del Carmen D. 33 años D. edad, vive con su esposa e hijos en su casa propia, no cuenta con los servicios básicos, ubicada en la zona rural del distrito D. TambogranD., la cual pertenece al departamento D. Piura.  Esta zona se caracteriza por la actividad agrícola, ganadería  y artesanía.

Maria del Carmen desD. hace varios años se dedica a la crianza y venta D. ganado ovino (ovejas), su corral que se encuentra a unos minutos D. su casa, los cuales son amplios, los alimenta con comida balanceada y  pastos naturales para que sus animales lleguen a tener un crecimiento  ideal, para ofrecerlos en los diferentes mercados D. la zona y así obtenga muy buenas ganancias para solventar sus gastos familiares.   

Ha solicitado un préstamo a Edpyme Alternativa D. 800 nuevos soles para comprar D. alimento para engordar a sus animales y así venderlos a un mejor precio a sus clientes, con esos ingresos podrá pagar su crédito y mejorar su calidad D. vida.  Maria del Carmen es una persona muy dedicada a su trabajo que lo único que quiere es poder brindarle algunas comodidades a su familia y que logren sus metas.
texts.en:
Maria del Carmen is 33 years old, lives with her husband and children in a house they own, the house doesn't have basic services, it is located in the rural are of TambogranD., which belongs to the department of Piura, characterized by farming and craft activities.

For a few years Maria del Carmen has raised sheep, her barn is only a few minutes from her house where there is plenty of space for the sheep, she feeds them with grass and balanced feed to achieve an ideal growth rate and offer them to the different markets around the area and obtain good profits to cover family expenses.

She has requested a loan to Edpyme Alternative of 800 new soles to buy feed for her livestock and sell them at the best price possible, with the income she will repay her loan and improve her quality of life, Maria del Carmen is a dedicated person that only wants to proviD. some comfort to her family and help them achieve their goals.

loans.use: To buy feed for her livestock and fertilizer for her land

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to purchase construction materials for building a room.

loans.name: Luz Georgina

texts.es:
Luz D. 51 años D. edad, vive con su esposo e hijo en su casa propia, no cuenta con servicios básicos, ubicada en la zona rural del distrito D. TambogranD. que pertenece al departamento D. Piura.  Zona que se caracteriza por la actividad agrícola, ganadera y artesana.

Ella  cuenta con una bodega instalada en su domicilio desD. hace 5 años. Allí ofrece en venta a sus vecinos diversos productos D. consumo diario entre ellos productos D. primera necesidad y abarrotes, actualmente cuenta con una clientela fija y fidelizada.  Con las ganancias que obtenga por la venta D. sus productos  trata D. cubrir  todos sus gastos y mejorar el nivel D. vida D. su familia.

Para poder  implementar su negocio a solicitado un crédito a Edpyme Alternativa  D. 1000 nuevos soles para comprar mayor cantidad D. productos comestibles para comercializar en su negocio, con el único ideal D. que su negocio sea cada vez más granD. y tenga productos surtidos para ofrecerles a sus clientes.  Luz es una persona responsable y trabajadora que se preocupa por brindarles lo mejor a su familia y ayudarlos alcanzar sus metas a sus hijos.
texts.en:
Luz is 51 years old, lives with her husband and son in a house they own, the house doesn't count with basic services and is located in the rural district of TambogranD. that belongs to the department of Piura, characterized for farming and craft activites.

Five years ago Luz started selling basic needs products (milk, rice, oil, sugar, toilet paper, tuna, etc) and beverages, her business is located at home for convenience and security, with the profits she covers the family expenses and tries to improve her family's quality of life.

To stock her business she has requested a loan to Edpyme Alternativa of 1,000 new soles to buy merchandise with the wish that her business grows and has a variety of products for her clients.  Luz is a responsible and hardworking person that cares to proviD. for her family and help her children achieve their goals.

loans.use: Compra de mayor cantidad de productos comestibles para comercializar en su bodega.

loans.name: Anonymous Group
loans.use: to buy battery-powered lamps

loans.name: Progreso Group

texts.es:
La A.C. “PROGRESO” iniciará su primer ciclo en Pro Mujer, como parte del Centro Villa Tejada, está compuesta por ocho integrantes y está dirigida por una mesa directiva encabezada por la señora Lucia. Los negocios que las integrantes de la asociación comunal llevan adelante son variados entre ellos tenemos: Cria de animales, tienda de barrio y cultivo de verduras. 

La señora Lucia  indica que es el primer año que integra Pro Mujer  por invitación de la promoción y de sus vecinas. En la actualidad ella tiene un negocio crianza de ganado que aprendió de sus padres.

El crédito que ahora sacará es para la compra de forraje (alimento de los animales), que comprará de Achocalla y lo comercializa en después del faenado. Esta forma de trabajo le permite generar recursos para apoyar en lo posible a su familia, pues ella es casada y tiene y tiene tres hijos.  

Cuando se le consulta qué le gusta de Pro Mujer, ella responde que le gusta la atención en salud y los ahorros.
texts.en:
The civil association “Progress” begins its cycle at Pro-Women, as part of the Villa Tejada Centre, it's conformed by eight members and managed by a board of directors chaired by Lucia.  The businesses that the members of the community association have are varied, among some are: raise of livestock, neighborhood store and vegetable garden.

Lucia indicates that this is her first year at Pro-Mujer invited by them and her neighbors.  Currently she has a business to raise livestock that she learned to do from her parents.

She will use the loan to buy feed at Achocalla to raise her cattle and sell it after.  This business allows her to raise income to support her family; she is married and has three children.
When asked what she likes about Pro-Mujer, her answer is their attention to health and saving.

loans.use: to buy feed for livestock

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy raw materials like black leather, faux leather, fiber products, baking powder, white and yellow glue, shoe soles, high quality lining, thread, and packing bags.

loans.name: Yolanda Isabel

texts.es: La Señora Yolanda Isabel tiene 55 años. Ella está casada junto a su esposo Tienen 1 hijo mayor de edad. La actividad económica es venta de cosméticos. Hace más de 20 años que se dedica a este negocio. Por lo que inicio con productos como ropa interior entre otros con el paso del tiempo fue que Yolanda logro ampliarse, por lo que decide incursionar comprando más mercadería. El financiamiento que solicita es para capital de trabajo para la compra de lápiz labial, pintura de uñas, brillos, sombras, polvos, tratamientos, cremas, perfumes. El sueño de Yolanda es diversificar en sus productos.
texts.en: Yolanda Isabel is 55.  She is married and has a grown up son.  Her economic activity is the sale of cosmetics, she has done this for more than 20 years.  She started selling products such as lingerie, with time Yolanda was able to expand and decided to buy more merchandise.  The loan requested is for working capital to buy lipstick, nailpolish, gloss, eye-shadow, powder, face treatments, lotion and perfumes.  Yolanda's dream is to diversify the products.

loans.use: to buy lipstick, nailpolish, gloss, eye-shadow, powder, face treatments, lotion and perfumes

loans.name: Scarlette Isachara

texts.es: La señora Scarleth ella tiene 23 años. La señora se dedica a ofrecer productos en un kiosco. Que está ubicado en un colegio en donde la mayoría de sus clientes son los niños.  Ella dio inicio a este negocio hace 3 años, ella empezó a ofrecer ciertos productos pues no tenía mucho capital para comprar variedad de productos. Su financiamiento será invertido en la compra de sopas, golosinas, pan,  gaseosas, galletas, jugos y chocolates.
texts.en: Scarleth is 23, she sells products in a kiosk.  It is located in a school where most of her clients are kids.  She started this business three years ago, and only started with a few products because she didn't have a lot of capital to buy a variety of products.  Her loan will be invested in soup,  candy, bread, soda, cookies, juice and chocolates.

loans.use: to buy soup, candy, bread, soda, cookies, juice and chocolates.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to purchase construction materials for home improvements.

loans.name: G.s. Divino Niño Group

texts.es: El grupo Solidario Llamado Divino Niño 10 está conformado por  Dolores Rosa Emelina. A pesar de las diversas actividades económicas que ellas tienen como es venta de cosméticos y bolsas plásticas,  tienen  el mismo objetivo de salir adelante porque sus negocios les han propiciado los estudios necesarios a sus hijos. Dolores  tiene más de 22 años de trabajar en el negocio ya que la mayoría de sus clientes siempre le están solicitando una gran variedad de productos. El financiamiento que solicita es para la compra de ropa en general, ropa interior, entre otros.
texts.en: The solidarity group called "Divine Child 10" is conformed by  Dolores and Rosa Emelina.  They have economic activities such as cosmetics and plastic bags, they have the same goal of getting ahead because their businesses have enabled them to provide for their children´s studies.  Dolores has worked for more than 22 years in the business, as most of her clients ask for a variety of products, the loan requested is to buy all types of clothing, including lingerie.

loans.use: to buy all types of clothing, including lingerie

loans.name: G.s.sangre Cristo Group

texts.es: El Grupo Solidario Sangre De Cristo está conformado por Rosa y Hermenejilda. Rosa tiene 43 años, por lo que su actividad económica es la venta de frijoles y tortillas. Hace más de 16 años que se dedica a este negocio, ella ofrece estos productos de consumo diarios, Rosa tiene 4 hijos de 13, 11,4 y16 años ella se hace cargo de ellos, por lo que se preocupa por brindarles la oportunidad de estudiar. El financiamiento que solicitan es para capital de trabajo que será destinado para la compra de maíz, leña, frijoles, bolsas, entre otros. Sueña con incrementar su inventario para su negocio.
texts.en: The solidarity group "Blood of Christ" is conformed by Rosa and Hermenejilda.  Rosa is 43 and sells tortillas and beans.  She has done this for more than 16 years, she offers basic needs products.  Rosa has four children ages 13, 11, 4 and 16 she is responsible for them and thus she cares to provide them with the opportunity to study.  The loan requested is for working capital to buy corn wood, beans, bags and other products.

loans.use: to buy corn, wood, beans, bags and other products.

loans.name: Antonio Paredes Candia Group

texts.es:
La A.C. “ANTONIO PAREDES CANDIA” iniciará su décimo primer ciclo en Pro Mujer, como parte del centro focal Panamericana, está compuesta por ocho integrantes y está dirigida por una mesa directiva de la cual la señora Miguelina es la tesorera. Los negocios que las integrantes de la asociación comunal llevan adelante son variados entre ellos tenemos: artesanía en macramé, carpintería, tienda de barrio, repostería, costura, venta de mantas.

La señora Miguelina,  indica que hace mas de tres años que trabaja en Pro Mujer y que integro la institución por invitación de una promotora en la zona. En la actualidad ella tiene un negocio de artesanías en mantas que viene trabajando hace tres años atrás, aprendiendo el mismo de sus familias.

El préstamo que sacará es para aumentar su capital (compra de lana) que adquirirá de la ceja y posterior a la elaboración de lo entregará a domicilio. Esta forma de trabajo le permite generar recursos para apoyar a su familia, pues ella vive en unión libre y tiene dos hijos.  

Cuando se le consulta qué le gusta de Pro Mujer, ella responde que le gusta la reunión y el consultorio.

En la fotografía no se encuentra la señora Agustina, ya que se encuentra en consultorio.
texts.en:
The A.C. “ANTONIO PAREDES CANDIA” will begin its 11th loan cycle in Pro Mujer as part of its focus on Panamerica. It is made up of 8 members and is governed by a board of which Señora Miguelina is the treasurer. The businesses the communal bank members are involved in are varied and consist of macrame, carpentry, grocery store, bakery, sewing, selling blankets among others.

Señora Miguelina says that she has been working in Pro Mujer for more than 3 years. She was invited to join the communal bank by a demo lady in the area. Currently, she has a crafts shop selling blankets, a craft she learned from her relatives. She has been running the shop for the last 3 years. 

The loan she is taking is to increase her working capital to buy wool which she will acquire in La Ceja and then post production take home.

This work flow allows her to generate resources to support her family as she is in a common-law marriage and has 2 children.

When asked what she likes about Pro Mujer, she says that she likes the meetings and the training.

The photograph does not include Señora Agustina as she is in a consultation.

loans.use: to buy wool.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: To buy basic grains, sweets, detergents, matches, soups, toilet tissue, etc.

loans.name: El Trebol Magico Group

texts.es: El grupo se llama "EL TREBOL MAGICO" debido a que se tiene la creencia de que el trebol de cuatro hojas da buena fortuna. El grupo esta ubicado en el estado de Hidalgo en Mexico. El grupo esta conformado por 12 integrantes. La señora Ana es una las mujeres emprendedoras que integran el grupo. Ella tiene 26 años de edad, estudio hasta la secundaria, esta casada y tiene un hijo de 3 años de edad. Ella es comerciate, tiene una polleria que abrio hace 2 años y desde la fecha sus clientes han ido en aumento por lo cual solicita el prestamo para comprar pollo fresco y así seguir invirtiendo en su negocio y asi poder cubrir la creciente demanda de su polleria. La señora esta muy contenta con su negocio ya que los ingreos que obtiene son un importante aporte para la economia de su hogar, ella comenta que gracias a su trabajo ha podido comprar mas muebles para su hogar, pero sobre todo puede brindarle un mejor futuro a su hijo.
texts.en: The communal bank is called "EL TREBOL MAGICO" (The Magic Clover) because it is believed that a four-leaf clover brings good luck.  The goup is located in Hidalgo, México and is comprised of 12 members.  Mrs. Ana is one of the entrepreneurs in the group.  She is 26 years old and has a secondary level of education.  She is married and has a 3-year-old son.  She earns her living through the chicken shop she opened two years ago.  Since then her customer base has been increasing gradually, so much so that now she is requesting a loan to buy fresh chicken and continue investing in the business.  This will allow her to meet the growing demand.  She is happy with the business since the income she gets from it is an important part of the household economy.  Thanks to her work she has been able to buy more furniture for the home and give her son a better future.

loans.use: To buy fresh chicken.

loans.name: Cristian Karolina

texts.es: Cristian Karolina comenzó su negocio hace unos 12 años, vendiendo artesanías,  empezó por su mama quien le enseño este medio de vida ya que ella era quien se hacía anteriormente cargo del negocio, actualmente Cristian tiene una mayor clientela. Tiene 2 hijos menores de edad a su cargo, ella tiene que levantarse temprano para empezar su trabajo y además preparar a su hijos para el colegio. El motivo del crédito es para la compra de llaveros, agendas, camisetas, jarrones, aretes, billeteras, gorras, pulsera y adornos nicaragüenses.
texts.en: Cristian Karolina started her business selling crafts 12 years ago.  Her mother was the one who taught her the trade and ran the business previously.  Now Cristian has a larger customer base.  She has two minor children in her care and has to get up very early to begin business and help her children get ready for school.  The loan will be used to buy Nicaraguan keychains, agendas, t-shirts, jars, earrings, billfolds, hats, bracelets and accessories.

loans.use: To buy Nicaraguan keychains, agendas, t-shirts, jars, earrings, billfolds, hats, bracelets and accessories.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: To buy large-size trousers, dresses, skirts, shirts and blouses.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy construction materials for home improvements.

loans.name: Milagros Elizabeth

texts.es:
Milagros de 23 años de edad, es soltera, vive en casa de sus padres, no cuenta con los servicios básicos, ubicada en la zona rural del distrito de Mochumí que pertenece al departamento de Lambayeque.  Esta zona se caracteriza por la actividad agrícola y ganadera.

Desde hace unos años Milagros se ha dedicado a la venta de abarrotes (leche, arroz, aceite, azúcar, papel higiénico, atún, huevos), frutas y bebidas, su negocio lo ha colocado en casa para su  seguridad, ya que puede atender a la hora que desea, con las ganancias por la venta de sus productos  trata de cubrir  todos sus gastos y necesidades de su hogar.

Para poder  implementar su negocio a solicitado un crédito a Edpyme Alternativa  de 2500 nuevos soles para comprar más mercadería para abastecer su negocio, con el único objetivo de que su negocio crezca y tenga más productos que ofrecerles a sus clientes;  para cubrir su préstamo y sus obligaciones familiares.  Milagros es una mujer responsable y dedicada que se preocupa por tener más cosas que ofrecerle a su familia al igual que tener mejoras económicas.
texts.en:
Milagros is 23, single and lives with her parents in a house with no basic utilities wich is located in the rural area of the Mochumí District in the Lambayeque Department.  The area is known for its agriculture and livestock farming activity.

For several years Milagros has been selling groceries (milk, rice, oil, sugar, toilet tissue, tuna and eggs), fruit and beverages.  Her store is set up in her home for security reasons and so that she can attend to it at any time of day.  The income she receives from product sales goes toward household expenses and necessities.

She has requested a loan in the amount of 2,500 PEN through Edpyme Alternative to invest in her business and buy more merchandise for the store.  Her goal is to expand and have more products to offer to customers.  She also wants to attend to family obligations and pay back the loan.  Milagros is a responsible, dedicated woman to is concered about providing for her family and improving her economy.

loans.use: To buy merchandise for her store.

loans.name: G.s. Los Triunfadores Group

texts.es: El señor Pablo José es casado, su esposa trabaja como tortillera elaborando el producto desde su casa de habitación, tienen 4 hijos, dos de los cuales se encuentran estudiando en secundaria. El señor se dedica a la crianza de pollos de engorde. Gracias a Dios ha logrado mantener el negocio a flote, su mayor obstáculo es que ahora los precios de los concentrados han incrementado reduciendo de esta manera los márgenes de ganancia. El préstamo lo solicita en la compra de aves y comida de engorde para las mismas.  Félix Pedro tiene 62 años. Su negocio es la elaboración de pan, la cual ha tenido muy buena producción y las ventas se han incrementado considerablemente con ayuda de los préstamos. Su mayor obstáculo siempre ha sido que necesita más capital para hacer aun más grande el negocio, sin embargo aduce estar contento con lo que tiene. El préstamo será invertido en la compra de huevos, mantequilla, harina, leche y queso.
texts.en:
Mr. Pablo José is married. His wife is a tortilla maker, preparing the product from their house. They have four children, two of whom are studying in school. Pablo raises broiler chickens. He has managed to keep the business afloat, despite his biggest obstacle being the increase in the price of chicken feed, which has reduced his profit margins. The loan requested will be used to purchase birds and feed for them. 

Félix Pedro is 62 years old. His business is making bread, the production of which has been very good and sales have increased considerably with the help of loans. Félix's greatest obstacle has always been the need for more capital to be able to grow his business, however he says that he is happy with what he has. His part of the loan will be invested in the purchase of eggs, butter, flour, milk and cheese.

loans.use: to purchase chickens, and chicken feed for fattening them

loans.name: Jose Santos

texts.es:
José de 45 años de edad, vive con su esposa e hijos en su casa propia, la cual no cuenta con servicios básicos, ubicado en la zona rural del distrito de Pimentel que pertenece a la provincia de Chiclayo. Zona que se caracteriza por la actividad agrícola, pesca y turismo.

La actividad que desarrolla José es la agricultura, cuenta con sus propias tierras de cultivo donde siembra camote, productos que se comercializan diariamente, una vez que realiza su cosecha su producto los ofrece a los diferentes mercados de Chiclayo y así puede obtener ingresos para cubrir sus gastos diarios de su familia.  

Ha solicitado un préstamo a Edpyme Alternativa de 1500 nuevos soles para comprar fertilizantes para mejorar sus tierras como su producto, una vez que se engorden los vende a los diferentes mercados de su zona, con la finalidad de que obtenga un mejor precio por ellos y así pueda tener más ingresos mejorando su calidad de vida.  José es una persona trabajadora y muy responsable que lo único que quiere es que su familia salga adelante y se supere.
texts.en:
José is 45 years old and lives with his wife and children in his own home which doesn't have basic services.  His home is located in the rural part of Pimentel district, in Chiclayo province.  This area is noted for its farming, fishing and tourism.

José works in agriculture.  He owns his own farmland where he grows sweet potatoes that he sells daily.  Once he harvests his produce, he sells it in the different markets in Chiclayo which enables him to make income with which to cover his family's daily expenses.

José has requested a loan for 1,500 soles from Edpyme Alternativa to buy fertilizers so that he can improve his land and his crops.  Once his crops have grown, he sells them in the different markets in his area with the goal of earning the best price he can for them so that he can make more income and improve his quality of life.  José is a hard-working and very responsible person.  The only thing he wants is for his family to get ahead in life and do well.

loans.use: to buy fertilizers to improve his land and his crops

loans.name: Lourdes Roxana

texts.es:
Lourdes de 27 años, es soltera, vive en casa de sus padres, cuenta con servicio de luz solamente, ubicada en el distrito de Tambogrande, que pertenece al departamento de Piura.  Zona que se caracteriza por la actividad agrícola, ganadera y artesanía.

Lourdes se dedica a la venta de ropa, negocio que a colocado en el mercado de esa zona desde hace unos años, su mercadería que ofrece a sus clientes es novedosa , también trae a pedido, tratando de tener mayor demanda de clientes y así pueda obtener más ingresos para solventar sus gastos personales.

Al observar que su negocio cada día es más próspero a creído necesario solicitar un préstamo a Edpyme Alternativa de 1500 nuevos soles para comprar mayor cantidad de mercadería y abastecer su tienda con productos innovadores, con la finalidad que su clientela siga aumentando para poder pagar su crédito y mejorar su calidad de vida.
texts.en:
27-year-old Lourdes is single and lives in her parents' home which only has electricity.  The house is located in Tambogrande district, in Piura department.  This area is noted for its farming, livestock raising and handicrafts.

Lourdes sells clothes.  She set up her business in the local market some years ago.  The merchandise that she offers her customers is the very latest.  She also fills orders, trying to gain more customers and thereby more income with which to cover her personal expenses.

Noting that her business was growing and becoming more prosperous, Lourdes decided to request a loan for 1,500 soles from Edpyme Alternativa so that she could buy a larger quantity of merchandise and stock her store with the very latest products.  Her goal is to continue increasing her number of customers so that she can repay her loan and improve her quality of life.

loans.use: to buy a larger quantity of merchandise to stock her business

loans.name: Jacinta De Los Angeles

texts.es: Jacinta De Los Ángeles tiene 34 años y tiene 2 hijos menores de edad. La señora tiene en su casa un negocio de pulpería, ella vende granos básicos, golosinas, detergentes, fósforos, cigarrillo, pan, y leche. Ella ya tiene 7 años de tener este negocio, el cual empezó debido al no tener ingreso para mantener su hogar, esto con el objetivo de brindar manutención a sus hijos.
