Janina de profesion reponsable de importaciones en una empresa privada, lleva tres años laborando, en donde logra apoyar a sus padres, ya que vive con ellos aun. Es soltera y tiene previsto tomar un curso de ingles.
Su objetivo ha sido, un mejor techo para sus padres, en donde opta al financiamiento, para lograr hacer el cuarto propio de ella, que aun no termima, pero le es de gran relevancia, poner techo en la parte de atrás, como un bajarete y embaldozar, ya que el agua se le mete para adentro de la casa, y desean mejorar esa condicion. Lo que comprara materiales de construccion, laminas de zinc, perlines, golosos, cemento, hierro y comenzar la obra, siendo este medio el mas viable. Ya que distribuye sus gastos, y mantener el apoyo a sus padres. Mientra forma su propio hogar.
texts.en:
Janina is in charge of imports for a private company.  She has been working there for three years, and manages to support her parents, as she still lives with them.  She is single, and plans to take a course in English.  

Her goal has been to have a better roof for her parents, and she opted for a loan to build her own room, which is still not finished.  But it is also really important for her to put a roof on the area behind the house. This will consist of a covered porch and tiled area.  This is because water is getting into the house, and they want to deal with that situation. 

She will buy construction materials such as zinc sheeting, purlins( structural roof members), sheet metal screws, cement, and iron, then start construction. This is the most viable approach, as she is spreading out her costs, and continuing to support her parents.  In the process, she is completing her own home.

loans.use: To buy construction materials to build a covered porch and tile the area behind her house.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to purchase more chocolate and corn to continue making candies and tamales

loans.name: Zurab

texts.en:
Zurab, from Vale, South Georgia, is 45 years old, married and lives with his wife Manana, his 6-year-old daughter and his retired parents. The sole income provider of the family, Zurab grows potatoes and cabbage on a family-owned 0.75 hectare plot of land, selling 8 tones of potatoes and 17 tones of cabbage per year to local greengrocery retailers. Total average family monthly income is 900 Laris, including Zurab’s parents' pensions.

Zurab has requested a loan to diversify his agricultural business. He plans to purchase six or seven calves to raise, and will sell them in the spring for a profit. Food for the calves will cost nothing, as he will mow the grass and make hay. The profits from this new enterprise will improve the family's living conditions.

loans.use: to purchase calves.

loans.name: La Paix De Godomey Group

texts.fr: Le groupe LA PAIX DE GODOMEY est formé de quinze personnes qui habitent dans le même quartier et qui se réunissent un fois par semaine. La représentante de ce groupe, nommée Olympiade est celle dont la main est levée sur la photo. C’est la première fois que ce groupe sollicite l’appui financier de ALIDé en vue d’élever le niveau de leur activité. Olympiade est âgée de 31 ans et est mariée à un peintre du nom de Félix. Le couple a un enfant qui est scolarisé et à leur charge. Olympiade vit ensemble avec son mari et son enfant. Le couple assure ensemble les diverses charges familiales. Il y a près de deux ans, Olympiade mène comme activité la vente d'ustensiles de cuisine et des tissus à son domicile et par le système de distribution. De façon secondaire, Olympiade vend du charbon de bois à son domicile. Olympiade s’approvisionne au Bénin. Dans le but de renforcer son activité et de mieux répondre à la demande de sa clientèle, Olympiade désire obtenir un financement, ensemble avec les autres membres de groupe LA PAIX DE GODOMEY. Ce crédit leur servira certainement à augmenter leurs stocks de produits.
texts.en:
Group 'La Paix de Godomey' is composed of fifteen people who reside in the same district and who meet once a week. The group's representative, named Olympiade, is raising her hand in the picture. This is the first time that this group is requesting ALIDé's financial support in order to grow their business.
Olympiade is 31 years old and is married to a painter named Félix. The couple has one child, who attends school and is in their care. Olympiade lives together with her husband and her child. The couple provides for their family's various needs together.
For about two years, Olympiade has been retailing cooking utensils and fabrics from her home and through the distribution system. As a side business, Olympiade sells charcoal from her home. She gets her supplies from Benin.
In order to strengthen her business and to better satisfy her customers, Olympiade would like to be granted a loan together with the other members of group 'La Paix de Godomey.' This loan will definitely be used to increase their merchandise stores.

loans.use: to buy cooking utensils and charcoal.

loans.name: Lavrenti

texts.en:
Lavrenti, a farmer from the village of Damala, South Georgia, is 60 years old, married and lives with his wife Anya, 29-year-old son, his daughter-in-law and 5-year-old granddaughter.

Lavrenti, who heads the family's agricultural business, owns a dairy/scot breeding farm with three milk cows and four calves. Anya produces cheese and sells an average of 60 kilograms per month at the Akhaltsikhe open market. Lavrenti also grows potatoes and onions on the family-owned 1-hectare plot of land. Harvested vegetables are sold at Akhaltsikhe's open market.

Lavrenti has requested a loan to expand the scot-breeding farm. He will purchase two calves to raise, selling them in December when they are grown and command a good price. This purchase will improve the financial situation of the family. Additional income will be used to purchase new household goods so as to make their house more comfortable and improve their living conditions.

loans.use: to purchase calves for scot-breeding farm expansion.

loans.name: Martha Elena

texts.es:
Martha D. 48 años D. edad, vive con su esposa e hijos ensu casa propia, cuenta con todos los servicios básicos, ubicada en la zona urbana del distrito D. Ferreñafe que pertenece a la provincia D. Chiclayo.  Esta zona tiene como actividad la agricultura, ganadería y turismo.

Martha se dedica a la comercialización D. golosinas, gaseosas, yogurt, embutidos y otros, su negocio lo tiene en un puesto en el interior del mercado D. ferreñafe donD. está desD. hace un año, cuenta con su propia clientela, realiza ventas al por mayor y menor, con los ingresos que obtenga podrá solventar todas sus necesidades diarias D. su familia.

Ha solicitado un préstamo a Edpyme Alternativa D. 1000 nuevos soles para la compra D. mayor cantidad D. mercadería para seguir ofreciendolo a sus clientes y con sus ganancias cubrir su crédito y mejorar su nivel D. vida.  Martha es una persona trabajadora y empeñosa que desea que su familia se supere cada día más y pueda lograr sus metas.
texts.en:
Martha is 48 years old. She lives with her spouse and children in their own house, which has all of the basic services. it is located in the urban zone of the district of Ferreñafe, which belongs to Chiclayo province. The main activities in this area are agriculture, ranching and tourism.

Martha works selling snacks, soft drinks, yogurt, sausages and other items. She runs her business from a stand insiD. the Ferreñafe market. It has been located there for one year. She has her own customers, and she sells both wholesale and retail. With the income she obtains, she will be able to cover all of her family's daily needs. 

She has requested a loan from Edpyme Alternativa for 1000 Peruvian new soles, to buy a larger quantity of merchandise so she can continue offering it to her customers. With her earnings, she will pay off her loan and improve her standard of living. Martha is a hard-working and dedicated person who wants to achieve her goals and see her family get ahead day by day.

loans.use: to buy more merchandise for her business.

loans.name: Yuri

texts.en:
Yuri is from the village Kharjami, South Georgia. He is 49 years old, married and lives with his family: wife - Manana, 25-year-old son, daughter-in-law and mother (retired). 

The main source of income for the family is agriculture. In particular, they have a dairy farm with 8 milk cows. The family members produce and sell, on average, 150 kg of cheese locally. They have a lot of experience in cheese production and their cheese is of a high quality. Also, Yuri grows potatoes, haricots and onions on a family-owned plot of land. Vegetables are sold locally to the greengrocery wholesalers. Total average income of the family is 650 GEL per month, including the pension of Yuri’s mother. 

Yuri requested credit to purchase hay for feeding the cows during the winter period. Also, approximately 30% of the credit will be used for expansion of the cattle shed. In the near future, Yuri plans to increase the amount of cows on the farm, but the existing cattle shed doesn’t allow him to keep more than 8 cows. After expansion of the cattle shed he will be able to realize his business idea, which will be followed by the increase of the family income, as well as improving their living conditions.

loans.use: to purchase feed for cows and construction materials for expansion of the cattle shed

loans.name: Maximo

texts.es: Maximo, tiene la edad 65 de años, está casado y vive con su señora esposa que es su prioridad. El pretende con el crédito comprar insumos para la asistencia de almacigo. El cuenta con el almacigo ya sembrado y necesita asistirlo para así obtener de el un muy buen resultado en calidad para satisfacer a sus compradores. El quiere generar las mayores ganancias y así poderle ofrecer a su señora esposa un mejor futuro mejor y mejorar su bienestar familiar.  Es el primer  préstamo que  recibido de FUDECOSUR. El  no había tenido antes otros préstamos en bancos estatales, pero FUDECOSUR le ha brindado el préstamo con mayores facilidades y la tasa de intereses mucho más baja.
texts.en:
Maximo is 65 years old, married, and lives with his wife, who is his priority. He intends with the loan to purchase supplies for tending to a seedbed. He has the seedbed already planted and needs to tend to it so that he may get very good results from it, in order to satisfy his buyers. He wants to generate greater earnings and thus be able to offer to his esteemed wife a better future, and improve the family's well-being. 

This is his first loan received from Fudecosur. He had not had other loans previously at state banks, but Fudecosur has provided him the loan with greater ease and at a much lower interest rate.

loans.use: to purchase supplies for tending to a seedbed.

loans.name: Zurab

texts.en:
Zurab is a 43-year-old farmer from the village Klde, South Georgia. He is married and lives with his wife Mariam. The income source of the family is agriculture. In particular, they have milk cows, produce cheese and sell it on the local market. Also, Zurab and Mariam grow potatoes and maize on the plot. Harvested potatoes and maize are sold in Akhaltsikhe (nearby town) open market. Along with the above mentioned, Zurab often purchases calves, grows them and after couple of months sells them for a higher price. Total average monthly income of the family is 650 GEL. 

Zurab requested credit to purchase 4 calves. He will sell grown calves by December for a higher price. Zurab plans to reinvest the profit in the same business – purchase more calves. This loan will help the family to expand their agricultural business and increase the profit. It will have a positive impact on family living conditions.

loans.use: to purchase 4 calves for farm expansion

loans.name: Ruslan

texts.en:
Ruslan is 34 years old. He is from the village Ganakhleba, Adjara region. Ruslan is married and lives with his family: wife – Nino, two sons (1 year old each) and parents. Ruslan works in the local marble factory. Along with his main job, he is involved in the family agricultural business. They have a milk cow and sell milk locally. At the same time the family members grow various types of fruits and vegetables and sell them to local greengrocery retailers. Total average monthly income of the family is 1,250 GEL. 

Ruslan requested credit for expansion of the dairy farm. He will purchase an additional milk cow and double the amount of the sold milk. The family will have more income and will be able to provide better care for their children, as well as improve the overall living conditions of the family.

loans.use: to purchase a milk cow

loans.name: Pedro

texts.es:
Pedro de 46 años de edad, vive con su familia en su casa propia, no cuenta con los servicios básicos, ubicada en la zona rural del distrito de Mochumi que pertenece al departamento de Lambayeque.  Esta zona se caracteriza por la actividad agrícola y ganadería.

Pedro desde hace algunos años se dedica a la crianza y venta de ganado caprino (cabras), su corral se encuentra en la parte posterior de su casa, los cuales son apropiados y amplios, los alimenta con comida balanceada y pastos naturales para que sus animales lleguen a tener un crecimiento óptimo para ofrecerlos en los diferentes mercados de la zona y así obtenga muy buenas ganancias para solventar sus gastos diarios de su hogar.  

Ha solicitado un préstamo a Edpyme Alternativa de 2500 nuevos soles para comprar alimento balanceado para sus animales y realizar arreglos en la cocina de su casa, con los ingresos que adquiera por la venta de sus cabras puede cubrir su crédito y mejorar la calidad de vida de su familia.  Pedro es una persona trabajadora y muy responsable que lo único que quiere es que su familia se supere y  mejore económicamente para contar con  otras comodidades.
texts.en:
Pedro, 46, lives with his family in his own home, which does not have basic services, located in the rural area of Mochumi district belonging to the department of Lambayeque. This area is characterized by crop and livestock farming. 

Pedro has for a number of years devoted himself to caring for and selling goats. His pens are located to the rear of his house and are appropriate and spacious. He feeds them with a commercially prepared feed and natural grasses, so that his animals may reach optimal growth in order to offer them at the various markets in the area and thus obtain much better earnings to cover daily living costs in his home. 

He has sought a loan from Edpyme Alternativa in the amount of 2,500 Peruvian soles to purchase commercial feed for his animals and make repairs to the kitchen in his home. With the income he will receive from the sale of his goals he can cover the loan and improve the quality of life of his family. Pedro is a hardworking and very responsible person. His sole wish is that his family would improve itself economically in order to avail themselves of additional comforts.

loans.use: to purchase feed for his animals and make repairs to his kitchen.

loans.name: Oleveira

texts.es:
Oliveira tiene 44 años D. edad, vive con su familia en su casa propia, cuenta con sólo servicio D. luz, ubicada en la zona rural del distrito D. TambogranD. que pertenece al departamento D. Piura.  Esta zona la actividad que desarrollan es la agricultura, ganadería y artesanía.

Oliveira desD. hace algunos años se dedica a la crianza y venta D. ganado vacuno (vaca), su corral se encuentra en la parte externa D. su casa, los alimenta con comida balanceada y pastos naturales para que tenga una buena producción D. leche, la que ofrece a los mismos pobladores D. la zona o lo lleva a vender al mercado D. TambogranD., cuenta con clientela fija por la buena calidad D. leche que tiene, con sus ingresos solventa sus obligaciones familiares.  

Ha solicitado un préstamo a Edpyme Alternativa D. 2000 nuevos soles para comprar más ganado vacuno lechero para que se incremente la producción D. leche y así podrá ofrecerlo aun mejor precio para poder cubrir su crédito otorgado y mejorar la calidad D. vida D. su familia.  Oliveira es una persona trabajadora y dedicada que lo único que quiere es que su negocio se amplie para que sus hijos tengan otras oportunidades D. estudios.
texts.en:
Oleveira is 44 years old, living with her family in her own house. Her home is only equipped with electricity and it is located in the rural zone of the TambogranD. district, which belongs to the department of Piura. In this area, the main activities are agriculture, animal husbandry, and craftwork.

Oleveira has worked in raising and selling cattle (cows) for several years. Her corral is located outsiD. her house. She feeds her cattle with balanced feed and natural fodder to have good milk production. She sells the milk to the other residents of the area or carries it to the TambogranD. market to sell. She has steady customers due to the high quality of her product. With her earnings, she’s able to settle her family’s obligations.

She has requested a loan of 2000 Nuevos Soles from Edpyme Alternativa to buy more milk cows for increasing milk production to offer even better prices. In this way, she will be able to repay the loan and improve her family’s quality of life. Oleveira is a hard-working and dedicated person, who wants to see her business expand so that her children will have other education opportunities.

loans.use: to buy more cattle.

loans.name: Ana Ydalia

texts.es:
Ana, vive con su esposo y una hija de 5 años de edad, se dedica a la sastrería y administra una pequeña tienda, este oficio nació hace varios años y ha ganado muchos clientes por su buen servicio.
Ella solicita un préstamo para la compra de azúcar, arroz, aceite, para la tienda y ciper, hilos para la sastrería, esta compra le ayudara para fortalecer el negocio ya que sus ingresos dependen de las ganancias que recibe del negocio.
El sueño de ella es algún día tener  su propia casa, con el esfuerzo en el negocio espera poder realzarlo.
texts.en:
Ana lives with her husband and a five-year-old daughter. She devotes herself to tailoring and manages a small store. This line of work came into being several years ago and she has gained many customers through her good service. 

She is seeking a loan for the purchase of sugar, rice and oil for the store, and zippers and thread for the tailoring business. This purchase will help her build up the business since her income depends on the earnings she receives from the business. 

Her dream is that some day she would have her own home. With her efforts in business, she hopes be able to make it reality.

loans.use: to purchase sugar, rice, oil, zippers and thread.

loans.name: Anonymous Group
loans.use: To hire an excavator.

loans.name: Maria Elena

texts.es:
María, administra una tienda, vive con su esposo y una hija de 18 años de edad, en la tienda ofrece productos de la canasta básica, lleva 6 años de existir y está ubicada en el mercado municipal donde atiende de 7:00am a 4:00pm.
Por el momento necesita la compra de mercadería a través de un préstamo, ya que quiere surtir el negocio con aceite, azúcar, leche, harina, gaseosas, con esta inversión lograra el objetivo de tener para los clientes todo lo relacionado al hogar, satisfaciendo así la demanda.
El sueño de María es que el negocio sea rentable, que aumenten las ganancias para poder tener una vida más confortable.
texts.en:
Maria lives with her spouse and an 18-year-old daughter. She runs a shop where she sells typical pantry items; it has been around for six years, and is located in the local market where it is open from 7AM to 4PM. 

At the moment Maria needs to buy merchandise by means of a loan, as she wants to supply her business with oil, sugar, milk, flour, and soft drinks. With this investment she will be able to offer her clients everything related to the home - which is her goal - and satisfy the demand. 

Maria's dream is for the business to be profitable and her earnings to increase, so that she can have a more comfortable life.

loans.use: to buy merchandise, such as oil, sugar, milk, flour, and soda, for her business.

loans.name: Jose Santiago

texts.es:
José de 45 años de edad, vive con su esposa e hijos en su casa propia, no cuenta con los servicios básicos, ubicada en la zona rural del distrito de Tambogrande, la cual pertenece al departamento de Piura.  Esta zona se caracteriza por la actividad agrícola, ganadería  y artesanía.

José desde hace varios años se dedica a la crianza y venta de ganado ovino (ovejas), su corral que se encuentra a unos minutos de su casa, los cuales son amplios, los alimenta con comida balanceada y  pastos naturales para que sus animales lleguen a tener un crecimiento  ideal, para ofrecerlos en los diferentes mercados de la zona y así obtenga muy buenas ganancias para solventar sus gastos familiares.   También cuenta con tierras de cultivo donde siembra limón y mango, una vez que cosecha lo comercializa teniendo otro ingreso para su casa.

Ha solicitado un préstamo a Edpyme Alternativa de 1500 nuevos soles para comprar de alimento para engordar a sus animales y fertilizante para mejorar sus tierras, al igual que su producto y así venderlos a un mejor precio a sus clientes, con esos ingresos podrá pagar su crédito y mejorar su calidad de vida.  José es una persona muy dedicada a su trabajo que lo único que quiere es poder brindarle algunas comodidades a su familia y que logren lo que se han propuesto en la vida.
texts.en:
José, 45, lives with his wife and children in his own house. He does not have basic services and is located in a rural area in the district of Tambogrande, which is in the department of Piura. This area is characterized by agriculture, cattle-raising and handicrafts.

Jose has been raising and selling sheep for several years. His corral is a few minutes from his house. His sheep are comfortable. He provides feed and natural pastures so they reach an ideal size and he can sell them in different markets in the area and obtain a very good profit to pay for his family expenses. He also has land planted in lemons and mangos that, once harvested, he sells to earn more income for his household.

He has requested a loan of 1,500 nuevos soles from Edpyme Alternativa to buy feed to fatten his animals and fertilizer to improve his land so that his products sell for a better price to his customers. With these profits he will be able to repay his loan and improve his quality of life. José is a person who is very dedicated to his work. The only thing he wants is to be able to provide some comforts to his family and to help them succeed in life

loans.use: to buy feed for his animals and fertilizer to improve his land.

loans.name: Elsa Mabel

texts.es:
Elsa Mabel de 48 años de edad, vive con su familia en su casa propia, cuenta con servicio de aua y luz, ubicada en la zona urbana del distrito de Guadalupe que pertenece al departamento de La Libertad.    Esta zona se caracteriza por la actividad agrícola, gandera y turismo.

Elsa Mabel la actividad que realiza es el alquiler de cabinas de internet, negocio que lo ha colocado en su mismo domicilio por seguridad de sus bienes, con una experiencia de 3 años, su mayor clientelas son  escolares que acuden en busca de información para realizar sus tareas como para jugar y con los ingresos que obtengan podrá solventar sus gastos familiares.

Ha solicitado un préstamo a Edpyme Alternativa de 1000 nuevos soles para la compra de tarjetas de videos para que jueguen los niños y brindar mantenimiento a sus máquinas, para seguir brindando un buen servicio como hasta el momento, con la intensión de atraer más clientes; lo que le permitirá pagar su crédito otorgado y mejorar su nivel de vida.  Elsa Mabel es una mujer trabajadora que con mucho esfuerzo a llegado a adquirir sus cosas para seguir sacando a su familia adelante.
texts.en:
Elsa Mabel, 48, lives with her family in their own house that has water and electricity.  It is located in the Guadalupe district, La Libertad department.  This is an agricultural, cattle-raising and tourism area.

Elsa Mabel has an internet cafe.  She has had experience in the business for 3 years and for the safety of the equipment, she has installed the business in her own house.  Her main customers are students who are doing their homework or for games, and she uses the earnings to cover family expenses.

She has requested a loan from Edpyme Alternative of 100 new sols to buy video cards so that the  children can play, and for equipment maintenance.  She wants to be able to continue offering good service as she does now, so that she attract more customers.  This will allow her to pay off the financing and improve their standard of living.

Elsa Mabel is a hard-working woman and with great effort has succeeded in getting her family ahead.

loans.use: to buy video cards and to cover maintenance of her computers

loans.name: Maria Leonor

texts.es:
María es una madre de familia de 47 años de edad, vive con su familia en su casa propia, cuenta con servicio de agua y luz, ubicada en el distrito de Guadalaupe que pertenece al departamento de la Libertad.  Esta zona se caracteriza por ser agrícola, ganadería y turismo.

María tiene como actividad laboral la confección y venta de prendas de vestir, desde hace varios años, su negocio lo tiene en su domicilio, cuenta con su propia clientela y también realiza trabajos a pedidos, la competencia en el rubro no es mucha, con los ingresos que obtenga podrá cubrir sus necesidades diarias de su casa.

Ha solicitado un préstamo a Edpyme Alternativa mediante Capital Semilla de 800 para comprar material y dar mantenimiento a su máquina,  así pueda seguir brindando un buen servicio y cumpliendo con los pedidos que le han hecho, lo que le permitirá tener más ganancias para mejorar su calidad de vida.  María con mucho esfuerzo y trabajo a sabido sacar su negocio adelante y a superarse en la vida junto con su familia.
texts.en:
María is a 47-year-old mother.  She lives with her family in her own house, with water and electricity, in the Guadalupe district in the department of La Libertad.  This area is known for agriculture, livestock, and tourism.

María's work is making and selling clothes.  For several years she has had her business in her home.  She has her own clientele and also takes orders.  There is not much competition in this line of work.  With her earnings she will be able to cover her daily household expenses. 

She has requested a loan of 800 PEN from Edpyme Alternativa's "Seed Capital" program to buy supplies and to do maintenance on her machine.  In this way she can continue offering a good service and fulfilling the orders she has received, which will allow her to have more profit to improve her quality of life.  With much effort and work, María has been able to nurture her business and improve herself and her family.

loans.use: to buy supplies (fabric and thread) and to do maintenance on her sewing machines.

loans.name: Isabel

texts.es:
Isabel de 33 años es madre de familia, vive con su hijo en casa propia, cuenta con servicio de luz solamente, ubicada en el distrito de Mórrope que pertenece al departamento de Lambayeque.   Zona que se caracteriza por la actividad agrícola, ganadera y turismo.

Isabel se dedica a la venta de ropa, accesorios y algunos productos de uso doméstico negocio que a colocado en su domicilio desde hace unos 3 años, su mercadería lo ofrece a sus clientes, también trae a pedido, tratando de tener mayor demanda de clientes y así pueda obtener más ingresos para solventar sus gastos familiares.

Al observar que su negocio cada día es más próspero a creído necesario solicitar un préstamo a Edpyme Alternativa de 2000 nuevos soles para comprar mayor cantidad de mercaderia y abastecer su tienda con productos innovadores, con la finalidad que su clientela siga aumentando para poder pagar su crédito y mejorar la calidad de vida de su familia.
texts.en:
33-year-old Isabel is a mother, and she lives with her son in their own home. Their house has electricity for light only, and is located in the district of Mórrope in the administrative division of Lambayeque. This area is characterized by farming, ranching and tourism.

Isabel sells clothing, accessories and some household products. For around three years, she has been conducting her business from her home. She offers the merchandise to customers from her store, and also delivers orders. Isabel is trying to increase the demand from her customers so she can earn a higher income to meet her family expenses.

As Isabel's business is becoming increasingly prosperous, it has become necessary to request a loan from Edpyme Alternativa in the amount of 2000 nuevos soles. The loan will be used to buy more merchandise and stock her store with innovative products, so that her client base continues to grow and she can repay her loan and improve the quality of life for her family.

loans.use: to purchase merchandise to offer to her clients

loans.name: Uprising Group

texts.en:
Siphati is 31 years old, married and has two children, aged 2 and 11. One is going to school. She also looks after four dependents. 

Siphati has been involved in irrigation farming for three years and she produces fruits and vegetables for sale. The challenges she faces include the expensive water bills and lack of working capital. 

Sithati has requested USD 400 to buy a hose, fence and fertilizers. With the extra income gained from the loan, she will be able to pay school fees for her child and buy food for the dependents that she is taking care of. 

In future, Siphati wants to buy a farm and employ farm workers.

loans.use: To buy hose, fence and fertilizers.

loans.name: Zoila

texts.es:
Zoila de 46 años de edad, vive con su familia en su casa propia, cuenta con servicio sólo de luz, ubicada en la zona rural del distrito de Túcume, la cual pertenece al departamento de Lambayeque.  Esta zona se caracteriza por la actividad agrícola, ganadería  y turismo.

Zoila desde hace algunos años se dedica a la crianza y venta de aves de corral (patos), su corral se encuentra en la parte posterior de su casa, el cual es apropiado y amplio, los alimenta con comida balanceada y granos naturales para que sus animales lleguen a tener un crecimiento óptimo para ofrecerlos en los diferentes mercados de la zona y así obtenga muy buenas ganancias para solventar sus gastos diarios de su hogar.  

Ha solicitado un préstamo a Edpyme Alternativa de 2000 nuevos soles para comprar más animales y su respectivo alimento, con los ingresos que obtenega pueda cubrir su crédito y mejorar su calidad de vida.  Zoila es una persona trabajadora y muy responsable que lo único que quiere es poder superarse junto con su familia y  mejorar económicamente.
texts.en:
Zoila is 46 years old. She lives with her family in a house she owns, which only has electricity. It is located in the rural area of the district of Túcume, which belongs to the department of Lambayeque. This area is known for farming, livestock and tourism. 
For the past few years, Zoila has been raising and selling corral poultry (ducks). Her corral is located behind her house and it is appropriate and ample. She feeds the animals balanced feed and natural grains so they can reach their ideal growth. That way she can sell them in various local markets and make good profits in order to cover daily expenses in her home.
She has requested a loan of 2000 nuevos soles from Edpyme Alternativa to purchase more animals and their respective feed. With the profits she makes, she will be able to pay back the loan and improve her quality of life. Zoila is a hardworking and very responsible person whose only wish is to get ahead in life, together with her family.

loans.use: to purchase more animals and their respective feed.

loans.name: Antonieta

texts.es:
La socia pertenece al banco comunal “QORIMANCACHA”; El banco está ubicado en el distrito de Cusco, perteneciente a la provincia de Cusco,  y departamento de Cusco.

La socia es la Sra. Antonieta; ella tiene 29 años de edad y es soltera y tiene 2 hijos; La socia alterna sus actividades diarias con el negocio de fotocopiadora, ella tiene tiendas de fotocopiadora, ella hace servicios de fotocopias, impresiones y tipeos,la socia trabaja desde las 8:00 a.m hasta las 8:00 p.m,por medio de este negocio la socia saca adelante a sus hijos, la socia quiere ampliar el negocio de fotocopiadora. La socia solicita el préstamo para comprar papeles al por mayor.

 La socia está feliz por el préstamo y se compromete a cumplir con los pagos de su cuota.
texts.en:
This member belongs to the communal bank “QORIMANCACHA”.  The bank is located in the district of Cusco, which belongs to the province of Cusco and the department of Cusco.

This is Antonieta; she is 29 years old, single, and has 2 children.  She alternates her daily activities with her photocopying business.  She has copy and print shops, and does photocopying, printing, and typing.  She works from 8:00 am until 8:00 pm.   With this work she moves her children forward.  She wants to grow her photocopying business.  She requests the loan to buy wholesale paper.

She is happy for the loan and promises to make all her payments.

loans.use: to buy wholesale paper.

loans.name: Mery Anselma

texts.es:
La socia pertenece al banco comunal “QORIMANCACHA”; El banco está ubicado en el distrito de Cusco, perteneciente a la provincia de Cusco,  y departamento de Cusco.

La socia es la Sra. Mery Anselma; ella tiene 45 años de edad y es soltera; La socia alterna sus actividades diarias con el negocio de venta de golosinas, ella vende chupetes, caramelos, chocolates y galletas, la socia tiene un kiosco escolar en la universidad, la socia trabaja desde las 8:00 a.m hasta las 9:00 p.m, la socia quiere ampliar y mejorar el negocio de venta de golosinas. La socia solicita el préstamo para comprar chupetes, caramelos, gaseosas y chocolates al por mayor.

 La socia está feliz por el préstamo y se compromete a cumplir con los pagos de su cuota.
texts.en:
This member belongs to the communal bank “QORIMANCACHA”.  The bank is located in the district of Cusco, which belongs to the province of Cusco and the department of Cusco.

This is Mery Anselma; she is 45 years old and single.  She alternates her daily activities with her business selling candy.  She sells lollipops, caramels, chocolates, and cookies.  She has a school kiosk at the university.  She works from 8:00 am until 9:00 pm.  She wants to grow and better her business selling candy.  She requests this loan to buy lollipops, caramels, soda and chocolates wholesale.

She is happy for the loan and promises to make all her payments.

loans.use: to buy lollipops, caramels, soda and chocolates wholesale.

loans.name: Anonymous Group
loans.use: to buy more chicks to raise and to expand his poultry enclosure.

loans.name: Nancy

texts.es: Nancy tiene 51 años, vive con su hijo y su esposo en su casa que es propia. Tiene 16 años trabajando como comerciante, pues posee una librería y bazar a la vez, atendiendo a sus clientes durante las mañanas. Es así que ofrece útiles de escritorio, escolares y algunos artículos variados para el hogar y uso personal. Asimismo en su mismo espacio de venta ha acondionado un lugar para ofrecer servicios contables, ya que ejerce de manera independiente su profesión, esto le ha servido para que ella y su esposo puedan sostener económicamente su hogar. Se siente muy contenta y feliz  porque puede seguir generándose sus propias fuentes de ingreso, a pesar  de que la competencia esta presente, siempre ofrece una buena atención y variedad de productos. Para el futuro quiere tener más mercadería disponible. Es la séptima vez que esta trabajando de manera grupal con MFP, considera que los créditos son un gran respaldo económico que beneficia su negocio cuando es necesario el aumento de capital de trabajo, esta es la razón de peso que la impulsa a seguir esforzándose y demostrar su puntualidad de pago. El dinero lo invertirá en la compra de millares de papeles de diferentes calidades y colores muy necesarios para el incremento de capital para su negocio.
texts.en:
Nancy is 51 and lives with her son and husband in her own home. She has been working for 16 years as a merchant. She has a bookstore and a variety shop, together. She waits on her customers in the mornings. Thus she sells writing and school supplies and various articles for the home and personal use. Likewise, in the same space that she has her shop, she has prepared a place where she offers book-keeping services, thereby independently pursuing her profession. This has enabled her and her husband to provide economically for their home.

Nancy feels very happy because she can continue generating her own source of income, despite the competition. She always offers good service and a variety of products for sale. In the future she wants to have more merchandise available. This is the seventh time that she has worked as part of a group to secure a loan from MFP. She feels that the loans are a great economic support that benefits her business when she needs to increase her working capital. This is why she is motivated to continue striving and demonstrating her ability to make payments on time. She will use the loan to buy thousands of sheets of different quality and colored paper, which are quite necessary in order to increase the capital for her business.

loans.use: to buy thousands of sheets of different quality and colored paper.

loans.name: Maribel

texts.es:
La socia pertenece al banco comunal “QORIMANCACHA”; El banco está ubicado en el distrito de Cusco, perteneciente a la provincia de Cusco,  y departamento de Cusco.

La socia es la Sra. Maribel; ella tiene 33 años de edad y es soltera; La socia alterna sus actividades diarias con el trabajo en un banco, la socia trabaja desde las 8:00 a.m hasta las 4:00 p.m,por medio de este trabajo la socia saca adelante a su familia, la socia quiere implementar su casa. La socia solicita el préstamo para comprar muebles para implementar su casa.

 La socia está feliz por el préstamo y se compromete a cumplir con los pagos de su cuota.
texts.en:
This is a member of the Qorimancacha communal bank. It is located in the district of Cusco, which belongs to the province of Cusco and the department of Cusco.
The member is Maribel, who's 33 years old and single. She alternates her daily activities with her job at a bank. She works from 8 a.m. to 4 p.m. and through her work she is able to get her family ahead. The member wants to set up her house. She requests the loan to purchase furniture to set up her home.
She is happy for the loan and promises to make her repayments.

loans.use: to purchase furniture to set up her home.

loans.name: Shalon

texts.es:
La socia pertenece al banco comunal “QORIMANCACHA”; El banco está ubicado en el distrito de Cusco, perteneciente a la provincia de Cusco,  y departamento de Cusco.

La socia es la Sra. Shalon; ella tiene 23 años de edad y es casada y tiene 1 hijo; La socia alterna sus actividades diarias con el negocio de compra y venta de autos, la socia también trabaja en una empresa de distribuidora de productos como arroz, azúcar y aceite, la socia por medio de estos trabajos saca adelante a su hijo, la socia quiere ampliar y mejorar los negocios de venta de autos y venta de productos. La socia solicita el préstamo para el mantenimiento de los carros y para comprar productos como arroz, azúcar y leche al por mayor.

 La socia está feliz por el préstamo y se compromete a cumplir con los pagos de su cuota.
texts.en:
This member belongs to Qorimancacha communal bank. It is located in the district of Cusco, which belongs to the province of Cusco and the department of Cusco.
The member is Shalon, who's 23 years old and married with one child. She alternates her daily activities with her business of buying and selling cars. The member also works with a company that distributes goods such as rice, sugar and olive oil. Through her work in both businesses, she is able to get her son ahead. She wants to expand and improve the car selling business and the foodstuff selling business. The member requests the loan to do maintenance on the cars and to purchase wholesale goods such as rice, sugar and milk.
She is happy for the loan and promises to make her repayments.

loans.use: to do maintenance on the cars and to purchase wholesale goods such as rice, sugar and milk.

loans.name: Pelaya

texts.es: Pelaya tiene 60 años, esta felizmente casada por mas D. 30 años con su esposo y ambos viven en compañía D. sus 3 hijos D. los 6 que tiene en total. Toda su vida se ha dedicado a las tareas agrícolas, sus años D. experiencia en el cultivo D. la tierra le ha traído satisfacciones, y gracias a ello, sus  6 hijos que en su mayoría son hombres y mujeres D. bien han sido sostenidos económicamente con está importante fuente D. ingresos. En la actualidad se dedica enteramente al cultivo del maíz, papa, alfalfa y principalmente trigo, las cuales ella misma se encarga D. comercializar para obtener las ganancias. Su gran anhelo es ver a sus 2 ultimos hijos terminando sus carreras para lo cual falta aún varios años y esa es la razón D. su diario esfuerzo. Es la décimo quinta vez que esta solicitando un crédito con MFP D. manera grupal y le agrada trabajar D. esta forma con créditos porque su banco comunal es un grupo humano muy unido y juntos son responsables en el pago D. las cuotas. En esta ocasión su dinero será destinado en pagar el alquiler D. tractor y preparar el terreno D. cultivo donD. va a sembrar maíz.
texts.en:
Pelaya is 60 years old and has been happily married to her husband for more than 30 years. They both live with three of their six total children. 

Pelaya has dedicated her entire life to agricultural work, and her years of experience cultivating the land have brought her satisfaction. Thankfully her six adult children, who are of good character, were supported economically by this important source of income. Currently Pelaya focuses entirely on raising corn, potatoes, alfalfa, and especially wheat, which she herself is in charge of marketing in order to make a profit. Her greatest wish is to see her last two children finish their degrees, which will take a few years, but is the reason for her daily efforts. 

This is the fifteenth time that she has requested a loan from MFP with her group. She appreciates working this way with loans because her communal bank is a good group of people who are very united, and together all are responsible for making payments. This time the money will be used to rent a tractor and prepare farmland where corn will be planted.

loans.use: to rent a tractor.

loans.name: San Antonio De Padgua Group

texts.es:
La señora Sebastiana es casada, tiene 46 años D. edad, no tuvo la oportunidad D. aprender a leer, tiene 7 hijos 3 D. los cuales estudian, se dedica al comercio, a la venta D. artículos D. plástico, inició este negocio como vendedora D. mercería, y hasta el momento lleva 7 años D. experiencia.

DeciD. organizar un grupo para poder solicitar un préstamo que le servirá para aumentar su capital D. trabajo y comprar más mercadería D. plástico: tinajas, palanganas, lazos, basureros, sillas, etc, para su reventa, espera en el futuro mejorar sus ganancias. Las demás integrantes del grupo se dedican a la crianza D. animales, venta D. plásticos y a la venta D. ropa.
texts.en:
Sebastiana is a married, 46-year old woman, who did not have the opportunity to learn how to read. She has 7 children, 3 of whom study. She is a merchant who sells plastic goods. Sebastiana started this business selling sewing supplies. She has 7 years of experience so far. 

She decided to organize the group to apply for a loan that will be used to increase her working capital and purchase more plastic merchandise, such as: bowls, basins, rope, trash cans, chairs, etc; for resale. She hopes to increase her future income. The other group members work raising livestock and selling plastic goods and clothing.

loans.use: to buy plastic merchandise.

loans.name: Victor

texts.es:
El socio pertenece al banco comunal “QORIMANCACHA”; El banco está ubicado en el distrito de Cusco, perteneciente a la provincia de Cusco y departamento de Cusco.

El socio es el Sr. Victor; el tiene 50 años de edad y es casado y tiene 1 hijo; El socio alterna sus actividades diarias con el trabajo como profesor del nivel primario, el socio trabaja desde las 8:00 hasta las 7:00 p.m, por medio de este trabajo saca adelante a su hijo, la socia quiere ampliar y mejorar su casa. El  socio solicita el préstamo para comprar materiales de construcción como cemento, arena, yeso y clavos para que termine de construir su casa.
 
El socio está feliz por el préstamo y se compromete a cumplir con los pagos de su cuota.
texts.en:
The member belongs to the Qorimancacha communal bank, located in the Cusco district in the province of Cusco and the department of Cusco.

The member is Víctor, 50, who is married with one child.  He alternates his daily activities with his job as an elementary school teacher, working from 8 a.m. until 7 p.m.  He supports his child with this job.

Víctor wants to expand and improve his house.  He is requesting a loan to buy construction materials such as cement, sand, plaster, and nails to finish building his house.

Víctor is happy about the loan and is committed to covering the payments.

loans.use: to buy construction materials such as cement, sand, plaster, and nails to finish building his house.

loans.name: Francisca

texts.es:
La socia pertenece al banco comunal “QORIMANCACHA”; El banco está ubicado en el distrito de Cusco, perteneciente a la provincia de Cusco,  y departamento de Cusco.

La socia es la Sra. Francisca; ella tiene 52 años de edad y es casada y tiene 4 hijos; La socia alterna sus actividades diarias con el negocio de tienda de abarrotes, la socia vende arroz, azúcar, aceite, leche y fideos, la socia trabaja desde las 8:00 a.m hasta las 10:00 p.m, por medio de este negocio saca adelante a sus hijos, la socia quiere ampliar el negocio de tienda de abarrotes. La socia solicita el préstamo para comprar arroz, azúcar, leche y fideos al por mayor.

 La socia está feliz por el préstamo y se compromete a cumplir con los pagos de su cuota.
texts.en:
Francisca belongs to the “QORIMANCACHA” communal bank, which is located in the Cusco district, within the province and department of the same name.

Francisca is 52 years old, married, and has 4 children. She splits her daily activities with her grocery store business, where she sells rice, sugar, oil, milk, and noodles. She works from 8:00 a.m. until 10:00 p.m. She is able to help her children get ahead through her business, which is why she would like to expand it. 

Francisca will use the loan to buy wholesale rice, sugar, milk, and noodles. She is happy to have the loan and is committed to making all of her payments.

loans.use: to buy wholesale rice, sugar, milk, and noodles.

loans.name: Kumboyedza 1 Green Group

texts.en: Greetings from Zimbabwe! Here we see 43-year-old Silindeni, who lives in the town of Gweru. She is married, has five children and also cares for three other dependents. She earns a living by running a farm and poultry business, and her main crops are green maize, onions, cabbage, sugar beans and butter nuts. She has been in this line of work for 24 years and says that her main challenges are debtors not paying on time and a shortage of working capital. Silindeni is applying for a loan for $400 to buy seeds and fertilizer. She says the extra income generated by this loan will allow her to have more disposable income and hence care for her family and improve her standard of living. In the future, she hopes to enlarge her farm and be more self sustaining.

loans.use: to buy seeds and fertilizer for a farm.

loans.name: Elizabeth

texts.es:
La socia pertenece al banco comunal “QORIMANCACHA”; El banco está ubicado en el distrito de Cusco, perteneciente a la provincia de Cusco,  y departamento de Cusco.

La socia es la Sra. Elizabeth; ella tiene 43 años de edad y es conviviente y tiene  2 hijos; La socia alterna sus actividades diarias con el trabajo de fisoterapia, ella es propietaria de un consultorio, ella trabaja desde las 8:00 a.m hasta las 7:00 p.m,la socia también trabaja en dar información de seguros de vida, por medio de estos trabajos saca adelante a sus hijos, la socia quiere implementar el trabajo de fisioterapia. La socia solicita el préstamo para comprar una maquinaria para hacer masajes.
 
 La socia está feliz por el préstamo y se compromete a cumplir con los pagos de su cuota.
texts.en:
Elizabeth belongs to the “QORIMANCACHA” communal bank, which is located in the Cusco district, within the province and department of the same name.

Elizabeth is 43 years old, lives with her partner, and has 2 children. She splits her daily activities with her physiotherapy work. She is the owner of an office and works from 8:00 a.m until 7:00 p.m. Elizabeth also works providing information about life insurance. Through these jobs, she is able to help her children get ahead. She would like to expand her physiotherapy work. 

Elizabeth will use the loan to buy massage equipment. She is happy to have this loan and has committed to making all of her payments.

loans.use: to buy massage equipment.

loans.name: Erika

texts.es: Erika tiene 31 años, vive con su hermana y sus padres en su casa que es propia. Desde hace 6 años se dedica al alquiler de inmuebles de departamentos y mini departamentos. Este negocio se inicio con unos pequeños ahorros, además de un prestamo para la compra de su propiedad para luego alquilarla. Con el tiempo su capital de trabajo se ha incrementado y en la actualidad tiene varios inmuebles en su poder de las cuales sigue arrendando, le agrada este negocio porque es rentable ya que en su ciudad el alquiler de inmuebles tiene mucha demanda y su meta para el futuro es  dedicarse a los bienes raíces a gran escala. Es la segunda vez que esta solicitando crédito en MFP,  esta muy contenta de ser parte de este grupo muy unido a la que pertenece. Con el dinero que solicita, lo invertirá en la compra de materiales de construcción para la remodelación de la infraestructura de uno de los inmuebles que va a arrendar.
texts.en:
Erika is 31 years old and lives with her sister and parents in their own house. She has been renting out apartments and studios for 6 years. She started this business with limited savings and a loan to purchase a property to rent out. With time, her working capital has increased to the point where she now has various properties under her possession, which she continues to rent out.

She likes this business because it is profitable since there is a high demand to rent properties in her city. Her goal for the future is to go into real estate on a large scale. This is her second time requesting a loan with MFP (Microfinanciera Prisma). Erika is very happy to be part of this very tight-knit group. With the requested loan, she will purchase construction materials to remodel the infrastructure of one of her rental properties.

loans.use: to buy construction materials.

loans.name: Felicitas

texts.es:
La socia pertenece al banco comunal “QORIMANCACHA”; El banco está ubicado en el distrito de Cusco, perteneciente a la provincia de Cusco,  y departamento de Cusco.

La socia es la Sra. Felicitas; ella tiene 50 años de edad y es casada y tiene  4 hijos; La socia alterna sus actividades diarias con el negocio de ferretería, ella vende clavos, pinturas, martillos entre otros instrumentos, la socia trabaja desde las 8:00 a.m hasta las 8.00 p.m, por medio de este trabajo la socia saca adelante a sus hijos, la socia quiere ampliar y mejorar el negocio de venta de ferretería. La socia solicita el préstamo para comprar mercadería para ferretería como clavos, pinturas, tuercas y martillos.
 
 La socia está feliz por el préstamo y se compromete a cumplir con los pagos de su cuota.
texts.en:
Felicitas belongs to the “QORIMANCACHA” communal bank, which is located in the Cusco district, within the province and department of the same name.
Felicitas is 50 years old, married, and has 4 children. She splits her daily activities with her hardware store business. She sells nails, paint, and hammers among other tools. She works from 8:00 a.m. until 8:00 p.m. Through this work, she has been able to help her children get ahead. 

Felicitas is requesting the loan to buy merchandise for her hardware store, such as nails, paint, nuts, and hammers. She is happy for this loan and has committed to fulfill all of her installments.

loans.use: to buy merchandise for her hardware store, such as nails, paint, nuts, and hammers.

loans.name: Plawn Group

texts.en:
Greetings from Zimbabwe! This is 43-year-old Nomusa from Gweru. She is widowed with two children, ages 19 and 22, both attending school. She also cares for two dependents. 

Nomusa runs a clothing business selling a variety of clothes. The business has been in operation for 18 years. She says the main challenges faced are debtors not paying on time and working capital shortages. Nomusa has requested a loan of 400 USD to buy men's and women’s suits for resale. She says the extra income generated as a result of this loan will allow her to pay her children's school fees. In the future, Nomusa plans to open a boutique and employ workers.

loans.use: to buy ladies' and men's suits for sale

loans.name: Marina

texts.es:
La socia pertenece al banco comunal “QORIMANCACHA”; El banco está ubicado en el distrito de Cusco, perteneciente a la provincia de Cusco,  y departamento de Cusco.

La socia es la Sra. Marina; ella tiene 52 años de edad y es soltera y tiene 3 hijos; La socia alterna sus actividades diarias con el negocio de restaurant, ella prepara desayunos, almuerzos y cenas, ella también da pensión en su restaurant, la socia trabaja desde las 7:00 a.m hasta las 7:00 p.m,por medio de este negocio saca adelante a sus hijos, la socia quiere ampliar el negocio de restaurant. La socia solicita el préstamo para comprar productos para cocinar como pollo, carne, verduras y arroz al por mayor para el restaurant. 

La socia está feliz por el préstamo y se compromete a cumplir con los pagos de su cuota.
texts.en:
The member belongs to the communcal bank “QORIMANCACHA”. This bank is located in the district of Cusco, in the province and department of Cusco.

The member is Senora Marina. She is 52 years old and single. She has 3 children. The member divides her time between daily activities and her restaurant business. She makes breakfasts, lunches and dinners. She also offers accomodation in her restaurant. The member works from 7:00 a.m. until 7:00 p.m. By means of this business she takes care of her children. The member wants to expand the restaurant business. She is asking for a loan to buy cooking ingredients such as chicken, meat, vegetables and rice for the restaurant.

The member is happy for the loan and agrees to make the repayments in a timely manner.

loans.use: to buy cooking ingredients such as chicken, meat, vegetables and rice wholesale for her restaurant

loans.name: Felicia

texts.es:
La socia pertenece al banco comunal “QORIMANCACHA”; El banco está ubicado en el distrito de Cusco, perteneciente a la provincia de Cusco,  y departamento de Cusco.

La socia es la Sra. Felicia; ella tiene 54 años de edad y es soltera y tiene 3 hijos; La socia alterna sus actividades diarias con el negocio de alquiler de cuartos, también la socia trabaja en venta de productos de belleza y también vende ropas interiores, la socia por medio de estos negocios independientes saca adelante a sus hijos, la socia quiere ampliar y mejorar el negocio de alquiler de cuartos, el negocio de venta de productos de belleza y también el negocio de venta de ropas interiores. La socia solicita el préstamo para comprar pinturas y hacer pintar los cuartos, para comprar productos de belleza y ropas interiores al por mayor.
 
La socia está feliz por el préstamo y se compromete a cumplir con los pagos de su cuota.
texts.en:
The member belongs to the communal bank “QORIMANCACHA”. The bank is located in the district of Cusco, in the province and department of Cusco.

The member is Senora Felicia. She is single and has 3 children. The member divides her time between daily activities and her room renting business. She also sells beauty products and underwear. The member, by means of these  independent businesses, manages to raise her children. The member wants to expand and improve the room renting business, her beauty products business as well as her underwear selling business. The member is asking for a loan to buy paint to repaint the rooms, buy beauty products and underwear wholesale.

The member is happy for the loan and agrees to make the repayments in a timely manner.

loans.use: to buy paint to repaint the rooms she rents out and to buy beauty products and underwear.

loans.name: Rosa

texts.es: Rosa tiene 37 años, vive en compañía de su hijo en casa de un familiar. Tiene 6 años de experiencia en la preparación y venta de pasteles, ya que tiene la ventaja de trabajar en una panadería por tanto tiene la facilidad de poder hornear sus pasteles. Es así que en sus horas libres, siendo las tardes se dedica a atender su puesto de ventas que tiene en su misma casa, o cuando puede reparte sus pasteles a otras tiendas pasteleras que le soliciten, pues le hacen pedidos de los postres que prepara. Disfruta de su trabajo cada día porque le encanta elaborar pasteles y considera que es un trabajo donde puede ejecutar todo su potencial y habilidad en la  decoración, ya que además es un producto muy cotizado generándole ganancias. Es la sexta oportunidad en la cual tiene un crédito con MFP de las cuales de siente muy satisfecha de ser una de las socios que tiene trayectoria limpia de trabaja en créditos  en las cuales ha demostrado ser puntual en sus pagos. En esta ocasión invertirá su crédito en la compra de materiales e ingredientes para  seguir preparando sus pasteles de diferentes sabores y texturas.
texts.en: Rosa is 37 years old and lives with her son in a relative's house. She has 6 years experience making and selling cakes. She has the advantage of being able to bake her cakes in a bakery as she works there. In her spare time, in the afternoons, she takes care of her cake-selling stall which is located in her house, or when she can, she delivers her cakes to other cake shops who order the desserts she makes. She enjoys her work every day as she loves making cakes and considers it a job where she can use her full potential and skills at decorating cakes as well as making a product that is in great demand and generates profits for her. This is the 6th time she has taken out a loan with MFP and is very happy to be one of the members who has a clean track record in handling loans and has proven to be punctual with her repayments.This time she will use the loan to buy products and ingredients to continue making her cakes of different flavours and textures.

loans.use: to buy products and consumables to make cakes.

loans.name: Felicitas

texts.es:
La socia pertenece al banco comunal “QORIMANCACHA”; El banco está ubicado en el distrito de Cusco, perteneciente a la provincia de Cusco,  y departamento de Cusco.

La socia es la Sra. Felicitas; ella tiene 50 años de edad y es soltera; La socia alterna sus actividades diarias con el negocio de venta de repuestos de máquina, ella vende repuestos para molineras, para computadoras entre otros repuestos, la socia trabaja desde las 8:00 a.m hasta las 7:00 p.m, por medio de este negocio la socia saca adelante a sus hijos, la socia quiere ampliar el negocio de venta de repuestos de maquinas. La socia solicita el préstamo para comprar repuestos para las maquinas  al por mayor. 

La socia está feliz por el préstamo y se compromete a cumplir con los pagos de su cuota.
texts.en:
The member belongs to the communal bank “QORIMANCACHA”. The bank is located in the district of Cusco, in the province and department of Cusco.

The member is Senora Felicitas. She is 50 years old and is single. The member divides her time between daily activities and the business of selling spare parts for machines. She sells spare parts for food mills, computers and other spare parts. The member works from 8:00 a.m. until 7:00 p.m. By means of this business, the member is able to raise her children. The member wants to expand her business of selling spare parts for machines. The member is asking for a loan to buy spare parts for machines whole sale.

The member is happy for the loan and agrees to make the repayments.

loans.use: to buy spare parts for machines wholesale.

loans.name: Gladys  Ruth

texts.es:
La socia pertenece al banco comunal “QORIMANCACHA”; El banco está ubicado en el distrito D. Cusco, perteneciente a la provincia D. Cusco,  y departamento D. Cusco.

La socia es la Sra. Gladys Ruth; ella tiene 65 años D. edad y es casada y tiene 3 hijos; La socia alterna sus actividades diarias con el negocio D. alquiler D. habitaciones, la socia tiene varias habitaciones en su casa y alquila a estudiantes y a personas en general, la socia por medio D. este negocio saca adelante a sus hijos, la socia quiere ampliar e implementar los cuartos D. alquiler. La socia solicita el préstamo para comprar pintura y accesorios para arreglar los cuartos que alquila. 

La socia está feliz por el préstamo y se compromete a cumplir con los pagos D. su cuota.
texts.en:
This member belongs to the communal bank "QORIMANCACHA" which is located in the district, province and department of Cusco.

Mrs. Gladys Ruth is 65, married and has three children.  She alternates her daily activities with her room rental business.  She has several rooms in her house that she rents to students and people in general.  Through her business she has been able to support her children.  Now she wants to expand and fix up the rental rooms.  She is requesting a loan to buy paint and accessories to renovate the rental rooms.

She is grateful for the loan and committed to paying it back on time.

loans.use: To buy paint and accessories to renovate the rooms she rents.

loans.name: Rosario

texts.es:
La socia pertenece al banco comunal “QORIMANCACHA”; El banco está ubicado en el distrito de Cusco, perteneciente a la provincia de Cusco,  y departamento de Cusco.

La socia es la Sra. Rosario; ella tiene 50 años de edad y es casada y tiene 4 hijos; La socia alterna sus actividades diarias con el negocio de venta de joyas, ella vende aretes, collares y pulseras, la socia vende las joyas en forma independiente, la socia trabaja desde las 8:00 a.m hasta las 7:00 p.m, por medio de este negocio la socia saca adelante a sus hijos, la socia quiere ampliar el negocio de venta de joyas. La socia solicita el préstamo para comprar joyas como pulseras, collares y aretes al por mayor. 

La socia está feliz por el préstamo y se compromete a cumplir con los pagos de su cuota.
texts.en:
This member belongs to the communal bank "QORIMANCACHA" which is located in the district, province and department of Cusco.

Mrs. Rosario, 50, is married and has four children.  She alternates her daily activities with her business selling jewelry such as earrings, necklaces and bracelets.  She sells her products independently and works from 8:00 a.m. to 7:00 p.m.  Through her work she has been able to provide for her children.  She wants to expand her business and is requesting a loan to buy wholesale jewelry such as bracelets, necklaces and earrings.

She is grateful for the loan and committed to paying it back on time.

loans.use: To buy wholesale jewelry such as bracelets, necklaces and earrings.

loans.name: Luciana

texts.es:
La socia pertenece al banco comunal “QORIMANCACHA”; El banco está ubicado en el distrito de Cusco, perteneciente a la provincia de Cusco,  y departamento de Cusco.

La socia es la Sra. Luciana; ella tiene 57 años de edad y es casada y tiene 3 hijos; La socia alterna sus actividades diarias con el negocio de venta de regalos, ella vende peluches, perfumes, collares y adornos, la socia trabaja desde las 9:00 a.m hasta las 8:00 p.m, por medio de este negocio la socia saca adelante a sus hijos, la socia quiere ampliar y mejorar el negocio de venta de regalos. La socia solicita el préstamo para comprar regalos como peluches, adornos y perfumes al por mayor.
 
La socia está feliz por el préstamo y se compromete a cumplir con los pagos de su cuota.
texts.en:
This member belongs to the communal bank "QORIMANCACHA" which is located in the district, province and department of Cusco.

Mrs. Luciana, 57, is married and has three children.  She alternates her daily activities with her business selling gift items such as stuffed animals, perfumes, necklaces and ornaments.  She works from 9:00 a.m. to 8:00 p.m. and through her business has been able to provice for her children.  She wants to expand and improve her gift business so is requesting a loan to buy wholesale gifts including stuffed animals, ornaments and perfumes.

She is grateful for the loan and committed to paying it back on time.

loans.use: To buy wholesale gift items such as stuffed animals and ornaments.

loans.name: Orlando Felipe

texts.es:
Don Orlando tiene su propio negocio, una pulperia en su casa de habitacion con un año trabajandola. Anteriormente trabajaba como guarda de seguridad, lo que con su liquidacion, logra comenzar con su ventas, su esposa esta trabajando tambien como conserje, para lograr cubrir gastos del hogar y poder salir adelante con su negocio, introduciendo mas productos.
Don Orlando ha hecho mejora  a su vivienda, mediante el financiamiento que Afodenic ha dado en ocho ciclos, todos para mejoras de su casa, con el credito anterior logro poner el piso, y hoy con este nuevo prestamo, sera para introducir mas inventarios de productos a su pulperia en la compra de granos basicos, gaseosas, golosinas, caja de javon de lavar ropa, lavar traste, de baño, vidones de aceite, entre otros productos.
Esta contento por que ha dado un giro diferente a su vida, un mejor ingreso, lo que beneficias a sus hijos. Asi como tambien cuida su casa y ve por sus hijos.
texts.en:
Don Orlando runs his own grocery store set up in his home and has been in business for a year.  Previously he worked as a security guard but with his severance pay was able to set up the store.  His wife works as a concierge to help cover household expenses.  His aim is to grow his business and introduce new products.

Orlando has made home improvements with loans through Afodenic over a period of eight cycles.  With his last loan he was able to put down floor covering.  This new loan will be used to introduce more products into his grocery inventory such as basic grains, softdrinks, sweets, detergents, cleaning products, oil, etc.

He is content because he has been able to turn his life around and increase his income, which benefits his children.  This enables him to care for his house and for his family.

loans.use: To buy basic grains, sweets, softdrinks and other items requested by customers.

loans.name: Saturnina

texts.es: Saturnina tiene 42 años, es natural de la ciudad de Quimbiri, vive en su propia casa al lado de su amado esposo Paulino de 49 años y sus 03 queridos hijos a quienes les brinda una educación justa para el mejor porvenir de su futuro. Saturnina es una mujer de ardua labor, se levanta muy temprano para preparar el desayuno para los miembros de su familia y luego se dirige a la chacra con su amado esposo para cumplir con sus labores cotidianas. Ella cultiva plantas de cacao, café y frutas de piña, productos significativos que le sirven de sustento para sobre salir y educar a sus queridos hijos que se encuentran en etapa escolar. Ella cuenta con 03 hectáreas de terreno cultivados con plantas oriundas de la zona selvática de la amazonia peruana y en tiempos de cosecha y deshierbo de malezas necesariamente contrata jornaleros para poder avanzar con mayor celeridad en cuanto a su faena programada. Saturnina necesita el apoyo de la entidad financiera para llevar acabo sus actividades, tiene planeado combatir la plaga de insectos que asechan los brotes de los frutos por lo cual necesita comprar fertilizantes ya que ella no cuenta con recursos suficientes. Es por ello que  acude a los prestamos que la institución MFP facilita a las personas de bajos recursos con miras a prosperar. Para el bien de su trabajo, espera contar con la misma fuerza e ímpetu que la caracteriza para sacar adelante  sus sembríos. Este será su crédito número 04 con MFP, por ello espera de su colaboración para poder comprar los productos necesarios, a la vez se compromete pagar puntualmente sus cronogramas de pago ya que desea acceder a otros préstamos posteriormente. Con los 2,500 nuevos soles solicitados comprará fertilizantes para combatir la plaga de insectos que atacan los frutos de su cultivo.
texts.en:
Saturnina is 42 and from the city of Quimbiri where she lives in her own house with her husband, Paulino, 49, and their three dear children.  She is giving them a good education for the future.  Saturnina is a hard-working woman who gets up very early in the morning to make breakfast for all the members of the family.  She then goes to the cropland with her husband to carry out the daily chores.  She grows cocoa, coffee and pineapple which are important crops that provide an income for her family and for her children's education.  She has three hectares of land where she grows plants native to the Peruvian Amazon Jungle climate.  During harvest season or when it is necessary to remove weeds she hires workers so she can keep to schedule and get the work done on time.

Saturnina is in need of a loan to carry out work such as fighting insect plagues that affect the fruit in its early stages.  She does not have enough funds and needs to buy fertilizer.  She is requesting a loan through MFP which provides loans to people with low income so they can get ahead.  In order to continue with her work she hopes to be able to maintain her strengh and determination to ensure her crops grow successfully.  This will be her fourth loan through MFP.  She is committed to paying it back on time because she would like to continue having access to such loans.  With the 2,500 PEN she has requested she will buy fertilizers to combat the insect plagues that threaten her crops.

loans.use: To buy fertilizer.

loans.name: Gabriela

texts.es:
La socia pertenece al banco comunal “SAN RAFAEL”; El banco está ubicado en el distrito de Cusco, perteneciente a la provincia de Cusco,  y departamento de Cusco.

La socia es la Sra. Gabriela; ella tiene 38 años de edad y es casada y tiene 2 hijos; La socia alterna sus actividades diarias con el negocio de compra y venta de ropa, ella vende chompas, pantalones, polos y blusas, ella vende en forma independiente y también trabaja en una empresa de telefonía, ella por medio de este trabajo y el negocio saca adelante a sus hijos, la socia quiere ampliar el negocio de venta de ropa y mejorar en su trabajo. La socia solicita el préstamo para comprar ropa como polos, chompas, blusas y pantalones.

 La socia está feliz por el préstamo y se compromete a cumplir con los pagos de su cuota.
texts.en:
This borrower belongs to the San Rafael communal bank, which is located in the district, province and department of Cusco.

The borrower is Ms. Gabriela. She is 38 years old, married and has two children. She divides her time between her daily activities and her business of buying and selling clothing. She sells sweaters, pants, polo shirts and blouses. She sells independently and also works in a telephone business. Through this work and her business, Gabriela carries her children ahead. She wants to expand her clothing sales business and to improve at her job. She is requesting a loan to purchase polo shirts, sweaters, blouses and pants.

Gabriela is happy to receive this loan and promises to comply with the repayment terms.

loans.use: to buy clothing like polo shirts, sweaters, blouses and pants

loans.name: Edith

texts.es:
La socia pertenece al banco comunal “SAN RAFAEL”; El banco está ubicado en el distrito de Cusco, perteneciente a la provincia de Cusco,  y departamento de Cusco.

La socia es la Sra. Edith; ella tiene 38 años de edad y es soltera y tiene 1 hijo; La socia alterna sus actividades diarias con el negocio de snack,ella vende hamburguesas, gaseosas y empanadas, ella tiene en el distrito de Limatambo, ella también trabaja en una empresa de turismo y el snack lo administra su hermano, por medio de este negocio y trabajo la socia saca adelante a sus hijos, la socia quiere ampliar el negocio de snack y mejorar en su trabajo de la empresa de turismo. La socia solicita el préstamo para comprar mesas y sillas para su snack y enviarlos a Limatambo.

 La socia está feliz por el préstamo y se compromete a cumplir con los pagos de su cuota.
texts.en:
This borrower belongs to the San Rafael communal bank, which is located in the district, province and department of Cusco.

This borrower is Ms. Edith. She is 38 years old, single and has one son. She divides her time between her daily activities and her snack bar business. She sells hamburgers, sodas and empanadas in the district of Limatambo. She also works at a tourism agency, while her brother manages the snack bar.  Through the business and her job, Edith helps her children to get ahead. She wants to expand her snack business and to improve her work at the tourism agency. Edith is requesting a loan to buy tables and chairs for her snack bar and to send them to Limatambo.

She is happy about this loan and promises to comply with the repayment terms.

loans.use: to buy tables and chairs and send them to the district where she owns a snack bar

loans.name: Maria Elizabeth

texts.es: Maria Elizabeth, de cuarenta y nueve años de edad, vive en la zona occidental del país en área semi urbana junto a sus dos hijas de 15 y 8 años, quienes se encuentran estudiando en centro escolar cercano al lugar donde residen. Maria Elizabeth es madre soltera y ha tenido que ser una guerrera para salir adelante junto a sus dos hijas, ella desde hace años vende en su propia casa productos de belleza, lociones, ropa y artesanías. Y dado a que hay clientes que por sus trabajos no pueden visitarla, ella llega a sus lugares de trabajo e incluso aprovecha cuando es así de abrir oportunidades con nuevos clientes visitando las colonias casa por casa ofreciendo sus productos, todo a fin de buscar la seguridad económica de su familia. Las personas que la conocen la refieren como persona responsable y muy trabajadora. Maria Elizabeth ha decidido solicitar a INTEGRAL crédito para poder comprar variedad de cremas y lociones que sirvan para ofrecer a estas nuevas rutas de comercio que se encuentra aperturando. Espera que este cambio sirva para avanzar en la concretización de sus sueños de una vida mejor para su familia
texts.en:
49-year-old Maria Elizabeth lives in the eastern part of the country, in a semi-urban area, together with her two daughters aged 15 and 8.  Her daughters are attending a school near their home.  María Elizabeth is a single mother and she has had to be a true warrior to get ahead in life together with her two daughters. 

María Elizabeth has been selling beauty products, clothes and handicrafts in her home for years.  As she has customers who can't visit her because they are working, she goes to their places of work and makes the most of it, opening opportunities with new customers and visiting residential developments house by house, selling her products.  She does all of this with the aim of achieving financial security for her family.  People who know her describe her as a responsible and very hard-working person.

María Elizabeth has decided to request a loan from INTEGRAL in order to buy a range of creams and lotions which she will be able to sell on the new commercial routes that she is opening.  She hopes that this change will help her to make progress in achieving her dream of creating a better life for her family.

loans.use: to buy a range of creams and lotions

loans.name: Noemii Luz

texts.es:
La socia pertenece al banco comunal “SAN RAFAEL”; El banco está ubicado en el distrito de Cusco, perteneciente a la provincia de Cusco,  y departamento de Cusco.

La socia es la Sra. Noemi Luz; ella tiene 51 años de edad y es casada y tiene 4 hijos; La socia alterna sus actividades diarias con el negocio de ferretería, ella vende clavos, pinturas, tornillos y repuestos, la socia trabaja desde las 7:00 a.m hasta las 9:00 p.m, por medio de este negocio la socia saca adelante a sus hijos, la socia quiere ampliar el negocio de venta de ferretería. La socia solicita el préstamo para comprar mercadería como clavos, tornillos y pinturas al por mayor. 

La socia está feliz por el préstamo y se compromete a cumplir con los pagos de su cuota.
texts.en:
Noemi Luz belongs to the "San Rafael" community bank which is located in Cusco district, in Cusco province and department.

Noemi Luz is 51 years old, married, and has four children.  She divides her time between her daily activities and her hardware business.  She sells nails, paint, screws and spare parts.  She works from 7.00am to 9.00pm and, through this business, she gets her children ahead in life.  Noemi Luz would like to expand her hardware business.  She is requesting this loan to buy merchandise such as nails, screws and paint wholesale.

Noemi Luz is happy to be receiving her loan and pledges to make her repayments on time.

loans.use: to buy merchandise such as nails, screws and paint wholesale

loans.name: Rebeca

texts.es: Rebeca, de 42 años de edad, convive con Gabriel de 44 años y fruto a su relación tienen 03 hijos en etapa escolar y juntos residen en su propia morada situada en la ciudad de San Francisco. Rebeca empezó desde muy niña a trabajar como ayudante de distintas tiendas comerciales, creció con los anhelos de poseer su propia tienda comercial. Su deseo se hizo realidad, que gracias a unos ahorros logró concretarlos, de esta manera han pasado 13 años trabajando de forma independiente. Hoy, con una sonrisa muy despejada y fortalecida, siente que ha cumplido uno de sus primeros objetivos, lo cual le está arrojando buenos resultados económicos, debido a la calidad y la variedad de productos que ofrece a su clientela. Normalmente trabaja por cuenta propia, pero en ocasiones recibe la ayuda de sus hijos. Su puesto de ventas esta situado en la zona céntrica de la comunidad de Rosario. Gracias al préstamo solicitado podrá comprar andamios y una refrigeradora para conservar mejor sus productos. Espera contar con el apoyo financiero para poder reordenar y ofrecer sus productos de manera organizada ya que con ello piensa mejorar y prestar un servicio adecuado a sus consumidores. Este será su segundo crédito y esta muy contenta de  saber que contará una vez más con el apoyo de los financistas, ya que así se sentirá segura de progresar. Con el monto solicitado comprará productos para abastecer su puesto de ventas.
texts.en: Rebeca is 42 years old, lives with Gabriel who is 44 years old, and together they have 3 school-aged children. They all live in their own home in San Francisco. Rebeca began working at a very young age in many different stores. She grew up with goals to start her own business. Her dream came true thanks to some savings she made and she has been working independently for 13 years.
