Nowadays, with a wide and enthusiastic smile she feels she has accomplished one of her most important goals. Her business is rendering lots of profits due to the quality and variety of products she offers to her clients. Normally, she works on her own, but occasionally her children help her. Her store is located in the center of the Rosario community. Thanks to the requested loan she will buy scaffolding and refrigerators to conserve her products.  She counts on this financial support to reorganize and offer her products neatly so her clients can receive adequate treatment and service. This will be her second loan and she is very happy knowing that she can count on this financial help once again since she has confidence in progressing. With the requested loan she will buy more merchandise to stock up her store.

loans.use: buy products to stock her store.

loans.name: Victoria

texts.es:
La socia pertenece al banco comunal “SAN RAFAEL”; El banco está ubicado en el distrito de Cusco, perteneciente a la provincia de Cusco,  y departamento de Cusco.

La socia es la Sra. Victoria; ella tiene 30 años de edad y es casada y tiene 1 hijo; La socia alterna sus actividades diarias con el negocio de venta de maíz, ella es propietaria de las  tierras de cultivo donde siembra maíz y luego lo lleva al distrito de Ollantaytambo, la socia trabaja también en una empresa de productos naturales para la salud, por medio de estos negocios la socia saca adelante a sus hijos, la socia quiere ampliar y mejorar el negocio de venta de maíz y mejorar en su trabajo. La socia solicita el préstamo para comprar maíz.

La socia está feliz por el préstamo y se compromete a cumplir con los pagos de su cuota.
texts.en:
Victoria is a member of the "San Rafael" community bank which is located in Cusco district, in Cusco province and department.

Victoria is 30 years old, married, and has one child.  She divides her time between her daily activities and her business selling corn.  She owns farmland where she grows corn which she then takes to Ollantaytambo district to sell.  She also works for a natural health foods company.  Through these jobs, she gets her children ahead in life.  Victoria would like to expand and improve her business selling corn and improve in her work.  She is requesting this loan to buy corn.

Victoria is happy to be receiving this loan and pledges to make her repayments on time.

loans.use: to buy corn

loans.name: David

texts.es:
David de 27 años de edad, natural de la ciudad de San Francisco, convive con Mariluz de 24 años y fruto de esa relación concibieron 01 hija llamada Karol de 03 años y juntos habitan en su propio lecho construido a base de material rústico, madera y techo de calamina. Los campos de cultivo que con tanto esfuerzo logró comprarlo David, es el único sustento para los miembros de su familia, sus cultivos están trabajadas de manera tecnificada y por lo cual  son muy solicitados en la ciudad de San Francisco, ya que su notoriedad de cosechar cacao, café y ajonjolíes, son de muy buena calidad y por lo cual sus productos son vendidos a buenos precios.
Lo que más le gusta de su trabajo es cuidar sus sembríos de la plaga de insectos, ya que estos asechan sin piedad las florecillas de cada producto. Lleva 05 años realizando esta actividad y considera que lo más difícil es transportar los pesados sacos de sus productos desde la chacra hasta los secaderos realizando un recorrido de una hora a caminata. David solicita el crédito para comprar sacos de abono y así mejorar sus tierras y posteriormente cosechar frutos de muy buena calidad y en abundancia. David posteriormente comprará mas espacios de terreno para sembrar más plantas de cacao, ya que es un producto perdurable. Este será su primer crédito con MFP y esta muy contento de  saber que tendrá un apoyo financiero, ya que así se sentirá seguro de avanzar con su proyecto planeado y por ende se compromete pagar puntualmente sus cuotas programadas. Con los 3,000 nuevos soles comprará sacos de abono para fertilizar sus tierras.
texts.en:
27-year-old David is originally from the town of San Francisco.  He lives with 24-year-old Mariluz and the couple have one daughter called Karol who is 3 years old.  They live together in their own home which is built from rudimentary materials and wood, and has a roof made from metal sheets.  The farmland that David managed to buy through a lot of hard work is the only source of support for the members of his family.  He applies modern technology to growing his crops and, for this reason, they are very much in demand in the town of San Francisco.  He harvests very good quality cacao, coffee and sesame seeds, so his produce sells at good prices.

What David most enjoys about his work is protecting his crops from pests as the pests attack the flowers of each of his crops without mercy.  He has been in this line of work for five years and he considers the most difficult part to be transporting the heavy sacks of produce from his farm to the drying areas as this entails a one hour walk.

David is requesting this loan to buy sacks of manure so that he can improve his land and thereby later harvest very good quality fruit in abundance.  He will later buy more plots of land so that he can sow more cacao plants as this is a durable product.  This will be David's first loan from MFP and he is very happy to know that he will have financial support as this will make him feel safe in moving forward with his planned project.  He therefore pledges to make his repayments on time.  He will use the 3,000 soles to buy sacks of manure to fertilize his land.

loans.use: to buy sacks of manure

loans.name: Clicerio

texts.es: El señor Clicerio y su esposa se dedican a la venta de tamales que ofrecen de casa en casa o en ocasión bajo pedido. La esposa es quien prepara los tamales y los embolsa en docenas de diferentes guisos unos son de queso, carne y pollo, eso los hace una semana y la otra hace chanchamitos (comida típica de México) que son preparados de hoja de plato. Clicerio sale a venderlos en una hielera para que permanezcan calientitos para que sus clientes se queden satisfechos con el servicio. En este momento Clicerio ve que su negocio esta dando fruto es por ello que quiere invertirle para que poco a poco su negocio crezca, por tal motivo quiere el préstamo para compra harina de maíz, manteca e ingredientes para la producción del producto.
texts.en:
Clicerio and his wife sell tamales.  They sell their products door to door or sometimes to order.  His wife is the one who makes the tamales and fills them with dozens of different fillings: some with cheese, some with meat, some with chicken.  She makes these one week and the next week she will make 'chanchamitos' (traditional Mexican food) which are baked in a banana leaf.  Clicerio goes out to sell the products in a special box to keep them warm so that their customers are satisfied with the service.

Right now, Clicerio can see that their business is bearing fruit and so he would like to invest in it so that it gradually grows.  For this reason, he would like a loan to buy cornmeal, butter and other ingredients for making his products.

loans.use: to buy cornmeal, butter and other ingredients

loans.name: Oscar Omar

texts.es:
El señor Oscar y su esposa la señora Trinidad son padres de familia y tiene a dos hijos que actual mente estudian la primaria. 
Están solicitando un préstamo para comprar los uniformes y útiles escolares (cuaderno, libros, carpetas, lápices, colores y mochilas) ya que en este momento no cuenta con el dinero necesario para cubrir la necesidad escolar de sus hijos. 
Don Oscar es empleado de una distribuidora de lácteos como encargado del almacén, con una parte de este ingreso planea pagar el crédito ya que Doña Trinidad se encarga de atender y cuidar a sus hijos.
texts.en:
Oscar and his wife Trinidad are parents.  They have two children who are currently attending elementary school.

Oscar and his wife are requesting a loan to buy school uniforms and supplies (composition books, text books, folders, pencils, colored pencils and backpacks) as they currently do not have the money they need to cover their children's school needs.

Oscar works for a dairy distributor as a warehouse manager.  He plans to use part of his income to repay this loan as Trinidad will take charge of looking after and caring for the children.

loans.use: to cover school expenses (buying supplies and uniforms)

loans.name: Jose

texts.es: José es un joven de 24 años que a pesar de su corta edad es una persona muy responsable, el aún vive en casa de su mama, pero el no es una carga ya que trabaja en maquiladora para apoyar con los gastos del hogar. José se ve en la necesidad de solicitar un préstamo para impermeabilizar el techo y terminar de construir la barda enfrente de su vivienda. Este proyecto lo quiere realizar por que en temporadas de lluvia se trasmina el agua y acusa de esto el techo se esta deteriorando, al igual que terminar la barda para brindar a su madre mayor protección. Con el préstamo el comprara cemento, arena, impermeabilizante y pagar la mano de obra para que su proyecto quede realizado.
texts.en: José is a young man of 24 who, in spite of his young age, is a very responsible person.  He still lives in his mom's house but isn't a burden as he works in a cross-border assembly plant in order to support his mom with the household expenses.  José needs to request a loan to waterproof the roof of his home and finish building a perimeter fence out front.  He would like to carry out this work because during rainy seasons the water leaks into the house as the roof is in a bad state of repair.  He would like to finish building the fence in order to provide his mother with more protection.  José will use his loan to buy cement, sand and waterproofing material.  He will also pay labor costs so that his project can be completed.

loans.use: to waterproof his roof and finish building a perimeter fence

loans.name: Veronica Raquel

texts.es:
La señora Verónica Raquel es una mujer muy trabajadora, que desea ofrecer a su familia una mejor estabilidad económica y un mejor patrimonio. Desde hace 5 años inicio con su propio negocio de venta de ropa usada que ofrece desde su mismo domicilio y algunas ocasiones en colonias reconocidas donde hay flujo de gente que le podría comprar su producto. Verónica tiene a su cargo 4 hijos que con el apoyo de su esposo están criando y les ofrecer un mejor estudio para que sean unas personas de bien, por tal motivo opto por tener su negocio para estar al pendiente de sus necesidades. Verónica desea el préstamo para comprar ropa de temporada y algunos artículos para el hogar, de esta manera 
Obtendrán mejores ganancias.
texts.en: Verónica Raquel is a very hard-working woman who would like to offer her family more financial stability and better equity.  Five years ago she set up her own business selling used clothes.  Her business is located in her home and sometimes she also sells in well-known developments where there are a number of people who could buy her products.  Verónica has four children in her care who she is raising, together with her husband, and offering a better education so that they become upstanding citizens.  She chose to run her own business so that she could attend to their needs.  Verónica would like this loan to buy seasonal clothes and some household goods.  This will enable her to make better profits.

loans.use: to buy seasonal clothes

loans.name: Sergio

texts.es: El señor Sergio es un hombre muy trabajador y responsable con su familia. Hace 8 años el adquirió una vivienda de interés social, pero la barda del patio de atrás esta muy baja que por consecuencia puede tener problemas con su vecinos por algún desacuerdo, como Sergio es una persona muy tranquila quiere omitirse este tipo de situaciones para no darle a sus 3 hijos un mal ejemplo. Sergio trabaja como supervisor de una maquiladora y su esposa realiza trabajos de limpieza en general en casas particulares para ofrecer a sus hijos una mejor calidad de vida. En este momento no cuenta con el dinero necesario para realizar su proyecto por eso solicita un préstamo para comprar block, arena, cemento, varilla y pagar a la persona que le hará el trabajo para que su proyecto quede realizado.
texts.en:
Sergio is a very hard-working man who meets his family responsibilities.  Eight years ago he acquired a house through a government housing program.  However, the wall round the rear yard is very low which means that he could have problems with his neighbors over some disagreement.  As Sergio is a very peaceful person, he would like to avoid this type of situation in order to avoid setting a bad example to his three children.

Sergio works as a foreman in a cross-border assembly plant and his wife carries out general cleaning work in private houses in order to provide their children with  a better quality of life.  Right now, Sergio doesn't have the money he needs to carry out his project and so he is requesting a loan to buy blocks, sand, cement and rods, and to pay the person who will carry out the work, so that his project is completed.

loans.use: to finish building a wall round their rear yard

loans.name: Unidas Para Vencer Group

texts.es:
Banco Comunal Unidas para Vencer esta integrado por diez socias que se dedican a diferentes actividades economicas en la Aldea de San Nicolas en el municipio de Juticalpa. La coordinadora de este Banco se llama Kenia Jacqueline, y ella se dedica a la venta de ropa de segunda mano y sandalias, tiene 33 años de edad, es casada y procreo tres hijos varones.

Hace seis años atras Kenia siguiendo el ejemplo de una de sus vecinas decidio dedicarse a la venta de ropa usada, y compro su primer fardo gracias al apoyo economico de su esposo y aunque no fue mucho, eso le basto para iniciar. Su negocio no tiene nombre porque realiza las ventas de forma ambulante, y de vez en cuando en su hogar cuando sus vecinos o amistades llegan a buscarla. La dificultad mas grande que enfrenta Kenia es la temporada lluviosa porque no puede salir de su casa y pierde de vender y tambien cuando da la mercaderia al credito porque a veces se tardan mucho en cancelarle. 

El prestamo que esta solicitando Kenia lo necesita para comprar un fardo de ropa usada y tambien comprar sandalias para darle un giro diferente a su negocio. Con el apoyo de este financiamiento ella podra surtir su negocio de ropa y de sandalias de diferentes colores y estilos para satisfacer a sus clientes. 

Muy contenta Kenia expreso que con los prestamos obtenidos en FAMA a podido ir mejorando su casa y tambien pudo comprar su refrigeradora y eso le ha a ayudado a ahorrar algunos centavos porque antes se le arruinaban algunos productos que necesitaban refrigeracion.

Su meta es seguir apoyando a sus hijos para que culminen sus estudios academicos y su sueño es culminar las mejoras de su casa. Kenia tiene mas de dieciseis ciclos en FAMA y ha cancelado sus cuotas puntualmente.
texts.en:
The 'Unidas para Vencer' community bank has ten members who are engaged in different business activities in the village of San Nicolas, in Juticalpa.  The bank's coordinator is Kenia Jacqueline and she sells second-hand clothes and sandals.  She is 33 years old, married, and has three sons.

Six years ago, following the example of one of her neighbors, Kenia decided to start selling second-hand clothes and bought her first bundle of clothes with the financial support of her husband.  Although it wasn't a lot, it was enough to get her started.  Her business doesn't have a name because she makes her sales as an itinerant vendor.  She also sometimes makes sales from her home when her neighbors or friends come to find her.  The biggest difficulty that Kenia faces is the rainy season because it means she can't go out and she loses sales.  She also has problems when she sells merchandise on credit because sometimes her customers take a long time to pay her back.

Kenia needs the loan that she is requesting to buy a bundle of second-hand clothes and also to buy sandals so that she can do something a little different with her business.  With the support of this loan, she will be able to stock her business with clothes and sandales in different colors and styles in order to satisfy her customers.

Kenia commented very happily that, as a result of the loans she has received from FAMA, she has been able to continue improving her home and has also been able to buy a refrigerator.  This has helped her to save a few cents because, before she bought the refrigerator, some products that needed refrigerating used to go off.

Kenia's goal is to continue supporting her children so that they finish their education.  Her dream is to finish carrying out improvements to her home.  Kenia has been working with FAMA for more than 16 loan cycles and she has made her repayments punctually.

loans.use: to buy bundles of second-hand clothes and sandals

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to purchase additional inventory for her store.

loans.name: Habil

texts.ru: Habil 30 let . On jenat i imeyet odnogo rebonka. Habil yavlyayetsya IDP personom on pereselenec iz Fuzuli qoroda seychas projivayet v Fuzuli regione vmeste so svoyey jenoy i sinom. Habil seychas nujdayetsya v 2000 AZN chtobi kupit korovi dlya uvelicheniya kolichestva skota dlya prodaji. On uje 5 let kak zanimayetsya skotovodstvom i razvodit korov.
texts.en: Habil is 30 years old.  He is married and has one child.  Habil is an IDP (Internally Displaced Person) from the city of Fuzuli and now lives in the Fuzuli region together with his wife and son.  Habil now needs 2000 AZN in order to buy cattle to increase livestock quantity for sale.  He has been involved in animal husbandry for five years and breeds cattle.

loans.use: to buy cattle

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy more inventory.

loans.name: Ilham

texts.ru: Ilham rodilsya v 1974 qodu. Uje 8 let kak on zanimayetsya skotovodstvom i razvodit korov. Seychas on nujdayetsya v 2000 AZN chtobi kupit korovi dlya razvitiya svoyego biznessa. On jenat i imeyet 2 detey. Habil yavlyayetsya IDP personom pereselenec iz Fuzuli goroda, seychas projivayet v Fuzuli regione posolok Balal-Bakhmanli vmeste so svoyey semyoy.
texts.en: Ilham was born in 1974.  He has been involved in animal husbandry for 8 years and breeds cattle.  Currently, he needs 2000 AZN in order to buy cattle to develop his business.  He is married and has two children.  He is an IDP (Internally Displaced Person) from the city of Fuzuli and now lives in the Balal-Bakhmanli village in the Fuzuli region together with his family.

loans.use: to buy cattle

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy sheep and feed.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: To buy more produce like maize, coffee, and beans to resell.

loans.name: Parvana

texts.en:
Parvana lives and works in Agsu. She is a 22-year-old single woman who lives with her parents. In 2008 her family decided to open a grocery store. Being the eldest daughter, Parvana greatly helped her parents. Parvana is a very hardworking young woman, and currently she manages the family business. 

She requested 1500 Azerbaijan New Manats (AZN) to use as working capital to buy necessary inventory and increase her assortment of merchandise. Parvana has borrowed and succesfully repaid a previous loan from Aqroinvest. This is her second loan. Parvana dreams of expanding her business to secure the future of her family.

loans.use: to buy necessary inventory.

loans.name: Flor

texts.es: Flor de 53 años de edad vive en Arjona, cerca a la ciudad de Cartagena de Indias, tiene 6 hijos en las edades de 22 a 30 años y desde allí se dedica a la actividad comercial desde hace 2 años, cuando inició su negocio de producir calzado, con una antigua máquina sencilla que le regalaron, con la cual fabricó sandalias; cuando esta máquina se le dañó la mandó a reparar  y el técnico se quedó con ella sin explicación alguna y nunca la devolvió. Aun así Flor insistió en buscar ingresos para su hogar y con mucho esfuerzo, compró a crédito una maquina industrial y con ella incentivó su producción, produce muy buen calzado y está entusiasmada en el crecimiento de su negocio, su meta es lograr fabricar bolsos de gran tamaño y ubicar sus productos en un local comercial, con lo cual mejoraría sus ingresos por la concentración de su mercado y el posicionamiento que tendría. Su mayor desafío es lograr capital de trabajo para invertir y aumentar su producción y esta es la razón por la cual acude a su credikiva, primer financiamiento que hace a ala Fundación Mario Santo Domingo con el cual comprará: materiales para fabricar calzado, como cueros suelas, goma forros, miñones, accesorios hormas y una vitrina para ordenar su producción. Mientras trabaja para conseguir alcanzar sus metas, produce una rentabilidad sobre las ventas no menor del 42,4%, desde la cual auguramos su éxito en la inversión.
texts.en:
Flor, 53, lives in Arjona near the city of Cartagena de Indias.  She has six children ranging in age from 22 to 33 years.  She’s been engaged in commerce there for the last two years when she started her shoe making business making sandals on an antique, simple sewing machine someone gave her.  When this machine broke down and she sent it to be repaired the technician, with no explanation whatsoever, kept it and never returned it to her.  Even so, Flor insisted in finding ways to earn household income and with much effort she bought an industrial sewing machine and used it to accomplish her production.  She makes very good footwear and she’s excited about the growth of her business.  Her goal is to manufacture large purses and to position her products in a commercial locale which will improve her income by concentrating her market and because of the positioning she’ll have.  

Her greatest challenge is attaining sufficient working capital to invest and increase production and this is why she’s calling upon a Kiva loan, first financing she’s gotten from Fundación Mario Santo Domingo, that she’ll use to buy shoe making supplies like: leather, soles, glue, lining, straps, accessories, shoe trees and a display case to arrange her products.  While she works toward reaching these goals, she produces a profit margin over sales of no less than 42.4% from which we can predict success in the investment.

loans.use: to buy shoe making supplies.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy paper goods, clothes, cosmetics and perfume.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy two more washing machines.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy oil, flour, eggs, a display case and utensils.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy raw materials like fabric, thread and decorations to make gowns for weddings, first communions and graduation.

loans.name: Luisa

texts.es:
Luisa D. 66 años D. edad, vive con su familia en su casa propia, no cuenta con servicios básicos, ubicada en la zona rural del distrito La Arena que pertenece al departamento D. Piura.  Zona que se caracteriza por la actividad agrícola y ganadera.

DesD. hace varios años Luisa se dedica la venta D. productos D. primera necesidad (leche, aceite, azúcar, papel higiénico, atún, etc) y D. bebidas, su negocio lo a colocado en su misma casa para su comodidad y seguridad, con las ganancias que obtenga por la venta D. sus productos  trata D. cubrir  todos sus gastos y mejorar el nivel D. vida D. su familia.  También elabora y venD. chicha e jora a los clientes que llegan a su negocio, obteniendo otro ingreso para su casa.

Para poder  implementar su negocio a solicitado un crédito a Edpyme Alternativa  D. 1500 nuevos soles para comprar más mercaderías e insumos para seguir preparando su chicha D. jora, con el único ideal D. que su negocio sea cada vez más granD. y tenga productos surtidos para ofrecerles a sus clientes.  Luisa es una persona responsable y dedicada que se preocupa por brindarles lo mejor a su familia.
texts.en:
66-year-old Luisa lives with her family in their own home, which lacks basic services and is located in the rural district of La Arena, belonging to the administrative division of Piura. This area is characterized by farming and ranching.

For several years, Luisa has been selling staple products (milk, oil, sugar, toilet paper, tuna, etc) and beverages. Her business is situated in her home, for her comfort and safety. With the earnings generated from selling her products, she tries to cover all her costs and improve the living standards of her family. She also produces and sells chicha D. jora, a traditional corn liquor, to the customers that visit her business. This provides an additional income for her household.

In order to carry out her business, Luisa applied for a loan of 1,500 nuevos soles through Edpyme Alternativa, which will be used to buy more goods and supplies so that she can continue to prepare her chicha. Luisa's only ideal is for her business to grow again and to have assorted products to offer her customers. Luisa is a responsible and dedicated person who cares about providing the best for her family.

loans.use: to purchase more merchandise and supplies so that she can continue to prepare chicha de jora, a traditional liquor

loans.name: Candelaria De Jesus

texts.es:
Candelaria vive en la ciudad de Cartagena y se dedica a la venta de carnes frías y también aprovecha su mercado, para solucionarles cualquier necesidad a las familias, de adquirir mercancías variadas como cosméticos, calzados, ropa de cama, toallas etc.  Este negocio lo inició Candelaria hace 10 años y vende las carnes frías de contado y las mercancías establecen créditos adaptados a sus requerimientos y a las necesidades de sus clientes. Candelaria goza de una buena clientela y necesita seguir aumentando su capital de trabajo, esta es la razón por la cual acude a   su credikiva, primer financiamiento que hace a la Fundación Mario Santo Domingo, con la cual comprará carnes frías y mercancía variada como cosméticos toallas, calzado sobre pedidos solicitados por sus clientes, para la época en la cual Candelaria obtiene un repunte en sus ventas el Mes del Amor y de la Amistad.
Su cartera es muy buena,  presenta una buena recuperación, pues  rota  sus cuentas por cobrar  en 18 días, de acuerdo a las características de este negocio y así mismo una rotación de inventarios de 17 días, indicadores desde los cuales auguramos su éxito en la inversión planeada.
texts.en:
Candelaria lives in the city of Cartagena and sells cold cuts but also takes advantage of her market to also take care of any other family need, to acquire assorted merchandise like cosmetics, footwear, bed linens, towels, etc.  Candelaria started this business ten years ago and sells cold cuts for cash and the other merchandise on credit plans adapted to the needs and requirements of her customers.  

Candelaria has a well-established clientele and needs to continue to increase working capital.  This is why she’s calling on a Kiva loan, her first financing from Fundación Mario Santo Domingo, to buy cold cuts and assorted merchandise like cosmetics, towels and footwear to fill pending customer orders during this season when Candelaria’s sales spike thanks to the approaching festivities related to the Month of Love and Friendship.

Her portfolio is quite good.  Her recuperation is good because her accounts receivable rotate every 18 days according to this type of business’ characteristics and her inventory turns over every 17 days.  These indicators augur success for the planned investment.

loans.use: to buy cold cuts and assorted merchandise like cosmetics, towels and footwear to fill pending customer orders.

loans.name: Maria Olinda

texts.es:
María es madre de familia de 53 años, vive con su hijo en su casa propia, cuenta con el servicio de agua y luz, ubicado en el distrito de Chepén que pertenece a la provincia de La Libertad.  Zona de actividad agrícola, ganadera y turística.

María cuenta con su negocio de venta de comida de forma ambulatoria en una zona muy transitada de la ciudad, actividad que realiza desde hace varios años, cuenta con su propia clientela, pero a pensado en solicitar un préstamo a Edpyme Alternativa  de 1000 nuevos soles para comprar insumos, mesas, sillas y una cocina, con la finalidad de seguir brindando un buen servicio y satisfaciendo las necesidades de sus clientes, con los ingresos que obtenga podrá cubrir su crédito y mejorar la calidad de vida de su hijo.

Con su trabajo y sus ganas de salir adelante María se ha ganado la confianza y el respeto de sus vecinos, demostrando que cuando uno se propone una meta se puede hacer realidad, con el objetivo de que su hijo tenga un mejor futuro y pueda ser profesional.
texts.en:
María is a 53-year-old mother who lives with her son in her own home which has water and electricity.  Her home is located in Chepén district, in La Libertad province.  People in this area work in farming, livestock raising and tourism.

María has a business selling food as an itinerant street vendor in a very busy area of the city.  She has been in this business for several years and has her own customer base.  She has decided to request a loan for 1,000 soles from Edpyme Alternativa to buy supplies, tables, chairs and a stove.  Her aim is to continue providing a good service and meeting her customers' needs.  She will use the income that she makes to repay her loan and improve her son's quality of life.

Through her work and her desire to get ahead, María has gained the trust and respect of her neighbors, showing them that when you set yourself a goal you can achieve it.  Her goal is for her son to enjoy a better future and become a professional.

loans.use: to buy supplies, tables, chairs and a stove for her business

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: buy more merchandise to supply her store.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy cosmetics, clothes, perfume, women's and home accessories.

loans.name: Zoila Teresa

texts.es:
Zoila de 33 años de edad, vive con su familia en su casa propia, cuenta con todos los servicios básicos, ubicada en la zona urbana del distrito de Pacasmayo que pertenece al departamento de La Libertad.  Zona que se caracteriza por la actividad pesquera, agrícola y turismo.

Desde hace varios años Zoila se dedica la venta de productos de primera necesidad (leche, aceite, azúcar, papel higiénico, atún, etc) y de bebidas, su negocio lo a colocado en su misma casa para su seguridad, con las ganancias que obtenga por la venta de sus productos  trata de cubrir  todos sus gastos y mejorar el nivel de vida de su familia.  

Para poder  implementar su negocio a solicitado un crédito a Edpyme Alternativa  de 1200 nuevos soles para comprar más mercaderías, con el único ideal de que su negocio sea cada vez más grande y tenga productos surtidos para ofrecerles a sus clientes.  Zoila es una persona responsable y dedicada que se preocupa por brindarles lo mejor a su familia, en especial a sus hijos que los quiere ver realizados en la vida.
texts.en:
Zoila, 33 years of age, lives with her family in her own home.  It has all the basic services, and is located in the urban zone of Pacasmayo, which belongs to the department of La Libertad.  This zone is characterized for its fishing, agriculture, and tourism activities.

For several years, Zoila has dedicated herself to selling basic needs products (milk, oil, sugar, toilet paper, tuna, etc.) and beverages.  Her business is located in her own house for security reasons and, with the earnings from the sale of her products, she tries to cover her expenses and improve her family’s standard of living.

In order to implement her business, she has requested a loan of 1200 new Peruvian soles from Edpyme Alternativa to buy more merchandise for her store.  Her goal is to continue growing her business, and to have a supply of products to offer her customers.  Zoila is a very responsible and dedicated person who is preoccupied with giving all the best to her family, especially her children, who she wants to see succeed in life.

loans.use: buy more merchandise for her business.

loans.name: Hector

texts.es:
Hector de 47 años de edad, vive con su esposo e hijos en su casa propia, cuenta con los servicios de agua y luz, ubicada en la zona urbana del distrito de Oyotún que pertenece a la provincia de Chiclayo.  Esta zona se caracteriza por la actividad agrícola y ganadera.

Desde hace  varios años Hector se ha dedicado a la venta de abarrotes (leche, arroz, aceite, azúcar, papel higiénico, atún, huevos), frutas, verduras y bebidas, su negocio lo ha colocado en casa para su  seguridad y comodidad, ya que puede atender a la hora que desea, con las ganancias por la venta de sus productos  trata de cubrir  todos sus gastos y necesidades de su hogar.

Para poder  implementar su negocio a solicitado un crédito a Edpyme Alternativa  de 1500 nuevos soles para comprar más mercadería para abastecer su negocio, con el único objetivo de que su negocio crezca y tenga más productos que ofrecerles a sus clientes;  para cubrir su préstamo y sus obligaciones familiares.  Hector es una persona responsable y dedicada que se preocupa por tener más cosas que ofrecerle a su familia al igual que tener mejoras económicas para brindarle otras opciones a sus hijos.
texts.en:
Hector, 47 years of age, lives with his wife and children in his own home.  It has all the basic services, such as water and electricity, and is located in the urban zone of Oyotún, which belongs to the province of Chiclayo.  This zone is characterized for its agriculture and livestock activities.

For several years, Hector has dedicated himself to selling groceries (milk, rice, oil, sugar, toilet paper, tuna, eggs), fruits, vegetables and beverages.  He has located his business in his house for security and comfort reasons, as he can tend to it the hours he wishes.  He uses his earnings to cover all the expenses and needs of his household. 

In order to implement his business, he has requested a loan of 1500 new Peruvian soles from Edpyme Alternativa to buy more merchandise to supply his store.  His goal is to continue growing his business and have a supply of products to offer his customers so he can cover his loan and family obligations.  Hector is a very responsible and dedicated person who is preoccupied with having more to offer his family, and concurrently improving financially to give more opportunities to his children.

loans.use: buy merchandise to supply his store.

loans.name: Erwing

texts.es:
Erwing de 29 años de edad, vive con su esposa e hijos en su casa propia, no cuenta con servicios básicos, ubicada en la zona rural del distrito de Cayaltí, la cual pertenece al departamento de Lambayeque.  Esta zona se caracteriza por la actividad agrícola y ganadería.

Erwing desde hace algunos años se dedica a la crianza y venta de aves de corral (gallinas y pavos), su corral se encuentra en la parte posterior de su casa, el cual es apropiado y amplio, los alimenta con comida balanceada y granos naturales para que sus animales lleguen a tener un crecimiento óptimo para ofrecerlos en los diferentes mercados de la zona y así obtenga muy buenas ganancias para solventar sus obligaciones familiares .  

Ha solicitado un préstamo a Edpyme Alternativa de 1200 nuevos soles para comprar más animales y su respectivo alimento, con los ingresos que obtenega puede cubrir su crédito y mejorar su calidad de vida.  Erwing es una persona agradable y con muchas ganas de superarse en la vida, brindádole lo mejor a sus hijos para logren sus exitos personales.
texts.en:
29-year-old Erwing lives with his wife and children in his own home which does not have basic services.  His house is located in the rural part of Cayaltí district, in Lambayeque department.  This area is noted for its farming and livestock raising.

Erwing has been raising and selling farmyard birds (hens and turkeys) for some years.  His pen is located behind his house.  It is suitable and spacious.  He feeds his birds balanced feed and natural grains so that they reach an optimal level of growth.  This means that he can sell them in the different markets in his area and make very good profits with which to cover his family expenses.

Erwing has requested a loan for 1,200 soles from Edpyme Alternativa to buy more animals and their respective feed.  He will use the income that he makes to repay his loan and improve his quality of life.  Erwing is a pleasant person who has a great desire to do well in life, providing his children with the best so that they can achieve their own personal success.

loans.use: to buy more animals and their respective feed

loans.name: Narcisa

texts.es:
Narcisa  de 22 años de edad que vive con sus dos hijos en las edades de 2 y 7 años en a ciudad de Cartagena de Indias, donde tiene como sus ingresos principales una peluquería y también vende productos de belleza, bisutería, kid de aseo etc.. Su principal negocio es mejorar la imagen personal y/o profesional de su clientela, conformada por hombres, mujeres, niños y niñas, a través de peinados, maquillajes, tratamientos capilares etc. 
Narcisa cuenta que inició su negocio con un espejo y pocos implementos de trabajo, pero su espíritu de superación la llevaron  a capacitarse en peluquería y como manicurista y en limpieza facial, para finalmente decidir emprender su aventura de negocios y hacerlo crecer, iniciando en casa de su hermana, de quien ha recibido un gran apoyo y sin necesidad de crédito. Hoy no solo corta cabello, embellece el rostro con maquillaje, y ofrece servicios de belleza, sino que también asesora y vende  productos con los que trabaja en la peluquería y mercancías variadas, que su concentrada clientela le encarga. Sus compras las realizan a crédito y de contado, pero necesita dinero para tener mas libertad sobre los productos que aplica, e incluir nuevos proveedores en su registro, para modernizar sus técnicas de atención. Esta es la razón por la cual acude a su credikiva, primer financiamiento que hace a la Fundación Mario Santo Domingo con el cual comprará de contado y en mayor volumen, productos de belleza y kid de aseo y bisutería, lo cual le proporcionará descuentos en su compra, que trasladará al aumento de sus servicios y por consiguiente a sus rentables clientes.
texts.en:
Narcisa, 22, lives with her two children who are 2 and 7 years old in the city of Cartagena de Indias where her main source of income is a barber shop but she also sells beauty products, costume jewelry, cleaning kits, etc.  Her main business is improving the personal and/or professional image of her clientele, composed of men, women, boys and girls, through haircuts, make-up, hair treatments, etc.

Narcisa relates that she started her business with just a mirror and a few work tools but her get ahead spirit led her to take hair cutting, manicure and facial cleansing courses in order to finally set off on a business adventure and make it grow.  She started out in her sister’s house who has been of great support and not asking for any thanks.  Today, she not only cuts hair, uses make-up to beautify faces and offers other beauty services but she’s also a beauty consultant and sells the products she works with in her barber shop as well as assorted other merchandise her clientele orders from her.

Her sales are for cash and on credit but she needs money to have more freedom over the products she carries and to add new suppliers to her roster to modernize her service techniques.  This is the reason why she’s calling on a Kiva loan, the first financing from Fundación Mario Santo Domingo, to be able to buy and pay cash for large amounts of beauty supplies, cleansing kits and costume jewelry, which will make her eligible for discounts on her purchases that will in turn translate to increased services and thus more profitable customers.

loans.use: to buy and pay cash for larger volumes of beauty supplies, facial cleansing kits and costume jewelry.

loans.name: Fernando Isaias

texts.es: El Sr. Fernando tiene 31 años es padre soltero, ademas se dedica a la minería hace tres años, el crédito otorgado es para invertirlo en un negocio de abarrotes en la casa de su madre, su meta es ver crecer su negocio y lograr el sueño de la casa propia y a la vez darle una mejor calidad de vida a su menor hijo y a su madre. El Sr. Fernando esta muy agradecido con el crédito otorgado ya que con esa oportunidad cumplirá sus desafíos propuestos.
texts.en: Fernando is 31 years old.  He is a single father who has been working in the mining industry for three years.  He is requesting this loan to invest in a grocery store business in his mother's home.  His goal is to see his business grow and to fulfil his dream of owning his own home.  He would also like to provide his young son and his mother with a better quality of life.  Fernando is very grateful for his loan as this opportunity will enable him to achieve his goals.

loans.use: to invest in his grocery store business

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy clothes, footwear, cosmetics and costume jewelry.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy stock items for his store.

loans.name: Clara Janet

texts.es:
Clara de 30 años es madre de familia, vive con su hija en casa propia, cuenta con servicio de agua y luz solamente, ubicada en el distrito de Cayaltí que pertenece a la provincia de Chiclayo.    Zona que se caracteriza por la actividad agrícola y ganadera.

Clara se dedica a la venta de ropa de damas y caballeros negocio que a colocado en un puesto en el interior del mercado de Cayaltí desde hace unos 4 años, su mercadería lo ofrece a sus clientes, también trae a pedido, tratando de tener mayor demanda de clientes y así pueda obtener más ingresos para solventar sus gastos familiares.

Al observar que su negocio cada día es más próspero a creído necesario solicitar un préstamo a Edpyme Alternativa de 1500 nuevos soles para comprar mayor cantidad de mercadería y abastecer su tienda con productos innovadores, con la finalidad que su clientela siga aumentando para poder pagar su crédito y mejorar la calidad de vida de su familia.
texts.en:
30-year-old Clara is a mother who lives with her daughter in her own home which only has water and electricity.  Her house is located in Cayaltí district, in Chiclayo province.  This area is noted fro its farming and livestock raising.

Clara sells men's and women's clothes.  She set up her business on a stall inside Cayaltí market four years ago.  She sells her merchandise to her customers and also sells to order, trying to gain more customer demand so that she can make more income with which to cover her family expenses.

Noting that her business was doing very well, Clara decided that it was necessary to request a loan for 1,500 soles from Edpyme Alternativa in order to buy a larger quantity of merchandise and stock her store with the very latest products.  Her aim is to continue increasing her number of customers so that she can repay her loan and improve her family's quality of life.

loans.use: to buy a larger quantity of merchandise for her business

loans.name: Ramon Apolinar

texts.es:
Ramón, un humilde agricultor, de 42 años, padre de 2 hijos, el originario de Las Parcelas comunidad localizada en la ciudad de León, el siembra maíz, ajonjolí, su nivel de estudio es básico solo curso hasta sexto grado de primaria  su condición de pobreza no le permitió continuar estudiando  y se dedico a trabajar. Inicio a sembrar por su cuenta hace 20 años, cuando un tío de el le sugirió que sembrara maíz, ajonjolí   antes el tenían una pulpería pero decidió dedicarse mejor a la siembra. 
Requiere el préstamo para compra de insumos y pago de manos de obra para sembrar maíz y ajonjolí. Esto le ayudará a pagar parte de los gastos que genera sembrar granos básicos. Por lo pronto siempre quiere seguir sembrando y ampliar sus cosechas.
texts.en: Ramón is a modest farmer.  He is 42 years old, has two children, and is from Las Parcelas, a community located in the city of León.  He grows corn and sesame.  Ramón's level of education is basic.  He only studied up to the sixth year of elementary school.  The poverty in which he lived did not allow him to continue studying and he started working.  He started out growing crops 20 years ago when one of his uncles suggested that he grow corn and sesame.  Before this he used to have a grocery store but he decided to devote himself to growing crops instead.  He always wants to continue growing crops and increasing the size of his harvests.

loans.use: to buy supplies and pay laborers to sow corn and sesame

loans.name: Edy Magally

texts.es:
Edy D. 19 años, vive con su esposo en su casa propia, cuenta con los servicios D. agua y luz, ubicada en L. zona rural del distrito D. Mórrope que pertenece al departamento D. Lambayeque.  Zona D. actividad agrícoL., ganadera y turismo.

DesD. hace un año aproximadamente Edy se dedica a L. confección y venta D. prendas D. vestir, su negocio lo tiene en su domicilio, cuenta con su propia clienteL., con los ingresos que obtenga podrá solventar sus gastos diarios D. su casa.

Ha solicitado un préstamo a Edpyme Alternativa D. 1600 nuevos soles para comprar más material para seguir elaborando y vendiendo L. ropa D. vestir a su clienteL. y así podrá obtener mayores ganancias para tener una mejor calidad D. vida.  Edy es una mujer trabajadora y responsable que desea salir adelante a pesar D. las dificultades que a veces se presentan en L. vida.
texts.en:
Edy, 19 years old, lives with her husband in her own house, with electric and water, located in the rural district of Mórrope that belongs to the department of Lambayeque. This is an area of agriculture, livestock and tourism. For about a year Edy has been making and selling clothing. Her business is in her home, with established clients, and with the earnings she is able to meet the daily expenses of her household.

She is asking for a loan through Edpyme Alternative of 1600 PEN ($600.00) in order to buy more supplies in order to continue making and selling clothing for her customers and to be able to have higher earnings so that she can have a better quality of life. Edy is a hardworking, responsible woman who wants to succeed despite the problems that life sometimes presents.

loans.use: to purchase supplies in order to continue making clothing to sell.

loans.name: Shirley

texts.es:
Shirley ésta aplicando a su segundo credikiva  el cual será invertido en insumos para aumentar su producción de ariquipes;  con su anterior credikiva compró implementos de trabajo y materias primas, con las cuales logró un nuevo aumento en su producción. Su mensaje a los financiadores es el siguiente: “Les agradezco mucho, ya que gracias a su créditos he logrado sacar mi negocio adelante, y poco a poco se convertirá en el negocio que espero tener “. “Que me sigan apoyando” Si usted quiere leer la historia de Shirley ingrese al siguiente enlace:
http://kiva.org/lend/228791
texts.en:
Shirley is applying for her second Kiva loan that will be invested in ingredients to increase Arequipes [Colombian caramel candy] production.  She used her previous Kiva loan to buy work tools and raw materials with which she attained a new increase in production.  

Her message to lenders is the following:  “I’m very grateful to you because thanks to the loans I’ve been able to move my business forward and little by little it’s going to become the business I hope to have.  Please continue to support me.” 

If you’d like to read Shirley’s story, please click on the following link: 
http://kiva.org/lend/228791

loans.use: to buy raw materials to make arequipes [Colombian caramel candy].

loans.name: Anyeli Rosio

texts.es:
Anyeli de 19 años de edad, es soltera, vive en casa de sus padres, cuenta con servicios básico sólo de luz, ubicada en la zona rural del distrito de Tambogrande que pertenece al departamento de Piura.  Zona que se caracteriza por la actividad pesquera, agrícola y artesana.

Desde hace varios años Anyeli se dedica la venta de productos de primera necesidad (leche, aceite, azúcar, papel higiénico, atún, etc) y de bebidas, su negocio lo a colocado en su misma casa para su seguridad, con las ganancias que obtenga por la venta de sus productos  trata de cubrir  todos sus gastos y mejorar su nivel de vida.  

Para poder  implementar su negocio a solicitado un crédito a Edpyme Alternativa  de 1000 nuevos soles para comprar más mercaderías, con el único ideal de que su negocio sea cada vez más grande y tenga productos surtidos para ofrecerles a sus clientes y solventar sus gastos personales.  Anyeli es una persona responsable y dedicada que con empeño desea que su negocio crezca para poder seguir ayudando a sus padres económicamente.
texts.en:
19-year-old Anyeli is single and lives in her parents' home.  The only basic service they receive is electricity.  The house is located in the rural part of Tambogrande district, in Piura department.  This area is noted for its fishing, farming and handicrafts.

Anyeli has been selling essential household products (milk, oil, sugar, toilet paper, tuna, etc.) and drinks for several years.  Her business is located in her own home for her safety.  She uses the income that she makes from selling her products to try and cover all her expenses and improve her standard of living.

In order to stock her business, Anyeli has requested a loan for 1,000 soles from Edpyme Alternativa to buy more merchandise.  Her sole aim is for her business to increase in size and have products in stock to offer her customers, so that she can cover her personal expenses.  Anyeli is a responsible and committed person who, through her efforts, would like her business to grow so that she can continue helping her parents financially.

loans.use: to buy more merchandise to stock her business

loans.name: Isidro

texts.es:
Isidro de 57 años de edad, vive con su familia en su casa propia, no cuenta con los servicios básicos, ubicada en la zona rural del distrito de Olmos que pertenece al departamento de Lambayeque.  Esta zona se caracteriza por la actividad agrícola y ganadería.

Isidro desde hace algunos años se dedica a la crianza y venta de ganado caprino (cabras), su corral se encuentra en la parte posterior de su casa, los cuales son apropiados y amplios, los alimenta con comida balanceada y pastos naturales para que sus animales lleguen a tener un crecimiento óptimo para ofrecerlos en los diferentes mercados de la zona y así obtenga muy buenas ganancias para solventar sus gastos diarios de su familia.  

Ha solicitado un préstamo a Edpyme Alternativa de 2000 nuevos soles para realizar la compra de una mototaxi para poder movilizarse con mayor facilidad, con los ingresos que adquiera por la venta puede cubrir su crédito y mejorar la calidad de vida de su familia.  Isidro es una persona trabajadora y muy responsable que lo único que quiere es que su familia se supere y  mejore económicamente para tener otras comodidades y oportunidades.
texts.en:
57-year-old Isidro lives with his family in his own home which doesn't have basic services.  His home is located in the rural part of Olmos district, in Lambayeque department.  This area is noted for its farming and livestock raising.

Isidro has been raising and selling goats for some years.  His pen is located behind his home.  It is suitable and spacious.  He feeds his animals balanced feed and natural fodder so that they achieve an optimal level of growth and he is able to sell them in the different markets in the area, thereby making very good profits with which to cover his family's daily expenses.

Isidro has requested a loan for 2,000 soles from Edpyme Alternativa to buy a motorcycle taxi so that he can get around more easily.  He will use his income to repay his loan and improve his family's quality of life.  Isidro is a hard-working and very responsible person.  The only thing he wants is for his family to do well and improve financially so that they can enjoy more comforts and opportunities.

loans.use: to buy a motorcycle taxi so that he can get around more easily

loans.name: Eustacia

texts.es:
Eustacia D. 51 años D. edad, vive con su esposo e hijos en su casa propia, la cual cuenta con servicios D. agua y luz, ubicada en la zona rural del departamento D. Lambayeque.   Esta zona se dedica a la agricultura, ganadería y turismo.

Eustacia desD. hace muchos años se dedica a la crianza y venta D. animales D. corral (aves y cerdos), su corrales se encuentra en la parte posterior D. su casa, los cuales son apropiados y amplios, los alimenta con comida balanceada para que sus animales lleguen a tener un crecimiento óptimo para poderlos ofrecer en los diferentes mercados D. la zona y así obtenga buenas ganancias para solventar sus gastos personales.

Ha solicitado un préstamo a Edpyme Alternativa D. 2500 nuevos soles para la compra D. más animales y su respectiva comida, con las ganancias que obtenga con la venta D. sus animales podrá cubrir su crédito como tener una mejor calidad D. vida.  Eustacia es una mujer que con esfuerzo y mucho empeño a sabido sacar adelante a su familia con la finalidad D. que logren su objetivo.
texts.en:
51-year-old Eustacia lives with her husband and children in her own home which has basic services of water and electricity.  It is located in the rural part of Lambayeque department.  The people in this area work in farming, livestock raising and tourism.

Eustacia has been raising and selling farmyard animals (birds and pigs) for some years.  Her pens are located behind her home.  They are suitable and spacious.  She feeds her animals balanced feed so that they reach an optimal level of growth and she is able to sell them in the different markets in her area, making good profits with which to cover her personal expenses.

Eustacia has requested a loan for 2,500 soles from Edpyme Alternativa to buy more animals and their respective feed.  She will use the profits that she makes from the sale of her animals to repay her loan and enjoy a better quality of life.  Eustacia is a woman who, through hard work and commitment, has known how to get her family ahead in life.  Her aim has been for them to achieve their goals.

loans.use: to buy more animals and their respective feed

loans.name: Maria Salome

texts.es:
Doña Maria, tiene su propio negocio, desde hace diez años vende fritanga por las tardes y parte de la noche, carne asada, pollo asado cerdo, tajadas,verde,maduras, enchiladas, entre otras ricas comidas, aprecios accesibles.
Es madre de cinco hijos, mayores e independientes, solo a una hija esta estudiando, la cual espera apoyar para que alcance los estudios profesionales. Cuando inicio lo hizo con poco dinero propio, luego gracias a los financiamiento de Afodenic, logro aumentar la venta de comida, frescos, gaseosas, hizo un bajarete para estar en mejores condiciones de venta, ha logrado captar su clientela, lo que se ha mantenido en equilibrio de su hogar y con sus compromisos de pago.
Hoy con esta nueva solicitud, sera para la compra de cincuenta libra de carne de res, cuarenta libras de carne de cerdo, sesenta de polo, productos lacteos, gaseosas, jugos, frutas para hacer refrescos. Logrando mantener sus ventas y hacer lo que mas demandan los clientes.
texts.en:
María has her own business.  For ten years she has been selling fried food in the afternoons and part of the evening.  She sells roast meat, roast chicken and pork, green and ripe fried plantain slices, enchiladas and other delicious food at affordable prices.

María is the mother of five grown-up children who are living independently.  Only one daughter is still in school.  She hopes to support her until she reaches university.  When she started out in her business, she did so with a small amount of her own money.  Then, thanks to loans from Afodenic, she managed to increase her sale of food, soft drinks and soda.  She built a small stand so that she could sell her food in better conditions.  She has managed to attract customers which has enabled her to achieve balance both at home and in making her loan repayments.

María is making this new loan request to buy fifty pounds of beef, forty pounds of pork, sixty pounds of chicken, dairy products, soda, juice and fruit for making soft drinks.  In this way, she will be able to maintain her sales and prepare what her customers are most requesting.

loans.use: to invest in buying meat, dairy products, soda and fruit so that she can continue selling her delicious food

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to purchase raw materials for making cleaning products.

loans.name: Lely Del Carmen

texts.es: Lely, originaria de la ciudad de León, tiene 41 años de edad, esta casada, tiene 2 hijos , ella  es comerciante, dueña de una pulpería. Empezó su negocio a los 38 años este ha sido su segundo negocio  antes viajaba a Guatemala a comprar mercadería para vender y su familia tenia un negocio de venta de bloques, también trabajo vendiendo granos básicos en un local cerca de la terminal de buses, tuvo que dejar ese local porque su hijo se enfermo y no tenia quien lo cuidara. Así  que toda esta experiencia le sirvió de mucho para poner su pulpería. Realizo el préstamo para comprar un freezer y surtir su mercadería de productos tales como arroz, frijoles, azúcar, aceite, leche, huevos y productos de limpieza. Quiere mantener su negocio de productos que son demandados por sus clientes, y comprar el freezer para vender carnes, pollo, jugos, gaseosas, mantequilla, crema, queso. Su meta próxima es ampliar su pulpería con nuevos productos.
texts.en:
Lely, a native of the city of Leon, is 41, married, and has two children. She is a tradeswoman and owns a small grocery store. She began her business when she was 38 and this was her second business. Previously she traveled to Guatemala to buy merchandise to sell and her family had a business selling cement blocks. She also worked selling bulk grains in a place near the bus terminal. She had to leave that place because her son became ill and she had no-one to care for him. Consequently, all of that earlier experience served her well when she started her small grocery store.

She obtained this loan to buy a freezer and merchandise, such as rice, beans, sugar, oil, milk, eggs and cleaning products. She wants to keep her business stocked with products in high demand by her customers and to buy a freezer in order to sell beef, chicken, fruit juice, soft drinks, butter, cream and cheese. Her next goal is to expand her grocery store by offering new items.

loans.use: to buy a freezer and re-stock her merchandise with products such as rice, beans, sugar, oil, milk, eggs and cleaning products.

loans.name: Elba Maria

texts.es: Elba D. 58 años D. edad vive en la ciudad D. Cartagena D. Indias, con su esposo y tiene 5 hijos en las edades D. 23 a 37 respectivamente. DesD. allí se dedica al comercio D. ropa y otras mercancías en su pequeña variedades, la cual inició hace 2 años vendiendo vestidos para damas, caballeros y en la línea infantil,  y poco a poco fue agregando otras mercancías D. acuerdo a lo que registraba en sus libros, cuando sus clientes pedían y no tenia existencia D. la mercancía solicitada. Su negocio está ubicado en un local comercial, dotado D. vitrinas surtidas con cosméticos, ropas, útiles escolares y diversos accesorios. Su credikiva es el segundo financiamiento que hace a la Fundación Mario Santo Domingo, organización con la cual ha logrado un completo surtido, con el que ha logrado vender más. Como Elba María quiere seguir creciendo, aprovechando la demanda del mercado en esta época, D. gran despliegue comercial, a propósito D. acercarse el día del amor y D. la amistad, está  solicitando su credikiva, con el cual responderá a pedidos D. ropa por parte D. sus clientes,  quienes esperan hacer demostraciones D. cariño a sus familiares y amigos,  mediante obsequios comprados en la miscelánea D. Elba María.
texts.en:
Elba is 58 years old and lives in the city of Cartagena D. Indias with her husband. They have five children who range in age from 23 to 37 respectively. She has a small variety store where she sells clothes and other merchandise. Two years ago, she started selling clothing of various brands for women, men, and children. Gradually she added other merchandise according to the records kept in her books. Whenever she did not have an existing product in stock, Elba would keep a record of her customers’ requests.

Her business is located in a commercial building, equipped with display cases stocked with cosmetics, clothes, school supplies, and various accessories. Her Kiva loan is the second occurrence of financing through Fundación Mario Santo Domingo, the organization that has helped her complete her inventory so that she can sell more. Since she wants to continue growing, Elba Maria is taking advantage of the demand of the market during this time of year when a great number of products are introduced because of the Day of Love and Friendship (the Colombian equivalent of Valentine’s Day). By requesting a Kiva loan, Elba Maria will be able to fulfill the clothing orders from her customers who are waiting to demonstrate their affection to loved ones, such as relatives and friends. These products will be presented as gifts that were purchased at Elba Maria’s variety store.

loans.use: to purchase clothing so that she can fulfill her customers' orders.

loans.name: Eva Maria

texts.es:
Eva de 40 años de edad, vive con su esposo e hijos en su casa propia, cuenta con servicio de luz solamente, ubicada en la zona rural del distrito de Tambogrande que pertenece al departamento de Piura.  Zona que se caracteriza por la actividad agrícola, ganadera y artesanía.

Eva ha colocado un bazar donde ofrece todo tipo de productos para el uso personal y visutería, desde hace algunos año, su negocio lo tiene en su domicilio, lo que le permite atender a sus clientes en ctratando de tener mayor demanda de clientes y así pueda obtener más ingresos para solventar sus gastos personales.

Al observar que su negocio cada día es más próspero a creído necesario solicitar un préstamo a Edpyme Alternativa de 1000 nuevos soles para implementar comprando mercadería innovadora para que tenga acogida con sus clientes, con la finalidad que su clientela siga aumentando en su bazar para poder pagar su crédito y mejorar su calidad de vida, para seguir apoyando económicamente a sus hijos.
texts.en:
40-year-old Eva lives with her husband and children in her own home which only has electricity.  Her home is located in the rural part of Tambogrande district, in Piura department.  This area is noted for its farming, livestock raising and handicrafts.

Eva has set up a store where she sells all kinds of personal care products and costume jewelry.  She has been in this business for several years and her store is located in her home which allows her to serve her customers in comfort.  She tries to attract more customers so that she can make more income with which to cover her personal expenses.

Noting that her business was doing better and better each day, Eva decided it was necessary to request a loan for 1,000 soles from Edpyme Alternativa in order to stock her business, buying new merchandise to please her customers.  Her goal is to continue increasing her number of customers so that she can repay her loan, improve her quality of life and continue financially supporting her children.

loans.use: to buy new merchandise with which to stock her business

loans.name: Delfa

texts.es:
Delfa de 49 años de edad, vive con su familia en su casa propia, cuenta con servicios de agua y luz, ubicada en la zona rural del distrito de Olmos que pertenece al departamento de Lambayeque.  Zona que se caracteriza por la actividad agrícola y ganadera.

Desde hace 5 años Delfa se dedica la venta de productos de primera necesidad (leche, aceite, papel higiénico, atún, etc) y de bebidas, su negocio lo a colocado en su misma casa para su seguridad, con las ganancias que obtenga por la venta de sus productos  trata de cubrir  todos sus gastos y mejorar el nivel de vida de su familia.  

Para poder  implementar su negocio a solicitado un crédito a Edpyme Alternativa  de 1300 nuevos soles para comprar más mercaderías, con el único ideal de que su negocio sea cada vez más grande y tenga productos surtidos para ofrecerles a sus clientes y solventar sus gastos personales.  Delfa es una persona responsable y dedicada que con empeño desea que su negocio crezca para poder seguir ayudando a su familia económicamente.
texts.en:
49-year-old Delfa lives with her family in her own home which has water and electricity.  Her home is located in the rural part of Olmos district, in Lambayeque department.  This area is noted for its farming and livestock raising.

For five years, Delfa has been selling essential household products (milk, oil, toilet paper, tuna, etc) and drinks.  Her business is located in her own home for her safety.  She uses the profits that she makes from selling her products to try and cover all her expenses and improve her family's standard of living.

In order to stock her business, Delfa has requested a loan for 1,300 soles from Edpyme Alternativa to buy more merchandise.  Her sole goal is to increase the size of her business and have products in stock to offer her customers so that she can cover her personal expenses.  Delfa is a responsible and committed person who, through her hard work, would like her business to grow so that she can continue helping her family financially.

loans.use: to buy more merchandise for her business

loans.name: Jose De La Rosa

texts.es:
José de 31 años de edad, vive en casa de unos familiares con su esposa e hija, cuenta con servicios básico sólo de luz, ubicada en la zona urbana del distrito de Olmos que pertenece al departamento de Lambayeque.  Zona que se caracteriza por la actividad agrícola y ganadera.

Desde hace 3 años José se dedica la venta de productos de primera necesidad (leche, aceite, azúcar, papel higiénico, atún, etc) golosinas y de bebidas, su negocio lo a colocado en su misma casa para su comodidad, con las ganancias que obtenga por la venta de sus productos  trata de cubrir  todos los gastos diarios de su familia.  

Para poder  implementar su negocio a solicitado un crédito a Edpyme Alternativa  de 1000 nuevos soles para comprar más mercaderías, con el único ideal de que su negocio sea cada vez más grande y tenga productos surtidos para ofrecerles a sus clientes y solventar sus necesidades.  José es una persona responsable y trabajadora que desea que su negocio crezca para poder seguir ayudando a su hija y esposa económicamente.
texts.en:
31-year-old José lives in a house belonging to some family members together with his wife and daughter.  The only basic service the house receives is electricity.  It is located in the urban area of Olmos district, in Lambayeque department.  This area is noted for its farming and livestock raising.

For three years, José has been selling essential household products (milk, oil, sugar, toilet paper, tuna, etc), candies and drinks.  His business is located in his home for his convenience.  He uses the profits that he makes from selling his products to try and cover all his family's daily expenses.

In order to stock his business, José has requested a loan for 1,000 soles from Edpyme Alternativa to buy more merchandise.  His goal is to grow his business and have products in stock to offer his customers so that he can cover his needs.  José is a responsible and hard-working person who would like his business to grow so that he can continue helping his daughter and wife financially.

loans.use: to buy more merchandise to stock his business

loans.name: Segundo

texts.es:
Segundo de 60 años de edad, vive con su familia en su casa propia, la cual no cuenta con servicios básicos, ubicada en la zona rural del distrito de Cayaltí que pertenece a la provincia de Chiclayo.   Esta zona se dedica a la agricultura y ganadería.

Segundo desde hace muchos años se dedica a la crianza y venta de aves de corral (patos, pollos, pavos y pichones), su corral se encuentra en la parte posterior de su casa, los cuales son apropiados y amplios, los alimenta con comida balanceada para que sus animales lleguen a tener un crecimiento óptimo para poderlos ofrecer en los diferentes mercados de la zona y así obtenga buenas ganancias para solventar sus gastos familiares.

Ha solicitado un préstamo a Edpyme Alternativa de 2500 nuevos soles para la compra de más animales y su respectiva comida, con las ganancias que obtenga con la venta de sus animales podrá cubrir su crédito como tener una mejor calidad de vida.  Segudo es una persona que con esfuerzo y mucho empeño a sabido sacar adelante a su familia con la finalidad de que logren su objetivo.
texts.en:
60-year-old Segundo lives with his family in his own home which does not have basic services.  His house is located in the rural part of Cayaltí district, in Chiclayo province.  The people in this area farm and raise livestock.

Segundo has been raising and selling farmyard bird (ducks, chickens, turkeys and chicks) for many years.  His pen is located behind his home.  It is suitable and spacious.  He feeds his animals balanced feed so that they reach an optimal level of growth and he is able to sell them in the different markets in his area, making good profits with which to cover his family expenses.

Segundo has requested a loan for 2,500 soles from Edpyme Alternativa in order to buy more animals and their respective feed.  With the profits he makes from selling his animals, he will be able to repay his loan and enjoy a better quality of life.  Segundo is a person who, through hard work and determination, has known how to get his family ahead in life with the aim of helping them achieve their goals.

loans.use: to buy more animals and their respective feed

loans.name: Frederick  Alberto

texts.es:
Frederick, de 29 años de edad, habita en la ciudad de León, esta casado, tiene 2 hijos,  es Ingeniero Industrial, pero el se dedica al  comercio el vende retenedores de motocicletas, este negocio lo ha tenido durante dos años. Inicio este negocio a los 27 años de edad, aunque antes de que el se hiciera cargo de este negocio, su padre era el que lo dirigía, pues su padre era dueño de una taller hidráulico mientras que el trabajaba como jefe de operaciones del taller y eso le permitió adquirir experiencia de este mercado de venta de venta de repuesto y retenedores de motos y autos.
El decidió realizar este préstamo para comprar retenedores de todos tamaños para autos y motos. El quiere aperturar el mercado de retenedores de motocicletas, ya que sus clientes lo ha ayudado a sentirse más confiado para abrir comercio en esa área. Por lo pronto su meta próxima es acondicionar mejor el local para hacer mas atractivo a sus clientes y surtir su inventario de nuevos y mejores repuestos para autos y motos.
texts.en:
29-year-old Frederick lives in the city of León.  He is married and has two children.  Frederick is an industrial engineer but he sells retainers for motorbikes.  He has had this business for two years.  He started this business at 27 years of age.  Before he took over this business, it was run by his father.  His father was the owner of a hydraulic workshop and Frederick worked as head of operations in the workshop.  This allowed him to gain experience in the market of selling spare parts and retainers for motorbikes and cars.

Frederick decided to request this loan in order to buy retainers in all sizes for cars and motorbikes.  His next goal is to better fit out his premises to make them more attractive to his customers and to increase his stock with new and better car and motorcycle parts.

loans.use: to buy retainers in all sizes for cars and motorbikes

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to purchase a rolling machine for making bread.

loans.name: Mireya Luisa

texts.es:
Doña Mireya  se dedica a la venta de ropa nueva, ropa usada y cosmeticos, con mas de diesiseis años, trabajando para apoyar a su familia, es madre de cuatro hijos estudiantes, su esposo es de profesion electricista.
Juntos han logrado su propio hogar, al iniciar lo hizo con dinero que su esposo dio, con la venta de ropa usada. Luego comienza a tener mas encargo, lo que recurre al financiamiento para lograr sus expetativas con sus ventas al introducir mas mercaderia y comienza la venta de cosmeticos afiliandose con la Avon, en donde sus ventas crecieron, como la captacion de cliente.
Siendo Afodenic, una puerta, al desarrollo de su negocio, ya que financio el capital para crecer en inventario.
Hoy con este nuevo prestamo comprara: ropa de dama, para niños,
texts.en:
Mireya dedicates herself to selling new clothing, used clothing and cosmetics, and has been working for more than sixteen years to support her family.  She is the mother of four children who are students, and her husband is an electrician.

Together, they managed to obtain their own home with money her husband provided and with the sale of used clothing.  Later, she started to have more orders and turned to financing to meet her expectations with regard to sales and introducing more merchandise.  Also, it allowed her to start selling cosmetics through an affiliation with Avon products.  Her sales grew, as well as her obtaining more customers.

Afodenic has been a conduit allowing her to develop her business, given that they provide capital for her to grow her inventory.

Today, with this new loan, she will buy:  women and children’s clothing.

loans.use: invest in the purchase of new clothing, children's clothing, and cosmetics to fulfill her orders and augment sales.

loans.name: Federico

texts.es: Federico de 30 años de edad vive en la ciudad e Cartagena y se dedica a la venta de mercancía variada, negocio que inició hace 2 años,  una vez terminara sus estudios de bachiller y ante la dificultad para conseguir empleo,  decidió generar ingresos mediante una actividad independiente. Su mercado lo inició con familiares, que poco a poco le recomendaron a otras personas y hoy ha logrado construir una clientela estable,  que quiere ampliar. Federico vende a crédito toallas, implementos de aseo, pijamas, colonias, cosméticos y todo lo que se le ocurre a su clientela pedirle y esta al alcance de sus posibilidades. Su mayor desafío es responderle oportunamente a su clientela, por que como cada día crece, su capital de trabajo se torna insuficiente para complacerlos y lograr generar más utilidades por concepto de ventas. Esta es la razón por la cual acude a su credikiva, primer financiamiento que hace a la Fundación Mario Santo Domingo, con el cual comprará ropa, accesorios femeninos, toallas, sobre los pedidos que han hecho sus clientes, a propósito de que se acerca el día del amor y de la amistad y quieren agasajar a sus familiares y amigos con obsequios que comprarán a Federico, que de su parte se   prepara para el repunte de sus ventas y por eso aprovechará al máximo la inyección de capital de trabajo a través de su financiamiento, con el que le auguramos éxitos, teniendo en cuenta su experiencia, y el aprovechamiento que hace de su mercado rentable.
texts.en:
Federico is 30 years old and lives in the city of Cartagena. He sells a variety of merchandise and started this business two years ago. After finishing his high school education, he found it difficult to secure a job so he decided to generate income by engaging in an independent activity. His initial market consisted of relatives but gradually he was recommended to other people and today has built a stable customer base that he wants to expand. Federico sells on credit towels, cleaning implements, pajamas, colognes, cosmetics, and anything else requested by his customers. This allows him to cover all of the possibilities. His greatest challenge is being able to respond to his customers in a timely manner. With each passing day, his operating capital becomes insufficient for satisfying his customers and generating more profits from his sales. This is why he is applying for a Kiva loan, his first form of financing through Fundación Mario Santo Domingo.

He will use the money to buy clothes, women’s accessories, and towels so that he can fulfill the orders his customers have made. With regard to the Day of Love and Friendship (the Colombian equivalent of Valentine’s Day), his customers want to show their affection for relatives and friends with gifts purchased from Federico. Therefore, he wants to be prepared for the spike in sales and make the most of his loan by injecting operating capital into his business. Based on his experience, this will increase his chance of success as he takes advantage of this profitable market.

loans.use: to buy clothes, women’s accessories, and towels so that he can fulfill his customers' orders.

loans.name: Dagoberto Margarito

texts.es:
Don Dagoberto tiene la edad de 59 años, casado, y padre de tres hijos estudiantes.
Don dago ha pasado por muchas dificultades, pero ha logrado salir adelante, trabajando como cadete sufrio un accidente, en donde no trabajo por seis meses, contando con el apoyo de su familia.
Luego con ayuda, logra ah salir adelante y se recupera, y comienza ah trabajar, lo que se estabiliza. Lleva doce años dando el servicio de taxi, ya que es el medio de poder dar el sustento a sus hijos.
Requiere de un financiamiento para dar mantenimiento a su taxi, en los amortiguadores, rotula, y llantas. Siendo Afodenic el medio para lograr su objetivo. Para mejorar su servicio.
texts.en:
Dagoberto is 59 years old, married, and the father of three children who are students.

Dagoberto has faced many difficulties, but has managed to get ahead.  Working as a cadet, he suffered an accident whereby he was unable to work for six months and had to rely on the support of his family.

Later, with help, he managed to get ahead, recuperate, and start to work, therefore becoming more stable.  He has been providing a taxi service for more than twelve years, and it is the means by which he provides for his children.

He requires a loan in order to perform some maintenance on his taxi, including to the shocks, ball-and-socket joints, and tires.  Afodenic is the means by which he can meet his objectives and improve his service.

loans.use: maintain his taxi by buying tires, shocks and ball-and-socket joints to provide a better service to his customers.

loans.name: Yurleida

texts.es: Yurleida vive en la ciudad de Cartagena, lugar donde tiene un taller de confecciones que convirtió en sus principales ingresos;  esto ocurrió porque aprovechando la experiencia de su madre, decidió hacer un curso de ropa interior, estudió posteriormente patronaje industrial, en el Servicio Nacional de Aprendizaje SENA, y con la ayuda de su familia compró una maquina y emprendió su aventura de negocios. Inició con la línea de ropa intima y luego agregó blusas femeninas y en la actualidad trabaja uniformes deportivos y escolares. Su mercado lo conforman los colegios y escuelas que la rodean, con quienes establece contratos,  así mismo confecciona sobre medidas y aunque su capital de trabajo se torne insuficiente para la demanda que tiene, se las ingenia para responderles, pero con mucho esfuerzo. Esta es la razón por la cual acude a su credikiva, primer financiamiento que hace ala Fundación Mario Santo Domingo, con el comprará materias primas e insumos,  para responder aun pedido de uniformes deportivos, cuya respuesta requiere de mucho cuidado para poder conservar sus clientes.
